content: Tug kws tau nyob kaaj sab lug, yog tug kws tsw taug txujkev kws cov tuabneeg limham qha, hab tsw nrug cov tuabneeg muaj txem sawv ua ke, hab tsw nrug cov tuabneeg kws nyam thuaj luas nyob tsawg ua ke.
Qhov kws ua rua nwg zoo sab yog Yawmsaub txuj kevcai, nwg tshawb nrhav Yawmsaub txuj kevcai nruab nub mo ntuj.
Nwg zoo yaam le tug ntoo kws cog rua ntawm ntug dej, txw txwv lawv caij lawv nyoog, cov nplooj tsw tuag tshaav tsw qhuav. Txhua yaam kws nwg ua nwg vaam meej.
Cov tuabneeg limham tsw thooj le ntawd, puab zoo yaam le tej npluag qoob kws cua ntsawj yaa moog.
Cov tuabneeg limham yuav nyob tsw tau rua thaus raug kev teem txem, cov tuabneeg muaj txem yuav tsw nrug cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg sawv ntsug ua ke.
Tsua qhov Yawmsaub saib ntsoov cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg txujkev, tassws cov tuabneeg limham txujkev yuav puam tsuaj.
Vem le caag ib tsoom tebchaws tuav huv faav xeeb, hab tej tuabneeg yuav ntaus tswvyim phem qhuav qhuav?
Tej vaajntxwv huv lub nplajteb npaaj sawv twv, cov kws ua thawj tuav tswvyim ua ke tawm tsaam Yawmsaub hab tug kws raug laub roj tsaa.
“Ca peb ua kuas txuj saw hlau kws ob tug khi peb tu nrho, hab muab txuj hlua kws ob tug zawm peb laim pov tseg.”
Tug kws nyob lub zwm txwv sau ntuj luag puab, Yawmsaub thuaj luag puab cov ntawd.
Nwg has rua puab ua npau tawg quas vog, nwg chim heev ua rua puab ntshai hab has tas,
“Kuv tub tsaa kuv tug vaajntxwv nyob rua sau Xi‑oo, kws yog kuv lub roob dawb huv.”
Kuv yuav has txug Yawmsaub tej lug, nwg has rua kuv tas, “Koj yog kuv tug tub, nub nua kuv yug tau koj lawm.
Ca le thov kuv mas kuv yuav muab ib tsoom tebchaws ua qub txeeg qub teg rua koj, hab muab taag nrho lub nplajteb ua koj teej koj tug.
Koj yuav xuas qws hlau ntaus puab tawg, hab ntsawm puab tawg taag ua tej dwb daim yaam le tej laujkaub aav.”
Vem le nuav tej vaajntxwv 'e, mej ca le ntse, tej thawj kws kaav nplajteb 'e, mej ca le noog lug qhuab ntuag.
Ca le paub ntshai hab ua koom rua Yawmsaub, ca le ntshai tshee quas nyo.

Ca le pe hawm nwg ntshai tsaam nwg chim tes mej puam tsuaj rua huv mej txujkev, tsua qhov nwg txujkev npau tawg tshwm plawg sai kawg. Txhua tug kws lug cawm sav rua huv nwg yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv cov tshawj chim coob kawg le lauj! Muaj tuabneeg coob sawv twv kuv.
Ntau leej saamswm pav txug kuv tas, “Tsw muaj txujkev paab huv Vaajtswv.”
Au Yawmsaub, koj yog daim phaj hlau kws thaiv puag ncig kuv, koj yog kuv lub meej mom hab tsaa kuv lub taubhau ca.
Kuv tsaa suab thov Yawmsaub, mas nwg teb kuv ntawm nwg lub roob kws dawb huv tuaj.
Kuv moog pw hab tsaug zug, kuv tswm dheev lug vem yog Yawmsaub tsom kwm kuv.
Kuv tsw ntshai quas vaam leej tuabneeg kws tawm tsaam kuv vej puag ncig kuv.
Au Yawmsaub, thov sawv tseeg. Au kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov cawm kuv dim. Koj ntaus kuv cov yeeb ncuab suavdawg saab plhu, hab koj luv cov tuabneeg limham kaug nav.
Kev dim nyob ntawm Yawmsaub. Thov koj foom koob moov rua koj cov tuabneeg.
Au Vaajtswv kws tuav kuv txujcai, thaus kuv hu thov koj thov koj teb. Thaus kuv twg kev, koj qheb kev rua kuv. Thov koj hlub kuv, thov noog kuv tej lug thov.
Cov tuabneeg 'e, mej yuav ua rua kuv poob koob meej moog ntev le caag? Mej yuav nyam tej lug tsw tseem ceeb hab xaav tswvyim daag moog ntev le caag?
Ca le paub tseeb tas Yawmsaub tub cais cov tuabneeg kws fwm nwg ca ua nwg tug. Thaus kuv hu thov Yawmsaub nwg kuj noog.
Thaus mej chim tsw xob ua txhum. Thaus mej pw sau txaaj, ca le tshuaj saib mej lub sab hab nyob tuabywv.
Ca le muab hov txhua chaw xyeem lawv le kevcai, hab tso sab rua Yawmsaub.
Muaj tuabneeg coob coob has tas, “Peb xaav pum tej yaam kws zoo.” Au Yawmsaub, thov koj ntsej muag ci ntsaa ab rua peb.
Koj tau pub kev xyiv faab rua huv kuv lub sab ntau dua le kws thaus puab tau qoob hab cawv txwv maab ntau nplua mag.
Kuv yuav qhau cev pw tsaus zug sab tug quas yeeg, vem yog Yawmsaub koj tuab leeg txhad pub tau kuv nyob tso sab quas lug.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj tig ntsej noog kuv tej lug, thov noog kuv lub suab quaj suab ntsaaj.
Kuv tug vaajntxwv hab kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov noog kuv lub suab quaj hu, tsua qhov kuv thov koj xwb.
Au Yawmsaub, taagkig sawv ntxuv koj yeej noog kuv lub suab thov, taagkig sawv ntxuv kuv tsaa kuv lub suab thov hab tog ntsoov.
Koj tsw yog tug Vaajtswv kws zoo sab rua txujkev limham, txujkev phem nrug koj nyob tsw tau le.
Tej tuabneeg khaav theeb sawv tsw tau ntawm koj lub qhov muag, koj ntxub txhua tug kws ua phem.
Koj muab cov kws has lug daag ua kuas puam tsuaj. Yawmsaub ntxub ntxaug tuabneeg noj nyoog hab cov kws daag ntxag.
Vem yog koj txujkev hlub ruaj khov muaj ntau nplua mag, kuv txhad nkaag tau rua huv koj lub tsev. Kuv yuav pe hawm ncaaj rua koj lub tuam tsev kws dawb huv, vem kuv fwm hab paub ntshai koj.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj coj kuv taug koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg. Vem yog kuv muaj yeeb ncuab, thov koj ua koj txujkev ncaaj rua kuv.

Puab lub qhov ncauj tsw muaj ib lu lug tseeb, puab lub sab tsuas yog xaav ua kuas puam tsuaj xwb, puab lub roj paas yog lub qhov ntxaa kws qheb quas lug, puab tug nplaig has lug qaab rog qaab ntse xwb.

Au Vaajtswv, thov ca puab rws puab lub txem, ca puab qaug rua huv puab tej tswvyim phem. Vem tej kev txhum kws puab ua ntau kawg le, thov muab puab laim pov tseg, tsua qhov puab tub faav xeeb rua koj lawm.
Thov ca txhua tug kws cawm sav rua huv koj tau sab xyiv faab, ca puab hu nkauj zoo sab xyiv faab tsw tu le. Thov koj tsom kaav tsom kwm puab, sub cov kws nyam koj lub npe txhad xyiv faab rua huv koj.
Au Yawmsaub, koj foom koob moov rua tug kws ncaaj nceeg, koj muab koj txujkev hlub roog nwg ib yaam nkaus le daim phaj hlau thaiv.
Au Yawmsaub, thaus koj chim thov koj tsw xob tshev kuv, thaus koj npau tawg tsw xob nplawm kuv.
Au Yawmsaub, thov hlub kuv tsua qhov kuv qaug zug zuj quas zug. Au Yawmsaub, thov khu kuv tsua qhov kuv tej pob txhaa tsaug tsaug poob quas nthaav,
hab kuv lub sab txhawj xeeb heev. Au Yawmsaub, koj tseed yuav tog ntev le caag?
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj tig lug cawm kuv txujsa. Vem yog koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov mas thov cawm kuv dim.
Thaus tuag lawd tsw muaj kev ncu txug koj lawm. Nyob huv tub tuag teb leejtwg yuav qhuas tau koj lawm?
Kuv quaj ntsuag txug sav heev lawm, kuv naj mo lug kua muag nyaab kuv lub txaaj pw, kuv quaj quaj ua rua kuv lub chaw pw ntub taag.
Vem yog kev lwj sab kuv qhov muag txhad plooj taag lawm, vem kuv cov tshawj chim huvsw kuv qhov muag txhad dig quas zug lawm.
Mej cov tuabneeg ua phem suavdawg, ca le ncaim kuv moog, tsua qhov Yawmsaub tub noog kuv lub suab quaj lawm.
Yawmsaub tub nov kuv lub suab taij thov, Yawmsaub txais kuv tej lug thov lawm.
Kuv cov yeeb ncuab suavdawg yuav tau txaaj muag hab yuav poob sab nthaav, puab yuav thim rov qaab hab tuab ntsais muag xwb yuav raug kev txaaj muag.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv cawm sav rua huv koj. Thov tso kuv dim txhua tug kws lawv caum kuv, hab cawm kuv,
tsaam tes puab muab kuv dua yaam le tsuv ntxhuav dua, hab muab kuv hai moog tsw muaj leejtwg cawm kuv dim.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv tug Vaajtswv, yog kuv tau ua le nuav, yog kuv txhais teg tau ua txhum,
yog kuv tau ua phem pauj kuv tej kwvluag qhov zoo, lossws yog kuv ca le laam lws kuv cov yeeb ncuab,
tes ca kuv cov yeeb ncuab lawv cuag hab nteg tau kuv, hab ca puab tsuj kuv txujsa rua huv nruab aav, hab muab kuv tug ntsuj plig tso rua huv cov moov aav.
Au Yawmsaub, thov sawv tseeg ua npau tawg quas vog, thov ca le sawv tiv kuv cov yeeb ncuab txujkev chim. Au kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov ca le tswm dheev, koj tub teem swjhawm txav txem lawm.
Ca ib tsoom tuabneeg suavdawg tuaj txoos ua ke nyob puag ncig koj, hab thov koj nyob quas tsawg rua qhov sab sau cov tuabneeg hov.
Yawmsaub txav txem rua ib tsoom tuabneeg. Au Yawmsaub, thov koj txav txem rua kuv lawv le kuv txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab lawv le kuv lub sab dawb paug.

Au Vaajtswv kws yog tug ncaaj nceeg, hab yog tug kws tshuaj tuabneeg txujkev xaav hab tuabneeg lub sab, thov kuas tej kev phem kws cov tuabneeg limham ua pluj taag nrho, hab thov tsaa cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg kuas nyob ruaj khov.
Kuv daim phaj thaiv yog Vaajtswv, kws cawm cov kws sab ncaaj kuas dim.
Vaajtswv yog tug kws txav txem ncaaj nceeg, hab yog tug Vaajtswv kws naj nub chim rua cov tuabneeg txhum.
Yog ib tug twg tsw ntxeev dua sab tshab, Vaajtswv yuav huv nwg raab ntaaj. Nwg tub saam raab neev nti rawv quas loo ca lawm.
Nwg tub npaaj nwg tej cuab yeej kws tua tuabneeg txhwj lawm, nwg ua nwg tej xub neev nti muaj nplaim tawg.
Saib maj, tug tuabneeg limham xeeb txujkev phem, hab suab txujkev limham huv lub plaab hab yug tau tej kev daag.
Nwg khawb qhov taub, nwg kuj poob rua huv tej qhov kws nwg khawb hov.
Nwg txujkev limham rov lug raug nwg taubhau, nwg txujkev ndais ntuj poob lug rua sau nwg taj taubhau.
Kuv yuav ua Yawmsaub tsaug vem nwg kev ncaaj nceeg, hab kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas Yawmsaub kws Luj Dua Ndais lub npe.
Au Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug tswv, koj lub npe muaj fwjchim meej mom luj kawg thoob nplajteb lawm lauj! Koj tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab sau ntuj tub tau lu lug qhuas
ntawm cov mivnyuas yau hab cov mivnyuas mog lub qhov ncauj. Koj tswm lub chaw thaiv koj cov yeeb ncuab, hab tswj kuv cov tshawj chim hab cov kws ua pauj rua kuv.
Thaus kuv tsaa muag saib sau ntuj kws yog koj txhais teg tswm, yog lub hli hab tej nub qub kws koj teeb ca lawd,
mas tuabneeg yog daabtsw es koj ncu txug puab, hab tuabneeg tug tub yog daabtsw es koj mob sab nwg?
Koj tau tswm nwg qeg dua Vaajtswv  mivntswv, hab koj muab meej mom hab koob meej ua mom kub rua nwg ntoo.
Koj muab fwjchim rua nwg tswjfwm txhua yaam kws koj txhais teg tswm, koj muab txhua yaam tso rua huv qaab nwg xwb taw,
yog txhua tug yaaj txhua tug nyuj huvsw hab tej tsaj qus,
tej naag noog sau nruab ntug, hab tej ntseg huv havtxwv, hab txhua yaam kws moog lug huv havtxwv.
Au Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Tswv, koj lub npe muaj fwjchim meej mom luj kawg thoob nplajteb lawm lauj!
Kuv yuav ua Yawmsaub tsaug kawg kuv lub sab, kuv yuav has txug koj tej daag num phemfwj huvsw.
Kuv yuav zoo sab hab xyiv faab rua huv koj. Au Vaajtswv kws Luj Dua Ndais, kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas koj lub npe.
Thaus kuv cov yeeb ncuab thim rov qaab, puab dawm hab puam tsuaj taab meeg ntawm koj xubndag,
tsua qhov koj tuav kuv txujcai kws ncaaj, koj nyob sau lub zwm txwv txav txem ncaaj nceeg.
Koj tub tshev ib tsoom tebchaws, koj tub muab cov tuabneeg limham ua kuas puam tsuaj, koj tub muab puab tej npe thuam tseg ib txhws tsw kawg.
Tej yeeb ncuab puam tsuaj pluj taag moog ib txhws le, puab tej moos koj muab dob hlo pov tseg, hab tsw muaj leejtwg ncu txug puab le lawm.
Yawmsaub nyob sau lub zwm txwv kaav moog ib txhws le, nwg tau tsaa nwg lub zwm txwv lug txav txem.
Nwg txav txem ncaaj nceeg rua lub nplajteb, nwg txav txem ncaaj rua ib tsoom tuabneeg.
Yawmsaub yog lub chaw ruaj khov rua cov tuabneeg kws raug quab yuam, yog lub chaw ruaj khov rua lub swjhawm kws raug ceblaaj.
Au Yawmsaub, cov kws paub koj lub npe kuj tso sab rua koj, vem koj tsw tso cov tuabneeg kws nrhav koj pov tseg le.
Ca le hu nkauj qhuas Yawmsaub kws nyob huv Xi‑oo, ca le pav txug nwg tej num rua huv ib tsoom tuabneeg.
Nwg yog tug tsob caub hab ncu txug puab, nwg tsw nov qaab tug kws raug txom nyem nyuaj sab lub suab hu.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj hlub kuv. Thov tsaa qhov muag saib cov kws ntxub kuv tswm txom kuv le caag. Koj tsaa kuv sawv ntawm lub qhov rooj kev tuag rov lug,
sub kuv txhad pav txug txhua yaam kws tswm nyog qhuas koj, hab kuv txhad zoo sab xyiv faab rua koj txujkev cawm dim rua ntawm Xi‑oo tug ntxhais  rooj loog.
Ib tsoom tebchaws poob rua huv lub qhov taub kws puab khawb ca, hab puab txhais kwtaw maag rooj hlua kws puab cuab ca.
Yawmsaub tub qha nwg rua peb paub, nwg tub txav txem lawm. Cov tuabneeg limham tub maag tej kws puab txhais teg ua.
Cov tuabneeg phem yuav moog rua huv tub tuag teb, yog txhua haiv tuabneeg kws nov qaab Vaajtswv.
Vaajtswv yuav tsw nov qaab cov tuabneeg txom nyem moog le, hab cov tuabneeg pluag txujkev vaam yuav tsw nplaam moog ib txhws.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj ca le sawv tseeg, tsw xob ca tuabneeg kov yeej, ca le txav txem rua ib tsoom tebchaws taab meeg ntawm koj xubndag.
Au Yawmsaub, ca le ua kuas puab ntshai, hab ua kuas ib tsoom tebchaws paub tas puab tsuas yog tuabneeg xwb.
Au Yawmsaub, ua caag koj yuav nyob deb heev? Ua caag koj tswv nraim thaus peb raug kev ceblaaj?
Tug tuabneeg limham khaav quas ntxhas lawv caum cov pluag. Thov ca nwg rov maag tej tswvyim phem kws nwg npaaj rua luas.
Tug tuabneeg limham khaav txug tej kws nwg lub sab ntshaw, tug tuabneeg sab hlub tshev foom hab thuaj Yawmsaub.
Tug tuabneeg limham lub sab khaav theeb tsw nrhav Vaajtswv, nwg tsuas xaav has tas, “Tsw muaj Vaajtswv le.”
Nwg tej num vaam meej rua txhua lub swjhawm. Koj txujkev txav txem nyob sab dhau, nwg lub qhov muag tsw pum le, nwg tsuas yog thuaj luag nwg cov tshawj chim suavdawg.
Nwg xaav huv lub sab tas, “Yuav tsw muaj daabtsw ua rua kuv qaug quas zwg. Moog taag txhua tam kuv yuav tsw raug kev ceblaaj txom nyem le.”
Tej lug tsawm foom, tej lug daag ntxag hab tej lug quab yuam puv nkaus nwg lub qhov ncauj, tej kev limham hab tej kev txhum nyob ntawm nwg tug nplaig.
Nwg zuv kev tog huv tej zej zog, hab nraim cev tua tej tuabneeg tsw txhum. Nwg lub qhov muag nrhav quas nrhw cov kws tsw muaj chaw vaam khom.
Nwg tswv nraim tog ib yaam le tsuv ntxhuav nyob huv lub chaw nraim, nwg zuv tog txhad nteg tau cov tuabneeg pluag, nwg xuas lub vaag cuab tau cov tuabneeg txom nyem nqug moog.
Cov kws tsw muaj chaw vaam khom raug tsuj yuam hab qaug, puab qaug rua huv nwg tug zug.
Nwg xaav huv lub sab tas, “Vaajtswv nov qaab lawm, nwg fee plhu lawm hab yuav tsw pum hlo le.”
Au Yawmsaub, ca le sawv tseeg, au Vaajtswv, ca le tsaa koj txhais teg, thov tsw xob nov qaab tug kws raug kev txom nyem nyuaj sab.
Ua caag tug tuabneeg phem thuaj Vaajtswv, hab has huv lub sab tas, “Koj yuav tsw rob ntawm kuv”?

Koj kuj pum ntaag hab yeej saib ntsoov tej kev txom nyem hab tej kev kub ntxhuv, sub koj txhad tuav rawv tau rua huv koj txhais teg. Tug kws tsw muaj chaw vaam khom muab nwg tug kheej cob rua koj. Koj yog tug kws paab cov mivnyuas ntsuag tsw muaj txwv.
Thov koj luv tug tuabneeg limham hab tug kws ua phem txhais npaab, hab tshawb tej kev limham kws puab ua tawm lug kuas taag huvsw.
Yawmsaub yog vaajntxwv kws nyob moog ib txhws tsw kawg. Lwm haiv tuabneeg yuav puam tsuaj taag huv nwg lub tebchaws moog.
Au Yawmsaub, koj yuav mob sab rua cov tuabneeg kws tsw muab hlub txujkev ntshaw, koj yuav txhawb puab lub sab tug zug hab tig ntsej noog puab tej lug,
txhad tsaa tau cov mivnyuas kws tsw muaj txwv hab cov kws raug quab yuam txujcai, sub tej tuabneeg nplajteb txhad tsw ua rua puab ntshai dua le lawm.
Kuv moog cawm sav rua huv Yawmsaub. Ua le caag mej tseed has rua kuv tas, “Ca le tswv moog rua peg tej roob yaam le tej naag noog,
tsua qhov tas cov tuabneeg phem tub saam neev nti hab nruab xub rua ntawm txuj hlua lawm, puab moog zuv huv qhov tsaus ntuj tua cov tuabneeg kws sab ncaaj.
Yog tej kevcai puam tsuaj taag lawm mas cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav ua tau daabtsw?”
Yawmsaub nyob huv nwg lub tuam tsev kws dawb huv, Yawmsaub lub zwm txwv nyob sau ntuj ceeb tsheej. Nwg lub qhov muag saib ib tsoom tuabneeg hab nwg lub ntsab muag tshuaj puab.
Yawmsaub tshuaj saib cov kws ncaaj nceeg hab cov kws limham. Nwg lub sab ntxub cov kws nyam ua limham ndais ntuj.
Nwg yuav nchuav cub thee kws cig quas plawg hab tej lawj faaj rua sau cov tuabneeg limham. Hab tu cov cua kws kub kub ca ua lub khuab rua puab.
Tsua qhov Yawmsaub yog tug ncaaj nceeg, mas nwg nyam tej daag num kws ncaaj nceeg. Cov tuabneeg ncaaj yuav tau pum Yawmsaub tim ntsej tim muag.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj paab, vem tsw tshuav cov tuabneeg kws fwm koj lawm, hab cov kws xwb rua koj pluj taag huv ib tsoom tuabneeg lawm
Txhua tug daag kwvtij zej zog, puab ncauj qaab rog nplaig qaab ntse hab muaj ob lub sab.
Thov Yawmsaub txav txhua tug lub qhov ncauj qaab rog, hab tug nplaig khaav theeb heev hov pov tseg,
yog cov kws has tas, “Peb tug nplaig yuav kov yeej xwb, peb lub qhov ncauj yog peb le. Leejtwg yuav kaav tau peb?”

Yawmsaub has tas, “Kuv yuav sawv tseeg taamswm nuav, tsua qhov tug pluag raug quab yuam hab tug txom nyem quaj ntsaaj quas lawg. Kuv yuav tso puab rua huv qhov chaw kws nyob tso sab plhuav kws puab ntshaw moog nyob.”
Yawmsaub tej lug cog tseg yog tej lug kws dawb huv, zoo le cov tseem nyaj kws muab hlawv huv cub thee kws nyob huv peg teb, yog cov tseem nyaj kws muab nchuav xyaa zag.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj tsom kwm peb, thov tiv thaiv kuas peb dim cov tuabneeg tam nuav.
Cov tuabneeg phem ncig moog ncig lug ntawm peb txhua faab, rua thaus ib tsoom tuabneeg qhuas ntxhas kev phem kev qas.
Au Yawmsaub, tseed tshuav ntev le caag? Koj yuav nov qaab kuv moog ib txhws le lov? Koj yuav fee plhu ntawm kuv ntev le caag?
Kuv lub sab pheej yuav xaav txug tej nuav, hab yuav naj nub lwj sab moog ntev le caag? Kuv tug yeeb ncuab yuav kov yeej kuv moog ntev le caag?
Au kuv tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, thov koj tshuaj saib hab teb kuv lauj. Thov koj pub kuv lub qhov muag rov pum kev, ntshai tsaam kuv ca le tsaug zug rua huv txujkev tuag,
hab kuv tug yeeb ncuab yuav has tas, “Kuv kov yeej nwg lawm,” hab kuv cov tshawj chim yuav zoo sab xyiv faab vem kuv qaug quas zwg lawm.
Tassws kuv tso sab rua koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov, kuv lub sab xyiv faab qhov kws koj cawm kuv dim.
Kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas Yawmsaub, vem yog nwg ua zoo kawg rua kuv.
Cov tuabneeg ruag xaav huv lub sab tas, “Tsw muaj Vaajtswv.” Puab lub sab phem kawg le hab puab ua tej kws qas vuab tsuab, tsw muaj ib tug ua zoo le.
Yawmsaub saib sau ntuj tuaj rua tuabneeg nplajteb, saib puas yuav muaj ib tug twg kws ntse hab nrhav Vaajtswv.
Puab txhua tug yuam kev taag, hab puab lub sab phem taag huvsw ib yaam nkaus, tsw muaj ib tug ua zoo, tsw muaj hlo le.
Txhua tug kws ua phem tsw paub lov, yog cov kws noj kuv haiv tuabneeg yaam le noj ncuav, hab tsw taij thov Yawmsaub?
Puab yuav ntshai kawg ua sab puag tsug, tsua qhov Vaajtswv nrug nraim cov tuabneeg kws ncaaj nceeg nyob.
Mej npaaj rhuav tshem cov tuabneeg pluag daim hom phaj, tassws Yawmsaub ua puab lub chaw cawm sav.
Xaav kuas muaj kev cawm dim tshwm huv Xi‑oo tuaj rua cov Yixayee. Thaus Yawmsaub pub nwg haiv tuabneeg rov vaam meej le qub, Yakhauj yuav xyiv faab, Yixayee yuav zoo sab.
Au Yawmsaub, leejtwg yuav nyob huv koj lub tsev ntaub? Leejtwg yuav moog nyob sau koj lub roob dawb huv?
Yog tug kws ua lub neej tsw muaj chaw thuaj hab ua raug cai, hab has lug tseeb tuaj nruab sab.
Nwg tsw swv nwg tug nplaig xyaav luas, nwg tsw ua phem rua nwg tej phoojywg, hab tsw thuaj kwvtij zej zog.
Nwg lub qhov muag saib tsw taug tug kws ua phem ua qas, nwg muab koob meej rua tug kws paub ntshai Yawmsaub. Yog nwg cog lug twv lawm txawm yog yuav poob daabtsw kuj xwj nwg tsw hloov lug le.
Nwg tsw tsub paaj nyag rua cov kws qev txais, nwg tsw yuav nyaj xab nas tug kws tsw txhum cai. Tug kws ua tej nuav yuav nyob ruaj, tsw ua zug moog ib txhws.
Au Vaajtswv, thov koj tsom kwm kuv ca, tsua qhov kuv lug cawm sav rua huv koj.
Kuv has rua Yawmsaub tas, “Koj yog kuv tug Tswv, dhau koj lawm kuv tsw muaj ib yaam daabtsw kws zoo le.”
Cov tuabneeg dawb huv huv lub tebchaws yog cov kws tswm txaj, yog cov kws kuv zoo sab hlo rua puab.
Cov kws xaiv lwm tug timtswv, yuav muaj kev lwj sab ntau zuj zug. Kuv yuav tsw laub ntshaav xyeem rua tej timtswv hov, kuv daim tawv ncauj yuav tsw tuav tej timtswv hov lub npe.
Yawmsaub yog kuv teej kuv tug hab yog lub khob kws kuv yuav haus. Koj tuav rawv tej kws yog kuv feem ca.
Kuv nrwm teb raug rua thaaj kws zoo kawg, kuv tau tej qub txeeg qub teg kws zoo heev kawg.
Kuv qhuas Yawmsaub kws taw qha kuv. Tsaus ntuj kuv lub sab kuj qhuab ntuag kuv.
Kuv muab Yawmsaub tso rua ntawm kuv lub hauv ntej tsw tu le. Vem nwg nyob ntawm kuv saab xws kuv txhad tsw ua zug.
Vem le hov kuv lub sab txhad xyiv faab hab kuv tug ntsuj plig zoo sab, kuv lub cev txhad le nyob tso sab plhuav.
Tsua qhov koj tsw tau muab kuv cob rua huv tub tuag teb, lossws ca tug kws fwm koj pum lub qhov tuag.
Koj qha txujkev kws tau txujsa rua kuv paub, muaj kev zoo sab xyiv faab puv npo rua ntawm koj lub xubndag, muaj kev zoo sab moog ib txhws nyob huv koj txhais teg xws.
Au Yawmsaub, thov tig ntsej noog tej lug kws kuv teev ncaaj nceeg, hab noog kuv lub suab hu. Thov tig ntsej noog kuv lub qhov ncauj lu lug thov kws tsw muaj ib lus daag le.
Thov koj tu kuas kuv ua tug kws muaj cai, thov koj tsaa muag saib qhov kws ncaaj nceeg.
Yog koj tshuaj saib kuv lub sab hab tuaj saib kuv mo ntuj, yog koj swm kuv lawd koj yuav tsw pum ib qho phem nyob huv kuv le, kuv lub qhov ncauj kuj tsw has ib lus txhum.
Tej num kws tuabneeg ua mas vem muaj koj tej lug kws tawm huv koj qhov ncauj kuv txhad tsw ua lawv le cov tuabneeg limham ndais ntuj ua.
Kuv txhais kwtaw txhad le taug nraim koj txujkev, kuv txhais kwtaw tsw nplaam le.
Au Vaajtswv, kuv thov hu koj, tsua qhov koj yuav teb kuv tej lug thov. Thov tig ntsej noog kuv, noog kuv tej lug thov.
Thov koj ua koj txujkev hlub ruaj khov kws phemfwj kawg tshwm lug. Koj yog tug kws cawm cov tuabneeg kws nrhav chaw cawm sav ntawm puab tej yeeb ncuab rua ntawm koj saab xws.
Thov tsom kwm kuv yaam nkaus le tsom kwm lub ntsab muag, thov nthuav koj le kauj tis roog kuv,
kuas dim tau cov tuabneeg limham kws ua kuas kuv puam tsuaj hab dim tau kuv tej yeeb ncuab kws vej kuv xaav tua kuv.
Puab tsw muaj lub sab khuvleej, puab lub qhov ncauj has lug khaav theeb xwb.
Puab taug kuv neev taw, nwgnuav puab vej puag ncig kuv lawm, puab soj kuv xaav muab kuv nrum rua huv aav.
Puab zoo yaam nkaus le tug tsuv ntxhuav kws xaav xaav dua nqaj, zoo yaam nkaus le tug thaav tsuv ntxhuav kws zuv kev tog tum.
Au Yawmsaub, ca le sawv tseeg, tawm tsaam puab, muab puab qhau. Thov koj swv koj raab ntaaj tso kuv txujsa dim ntawm cov tuabneeg limham.

Au Yawmsaub, thov koj txhais teg cawm kuv dim ntawm cov tuabneeg kws puab le feem yog nyob huv nplajteb nuav xwb. Thov ca puab tej plaab saws tej kws koj tau khaws ca rua puab lawd kuas puv nkaus, thov kuas puab tej tub ki tau saws ntau tshaaj plawg hab tseed tshuav rua puab tej mivnyuas yau saws hab.
Kuv tug kheej mas kuv yuav pum koj lub ntsej muag vem kuv txujkev ncaaj nceeg, thaus kuv tswm lug kuv yuav txaus sab tsua qhov kws pum koj tug yaam ntxwv lawm.
Au Yawmsaub kws yog kuv tug zug, kuv hlub koj.

Yawmsaub yog kuv txhwb zeb, yog kuv lub chaw ruaj khov yog tug kws tso kuv dim, yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, yog txhwb zeb kws kuv lug nraim cev, yog kuv daim phaj hlau, yog txwm kub kws cawm kuv dim, yog kuv lub chaw ruaj khov.
Kuv hu rua Yawmsaub tug kws tswm nyog qhuas, mas kuv txhad dim huv cov yeeb ncuab lug.
Txuj hlua kws yog kev tuag vej nkaus kuv, txujkev puam tsuaj nyaab hlo kuv,
kuv maag txuj hlua kws cuab huv tub tuag teb lawm, rooj ntxab kws yog kev tuag nyob ntawm kuv xubndag.
Thaus kuv raug kev txom nyem kuv thov hu Yawmsaub, kuv quaj thov kuv tug Vaajtswv paab kuv. Nwg nyob huv nwg lub tuam tsev nov kuv lub suab, kuv tej lug thov nrov moog txug nwg qhov ntsej.
Lub nplajteb tseeg quas nkawg ua zug quas kais, tej laag zeb kws tag tej roob kuj ndua quas ntxag hab ua zug quas kais vem yog Yawmsaub chim.
Paa tawg tawm huv Yawmsaub qhov ntswg lug, hab tej nplaim tawg kub ceev tawm ntawm nwg qhov ncauj lug, thee kuj cig quas plawg tawm lug.
Nwg qheb rooj ntug nqeg lug, ntuj tsaus quas nti huv qaab nwg kwtaw.
Nwg caij ib tug Khelunpee hab yaa moog yaa lug. Nwg swv cua ua kauj tis lug sai sai.
Nwg muab qhov tsaus ntuj lug vej puag ncig nwg, cov fuab tsaus tsaus vem yog muaj dej ua lub kaus roog nwg.
Muaj lawg hab thee ci ci tawm huv qhov kaaj kws nyob ntawm nwg xubndag moog tshaab plawg cov fuab moog.
Yawmsaub ua xub nrov tseeg quas nkawg sau ntuj, tug kws Luj Dua Ndais ua suab nrov.
Nwg tua nwg raab xub ua rua puab tswv taag, nwg tso tsag lig xub lawv puab tswv tawg ua saab ua sua moog.
Mas txhad le pum havtxwv ti nkaus qaab thu, hab pum taag nrho tej taw kws tag lub nplajteb nuav, rua thaus Yawmsaub koj tshev hab tshuab tej paa tawm huv koj qhov ntswg lug.
Yawmsaub cev teg sau ntuj tuaj ntsab nkaus kuv, nwg nqug kuv tawm huv cov dej tub tub.
Nwg cawm kuv dim kuv cov yeeb ncuab kws muaj zug hab dim cov tuabneeg kws ntxub kuv tsua qhov puab muaj zug luj dua kuv.
Nub kws kuv raug kev txom nyem ceblaaj mas puab ca le tuaj tawm tsaam kuv, tassws Yawmsaub ua kuv lub chaw tag taw.
Nwg coj kuv tawm moog nyob huv lub chaw daav, nwg tso kuv dim vem nwg zoo sab xyiv faab rua kuv.
Yawmsaub pub moov zoo rua kuv lawv le kuv txujkev ncaaj nceeg. Yawmsaub pauj rua kuv lawv le kuv txhais teg dawb huv.
Kuv taug nraim Yawmsaub txujkev hab kuv tsw tau ua qhov phem es tso kuv tug Vaajtswv tseg.
Tsua qhov nwg tej kevcai huvsw nyob ntawm kuv xubndag hab kuv tsw tau muab nwg tej kaab ke tso tseg le.
Kuv tsw muaj ib qho chaw thuaj rua ntawm nwg xubndag, hab kuv tswjfwm kuv tug kheej tsw ua txhum.
Vem le nuav Yawmsaub txhad pauj rua kuv lawv le kuv txujkev ncaaj nceeg, hab lawv le nwg pum kuv txhais teg dawb huv.
Yawmsaub, koj ua ncaaj rua tug kws xwb rua koj, koj ua koj txujkev zoo kawg nkaus tshwm rua tug kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj le.
Koj ua koj txujkev dawb huv tshwm rua tug kws ua dawb huv, koj ua txujkev nkhaus tshwm rua tug kws sab nkhaus.
Koj tso cov tuabneeg kws txu fwjchim dim, tassws koj tsom ntsoov ua rua cov kws khaav theeb poob qeg.
Koj yog tug kws taws kuv lub teeb. Yawmsaub kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv ua rua kuv qhov tsaus ntuj pum kev.
Yog koj paab, kuv yeej ntaus tau ib paab tub rog, yog kuv tug Vaajtswv paab kuv txhad caws qa hlaa tau ntsaa loog.
Tug Vaajtswv nuav, mas nwg txujkev zoo kawg nkaus, Yawmsaub lu lug cog tseg yeej muaj tseeb. Nwg yog daim phaj hlau thaiv txhua tug kws tuaj cawm sav rua huv nwg.
Leejtwg yog Vaajtswv, tsuas yog Yawmsaub xwb? Leejtwg ua txhwb zeb, tsuas yog peb tug Vaajtswv xwb?
Vaajtswv yog tug kws muab zug rua kuv naav hab ua rua txujkev kws kuv taug tso sab plhuav.
Nwg ua rua kuv txhais kwtaw zoo yaam nkaus le kwtaw maum muas lwj, hab nwg tso kuv nyob tso sab plhuav sau tej roob sab.
Nwg cob kuv txhais teg kuas txawj ua rog, kuv txhais npaab txhad nqug tau neev nti tooj lab.
Koj pub daim phaj hlau kws yog txujkev cawm dim rua kuv, hab koj txhais teg xws tuav rawv kuv hab koj nqeg lug paab ua rua kuv hlub tuaj.
Koj pub kuv taug txujkev daav hab kuv txhais taw tsw nplaam.
Kuv lawv cuag kuv cov yeeb ncuab, kuv tsw thim rov qaab moog txug thaus muab puab ua puam tsuaj taag.
Kuv ntaus puab ntsoog taag puab txhad sawv tsw taug, puab qaug rua ntawm kuv kwtaw.
Koj muab zug sa ntawm kuv duav moog ua rog. Koj ua rua kuv cov yeeb ncuab qaug khwb taag nrho ntawm kuv xubndag.
Koj ua rua kuv cov yeeb ncuab thim tswv tig nraus qaum rua kuv, hab cov kws ntxub kuv mas kuv ua kuas puam tsuaj taag.
Puab thov kuas paab los tsw muaj leejtwg cawm tau puab dim, puab hu thov Yawmsaub tassws nwg tsw teb puab.
Kuv muab puab tsoo mog quas nyoos yaam le moov aav rua cua ntsawj, kuv muab puab laim pov tseg yaam le tej aav nplaum ntawm ntug kev.
Koj cawm kuv dim qhov kws nrug tej tuabneeg sws txeeb. Koj tsaa kuv ua ib tsoom tuabneeg tug thawj, tej tuabneeg kws kuv tsw tau paub dua los kuj zwm rua kuv.
Thaus puab tau nov txug kuv puab kuj noog kuv lug, lwm haiv tuabneeg kuj tuaj pe khwb nkaus rua ntawm kuv.
Lwm haiv tuabneeg poob sab taag, hab tawm huv puab lub chaw ruaj khov ua ib ce tshee quas nyo lug.
Yawmsaub yeej muaj txujsa nyob. Ca le qhuas kuv txhwb zeb, ca le txhawb nqaa tug Vaajtswv kws cawm kuv dim,
yog tug Vaajtswv kws paab kuv pauj taub hab yuam tej tuabneeg nyob rua huv qaab kuv kev tswjfwm,
hab cawm kuv dim ntawm kuv cov yeeb ncuab. Koj yog tug kws tsaa kuv sawv sab dua cov kws tawm tsaam kuv. Koj tub tso kuv dim ntawm cov tuabneeg limham ndais ntuj.
Au Yawmsaub, vem le nuav kuv txhad qhuas ntxhas koj rua huv ib tsoom tebchaws, hab hu nkauj qhuas koj lub npe.
Yawmsaub pub kev kov yeej luj rua nwg tug vaajntxwv, nwg ua nwg txujkev hlub ruaj khov tshwm rua tug kws nwg laub roj tsaa ca lawd, yog Tavi hab nwg caaj ceg moog ib txhws.
Lub ntuj qha Vaajtswv tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab tshwm lug, lub qaab ntuj qha kuas pum tej num kws nwg txhais teg ua.
Ib nub has lug ntau qha rua ib nub paub, ib mos pav qhov kws paub Vaajtswv rua ib mos.
Tsw muaj suab nrov, kuj tsw muaj lug has, tsw muaj leejtwg noog ntuj lub suab,
tassws lub suab ntuj tub nrov nchaa moog thoob lub nplajteb lawm, hab tej lug kuj moog kawg qaab ntuj. Vaajtswv tsaa ib lub tsev rua lub nub nyob hov ntawd,
lub nub tawm tuaj yaam le tug nraug vauv tawm huv nwg chaav tsev lug, hab dha moog taug nwg txujkev moog zoo sab xyiv faab hlo yaam le tug hluas kws muaj zug.
Lub nub tawm ib saab qaab ntuj kawg moog txug rua ib saab qaab ntuj kawg, tsw muaj ib yaam daabtsw yuav nraim tau qhov kws lub nub kub.
Yawmsaub txuj kevcai zoo txhua faab, txhawb tau tug ntsuj plig, Yawmsaub tej lug qha tso sab tau, ua rua tug kws tsw paub taab muaj tswvyim.
Yawmsaub txujkev tswjfwm raug cai, ua rua lub sab xyiv faab, Yawmsaub tej lug nkaw dawb huv, ua rua lub qhov muag pum kev tseeb.
Qhov kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub yog qhov kws zoo tshaaj, nyob ruaj moog ib txhws. Yawmsaub tej kevcai muaj tseeb hab ncaaj nceeg kawg nkaus.
Tej kevcai ntxwm ntshaw heev dua le kub, heev dua le tej tseem kub ntau, qaab zwb dua zwb ntaab, qaab zwb dua tej zwb ntaab kws nrug ntawm lub tsev ntaab lug,
hab yog tej kws qhuab ntuag koj tug qhev. Qhov kws tuav rawv tej lug nuav kuj tau yeeb koob luj kawg.
Tassws leejtwg yuav pum nwg txujkev txhum? Thov koj ntxuav kuv tej kev txhum kws kuv tsw paub.
Thov koj tswj koj tug qhev kuas tsw xob mom swm ua txhum, thov tsw xob ca txujkev txhum hov yuam tau kuv, kuv txhad tsw muaj chaw thuaj hab dim txujkev txhum luj.
Au Yawmsaub kws yog kuv txhwb zeb hab yog tug kws txhwv kuv, thov ca tej lug huv kuv lub qhov ncauj hab tej kev xaav huv kuv lub sab yog tej kws koj pum zoo.
Thov Yawmsaub teb koj rua nub kws raug ceblaaj. Thov Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv lub npe tsom kaav tsom kwm koj.
Thov nwg tso kev paab tawm huv lub tuam tsev tuaj paab koj, hab tso nwg kev txhawb zug tawm huv Xi‑oo tuaj.
Thov nwg ncu txug tej kws koj muab xyeem huvsw hab txaus sab rua tej kws koj muab hlawv xyeem.
Thov Yawmsaub pub rua koj lawv le koj lub sab ntshaw, hab ua rua tej kws koj xaav tseg lawm tav huvsw.
Mas peb txhad tau tsaa suab qw xyiv faab tsua qhov kws koj kov yeej, hab tuav peb tug Vaajtswv lub npe tsaa peb tej chij. Thov Yawmsaub pub kuas koj lu lug thov tav huvsw.
Nwgnuav kuv paub tseeb tas Yawmsaub yuav paab tug kws nwg laub roj tsaa lawd, Yawmsaub nyob qhov chaw dawb huv sau ntuj ceeb tsheej teb nwg, hab nwg txhais teg xws yuav paab nwg kov yeej luj kawg le.
Ib txha khaav txug tsheb ua rog, ib txha khaav txug neeg, tassws peb le peb khaav txug Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv lub npe.
Puab yuav dawm qaug, tassws peb yuav sawv tseeg nyob ruaj nreeg.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj paab vaajntxwv kov yeej. Thov koj paab peb rua thaus peb thov.
Au Yawmsaub, vaajntxwv xyiv faab rua tug zug kws koj pub, nwg zoo sab xyiv faab heev tsua qhov kws koj paab.
Koj pub lawv le nwg lub sab ntshaw, hab tsw nkaum teg rua tej kws nwg lub qhov ncauj thov.
Tsua qhov koj coj koob moov zoo lug ntswb nwg, koj muab lub mom vaajntxwv kws tseem kub ua rua nwg ntoo sau taubhau.
Nwg thov txujsa mas koj kuj pub rua nwg, tau sav luj sav ntev moog ib txhws tsw kawg.
Nwg lub koob meej luj vem yog koj paab, koj pub nwg muaj meej thawb hab fwjchim meej mom.
Koj yeej pub kuas nwg tau koob moov moog ib txhws, hab pub rua nwg tau zoo sab xyiv faab vem koj nrug nraim nwg.
Vaajntxwv tso sab rua Yawmsaub. Vem muaj tug kws Luj Dua Ndais txujkev hlub ruaj khov mas vaajntxwv yuav nyob ruaj tsw ua zug.
Vaajntxwv, koj txhais teg yuav nteg tau koj cov yeeb ncuab huvsw, koj txhais teg xws yuav nteg tau cov kws ntxub koj.
Thaus koj tshwm plawg lug koj yuav ua rua puab kub nyab cuag le nyob huv qhov txus. Yawmsaub yuav nqog hlo puab ua npau tawg quas vog, hab suavtawg yuav hlawv puab puam tsuaj taag.
Koj yuav ua rua puab tej tub ki puam tsuaj taag huv nplajteb hab muab puab caaj ceg ua tu noob nrho huv ib tsoom tuabneeg.
Txawm yog puab ntaus tswvyim phem rua koj hab puab xaav tej zaaj phem los puab yuav ua tsw tau kuas tav.
Tsua qhov koj yuav ua rua puab tswv moog, koj yuav twb neev ncaaj nkaus rua puab ntsej muag.
Au Yawmsaub, peb txhawb nqaa koj tug zug, peb yuav hu nkauj hab qhuas koj tug fwjchim.
Au kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv tug Vaajtswv 'e, ua caag koj tso kuv tseg lawm? Ua caag koj nyob deb tsw paab kuv, tsw noog tej lug kws kuv quaj ntsaaj quas lawg?
Au kuv tug Vaajtswv, nruab nub kuv quaj thov koj, koj kuj tsw teb, mo ntuj kuv thov los tsw tau lub sab tug le.
Txawm le caag los koj yog tug dawb huv, koj ua vaajntxwv nyob sau cov Yixayee lu lug qhuas.
Peb tej laug tso sab rua koj, puab tso sab mas koj tso puab dim.
Puab quaj thov koj, puab txhad tau txais kev cawm dim, puab tso sab rua koj, puab txhad tsw nplaam tej kws puab vaam.
Kuv yog ib tug kaas xwb, tsw yog tuabneeg, tej tuabneeg ntxub kuv, ib tsoom pejxeem kuj saib tsw taug kuv.
Txhua tug kws pum kuv thuaj luag kuv, zwg ncauj cu hau quas nyo rua kuv has tas,
“Nwg muab nwg tug kheej cob rua Yawmsaub, ca Yawmsaub paab nwg dim los maj. Ca Yawmsaub cawm nwg tsua qhov Yawmsaub txaus sab rua nwg.”
Txawm le ntawd, los koj yog tug kws coj kuv tawm huv nam lub plaab lug, hab pub kuv nyob tso sab plhuav rua huv nam lub xubndag.
Txwj thaus yug lug kuv yeej vaam koj, koj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv txwj thaus kuv nyob huv nruab thab.
Thov koj tsw xob nyob deb ntawm kuv, vem yog kev ceblaaj nyob ze kuv hab tsw muaj leejtwg paab hlo le.
Muaj txwv nyuj coob vej kuv, yog cov txwv nyuj muaj zug huv Npasaa nyob puag ncig kuv.
Puab rua ncauj luj rua kuv yaam nkaus le tsuv ntxhuav tum dua nyooj quas lawg.
Kuv raug muab nchuav yaam le dej, kuv tej pob txhaa huvsw kuj pluam taag. Kuv lub sab zoo le cab ntaab yaaj taag rua huv kuv hauv sab.
Kuv tug zug sem taag qhuav yaam le tej txhais laujkaub aav. Kuv tug nplaig lu rua ntawm txhaa puab tsaig lawm. Koj muab kuv tso rua huv tej moov aav kws yog txujkev tuag.
Yeej muaj dev vej quas vog kuv, ib paab tuabneeg phem nyob vej kuv, puab nkaug kuv xwb teg hab kuv xwb taw.
Kuv suav tau kuv tej pob txhaa huvsw. Puab saib ntsa ntsoov hab nyos luag kuv.
Puab muab kuv tej rwg tsho faib, kuv lub tsho puab muab ua ntawv rhu.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj tsw xob nyob deb, au koj kws paab kuv, thov maaj nroog tuaj paab kuv lauj!
Thov cawm kuv tug ntsuj plig dim nav ntaaj, hab cawm kuv txujsa dim ntawm tej dev tug zug.
Thov cawm kuv dim huv tsuv ntxhuav lub qhov ncauj, hab cawm kuv dim ntawm cov txwv nyuj qus tej kub.
Kuv yuav has txug koj lub npe rua kuv cov kwvtij paub. Kuv yuav qhuas koj rua thaus ib tsoom tuabneeg tuaj txoos ua ke.
Mej cov kws paub ntshai Yawmsaub, ca le qhuas nwg. Yakhauj caaj ceg suavdawg, mej ca le ua rua nwg tau koob meej. Yixayee caaj ceg suavdawg, mej ca le fwm nwg.
Tsua qhov nwg tsw tau saib tsw taug hab ntxub cov kws txom nyem tej kev nyuaj sab. Nwg tsw fee plhu ntawm puab hab thaus puab quaj thov nwg, nwg kuj nov.
Kuv tej lug qhuas koj rua thaus cov tuabneeg coob coob tuaj txoos ua ke kuj yog koj pub. Kuv yuav pauj tej kws yeem lug lawd taab meeg cov kws paub ntshai koj.
Cov tuabneeg raug txom nyem nyuaj sab yuav tau noj tsau npo. Cov kws nrhav Yawmsaub yuav tau qhuas nwg. Thov ca mej kaaj sab quas lug moog ib txhws.
Thoob plawg huv lub nplajteb yuav ncu ntsoov hab tig lug rua ntawm Yawmsaub, hab txhua haiv tuabneeg huv ib tsoom tebchaws yuav pe hawm rua ntawm nwg lub xubndag.
Tsua qhov Yawmsaub muaj fwjchim tswjfwm, hab nwg kaav ib tsoom tebchaws.
Cov tuabneeg khaav theeb huv lub nplajteb suavdawg yuav pe nwg. Cov kws moog rua huv qhov tuag suavdawg yuav pe hawm nwg, puab yog cov kws tuav tsw tau txujsa nyob lawm.
Cov tuabneeg kws yuav tshwm lug yaav tom qaab yuav ua koom rua nwg. Tej tuabneeg yuav has txug tug Tswv rua tam tuabneeg tom qaab noog,
hab tshaaj tawm nwg txujkev cawm dim rua cov tuabneeg kws tsw tau yug lug paub tas nwg ua nwg tej num hov lawm.
Yawmsaub yug kuv yaam le yug yaaj, kuv yuav tsw tu pluag.
Nwg pub kuv pw huv lub tshaav zaub mog ntsuab ntsuab, nwg coj kuv moog rua ntawm ntug dej kws nyob ntsag quas tu.
Nwg txhawb kuv tug ntsuj plig rov muaj zug, nwg coj kuv taug txujkev ncaaj nceeg vem yog saib rua nwg lub npe.
Txawm yog kuv moog huv lub haav tsaus ntuj quas nti kws yog txujkev tuag, los kuv tsw ntshai xwm txheej phem daabtsw, vem koj nrug nraim kuv. Koj tug paas nreg hab koj tug cwj nplig kuv lub sab.
Koj npaaj lub rooj mov rua kuv taab meeg kuv cov yeeb ncuab. Koj laub roj foom moov rua sau kuv taubhau, kuv lub khob puv phwj yog.
Txujkev zoo hab txujkev hlub yeej yuav nrug nraim kuv moog taag kuv swm neej. Kuv yuav nyob huv Yawmsaub lub tuam tsev moog ib txhws.
Lub nplajteb hab txhua yaam kws nyob huv yog Yawmsaub le, taag nrho lub qaab ntuj hab txhua tug kws nyob huv yog nwg le.
Nwg tswm lub nplajteb rua sau dej havtxwv, hab muab txawb rua sau cov dej.
Leejtwg yuav nce moog rua sau Yawmsaub lub roob? Hab leejtwg yuav sawv rua huv nwg lub chaw dawb huv?
Yog tug kws txhais teg huv hab lub sab dawb huv, tsw tso sab rua tej cuav timtswv, hab tsw cog lug daag.
Nwg yuav tau Yawmsaub le koob moov, hab Vaajtswv kws cawm nwg dim yuav tsaa nwg cai.
Cov kws zoo le nuav yog cov tuabneeg kws nrhav Yawmsaub, kws yog nrhav Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv lub ntsej muag.
Tej rooj loog 'e, ca le tsaa mej lub taubhau sawv, tej txhwb qhov rooj kws nyob ib txwm 'e, ca le sawv, sub tug vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa ab txhad tau nkaag lug.
Tug vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa ab yog leejtwg? Tub yog Yawmsaub kws muaj zug hab muaj fwjchim luj, hab yog Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim ua rog.
Tej rooj loog 'e, ca le tsaa mej lub taubhau sawv, tej txhwb qhov rooj kws nyob ib txwm 'e, ca le sawv, sub tug vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa ab txhad tau nkaag lug.
Tug vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa ab yog leejtwg? Yog Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, nwg yog tug vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa ab.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv muab hlo kuv lub sab rua koj.
Au kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv tso sab rua koj. Thov tsw xob ca kuv raug txaaj muag, tsw xob ca kuv cov yeeb ncuab nyos luag kuv.
Thov tsw xob ca ib tug twg kws tog rawv koj raug txaaj muag hlo le. Ca cov kws mom swm faav xeeb rua koj poob ntsej muag.
Au Yawmsaub, thov ua rua kuv paub koj txujkev, thov qha koj tej kev rua kuv paub taug.
Thov koj coj kuv taug koj txujkev tseeb hab qhuab qha kuv vem koj yog tug Vaajtswv kws cawm kuv dim. Kuv tog rawv koj taag naj taag nub.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj ncu txug koj txujkev khuvleej hab koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov, vem yog tej nuav tub muaj thau u lug lawm.
Thov tsw xob ncu txug tej kev txhum hab tej kev faav xeeb kws thaus kuv tseed hluas es kuv ua. Au Yawmsaub, vem koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov hab koj txujkev zoo, thov ncu txug kuv.
Yawmsaub yog tug kws zoo kawg hab ncaaj nceeg, nwg txhad qhuab qha nwg txujkev rua cov tuabneeg txhum.
Nwg coj tug kws txu fwjchim moog qhov kws raug cai, hab qha nwg txujkev rua tug txu lub sab qeg qeg.
Yawmsaub tej kev huvsw yog txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov hab tso sab tau, rua txhua tug kws tuav rawv nwg tej lug cog tseg hab nwg tej lug qha.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj saib rua koj lub npe es zaam kuv lub txem tsua qhov lub txem hov luj heev.
Leejtwg yog tug kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub? Yawmsaub yuav qhuab qha tug hov rua huv txujkev kws tswm nyog nwg xaiv.
Nwg yuav tau nyob vaam meej heev, hab nwg tej tub ki yuav tau lub tebchaws ua puab teej puab tug.
Yawmsaub yuav nrug cov kws paub ntshai nwg ua phoojywg, hab nwg qha nwg tej lug cog tseg rua puab paub.
Kuv lub qhov muag pheej saib ntsoov rua Yawmsaub, tsua qhov nwg rhu kuv txhais kwtaw dim huv txuj hlua cuab.
Thov koj tig hlub kuv, tsua qhov kuv nyob twm kawv hab raug kev txom nyem nyuaj sab.
Thov paab kuv tej kev nyuaj sab kuas pluj, coj kuv tawm huv txujkev ntxhuv sab.
Thov tshuaj saib kuv tej kev txom nyem hab kev ceblaaj, hab daws kuv lub txem huvsw pov tseg.
Thov tshuaj saib kuv cov tshawj chim muaj coob npaum twg, hab puab ntxub kuv heev npaum le caag.
Thov tsom kwm kuv txujsa hab cawm kuv, tsw xob ca kuv raug txaaj muag vem yog kuv cawm sav rua huv koj.
Thov txujkev dawb huv hab txujkev ncaaj nceeg tuav kuv ca, vem kuv tog rawv koj.
Au Vaajtswv, thov txhwv cov Yixayee dim puab tej kev ceblaaj huvsw.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj tsaa kuv cai tsua qhov kuv ua lub neej sab dawb paug. Kuv yeej tso sab rua Yawmsaub tsw ua zug le.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj tshuaj saib kuv hab swm kuv, thov koj tshuaj saib kuv lub sab hab tej kws kuv xaav.
Koj txujkev hlub ruaj khov nyob ntawm kuv qhov muag, hab kuv ua kuv lub neej xwb rua koj.
Kuv tsw nrug cov tuabneeg daag nyob tsawg ua ke, kuv tsw nrug cov tuabneeg ncauj lug zoo sab phem koom ib lub sab.
Kuv tsw nyam nrug cov tuabneeg kws ua phem nyob ua ke, hab kuv tsw nrug cov tuabneeg limham nyob tsawg ua ke.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv tsw txhum, kuv ntxuav teg hab moog ncig koj lub thaaj,
hab hu nkauj ua koj tsaug hab pav txug koj txhua yaam num phemfwj kws koj tau ua.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv nyam lub tsev kws koj nyob, hab lub chaw kws koj tug fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab nyob huv.
Thov tsw xob muab kuv rhuav tshem nrug cov tuabneeg muaj txem, hab tsw xob muab kuv txujsa txuv nrug cov tuabneeg noj nyoog,
puab yog cov tuabneeg kws npaaj txhais teg moog ua phem, hab puab txhais teg xws puv nkaus tej nyaj xab.
Kuv mas kuv ua lub neej sab dawb paug, thov txhwv kuv dim hab hlub kuv.
Kuv txhais kwtaw tsuj sau lub chaw taj, kuv yuav qhuas Yawmsaub rua thaus cov tuabneeg coob coob tuaj txoos ua ke.
Yawmsaub yog kuv txujkev kaaj hab kuv txujkev cawm dim, mas kuv yuav ntshai leejtwg? Yawmsaub yog kuv lub chaw ruaj khov kws kuv cawm sav, kuv tseed yuav ntshai leejtwg?
Thaus cov tuabneeg phem kws yog kuv cov yeeb ncuab hab kuv cov tshawj chim, tuaj ntaus kuv yuav noj kuv tej nqaj mas puab yuav dawm qaug.
Txawm yog ib paab tub rog ua yeej tawm tsaam kuv, los kuv lub sab yuav tsw ntshai le. Txawm yog kev ua rog sawv rua kuv, los kuv tseed muaj sab tuab.

Kuv thov ib yaam ntawm Yawmsaub xwb, yog yaam kws kuv pheej nrhav, yog qhov kws kuv yuav tau nyob huv Yawmsaub lub tuam tsev taag kuv swm neej, sub kuv txhad saib ntsoov Yawmsaub tug duab ci zoo nkauj kawg, hab ua nug rua huv nwg lub tuam tsev.

Nwg yuav muab kuv zais rua huv nwg lub chaw nraim rua nub kws raug kev ceblaaj, nwg yuav muab kuv nraim rua huv nwg lub tsev ntaub tug duab ntxoo, nwg yuav muab kuv txawb rua lub chaw sab sau lub pob zeb.

Nwgnuav kuv lub taubhau yuav raug muab tsaa sab dua kuv tej yeeb ncuab kws nyob ib ncig. Kuv yuav xyeem tsaj rua huv nwg lub tsev ntaub hab qw zoo sab, kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas hab ua lub suab xyiv faab rua Yawmsaub.
Au Yawmsaub, thov noog thaus kuv quaj hu, thov hlub kuv hab teb kuv.
Kuv lub sab has tas, “Ca le nrhav nwg lub ntsej muag.” Yawmsaub, kuv nrhav koj lub ntsej muag ntaag.
Tsw xob fee plhu ntawm kuv. Tsw xob ntab npau quas vog lawv koj tug qhev tawm moog, koj yog tug kws txeev paab kuv. Au Vaajtswv kws cawm kuv dim, tsw xob laim kuv pov tseg, tsw xob tso kuv tseg.
Txawm yog kuv nam kuv txwv tso kuv tseg, los Yawmsaub tseed yuav qaws kuv.
Au Yawmsaub, thov qha koj txujkev rua kuv, hab coj kuv taug txujkev taj tug vem kuv muaj yeeb ncuab.
Tsw xob tso kuv rua kuv cov tshawj chim ua lawv le puab lub sab nyam, tsua qhov tej cuav timkhawv sawv tseeg tawm tsaam kuv, hab puab ua paa tawm lug ua limham ndais ntuj rua kuv.
Kuv ntseeg tas kuv yuav pum Yawmsaub txujkev zoo thaus kuv tseed muaj txujsa nyob.
Ca le tog rawv Yawmsaub. Ca le ua khov kho hab ua koj lub sab tuab. Ca le tog rawv Yawmsaub lauj!
Au Yawmsaub, kuv thov hu koj. Kuv lub txhwb zeb, thov tsw xob laag ntseg rua kuv. Yog koj tsw teb kuv tes kuv yuav zoo yaam nkaus le cov tuabneeg kws moog rua huv tub tuag teb.
Thov noog kuv lub suab taij thov rua thaus kuv thov koj paab hab rua thaus kuv tsaa kuv txhais teg tuaj rua koj lub tuam tsev chaav kws dawb huv kawg nkaus.
Thov tsw xob muab kuv sau zog nrug cov tuabneeg limham moog, puab yog cov ua phem kws ncauj lug zoo rua kwvtij zej zog tassws lub sab npaaj ua kev limham.
Thov ua pauj rua puab lawv le puab tau ua, lawv le puab tej kev phem. Thov ua pauj rua puab lawv le puab txhais teg ua, hab pauj rua puab lawv le tswm nyog pauj.
Vem puab tsw quav ntsej tej num kws Yawmsaub ua hab tej kws nwg txhais teg ua, mas nwg yuav muab puab tsoo kuas qaug hab tsw tsaa puab rov sawv le lawm.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub, tsua qhov nwg noog kuv lub suab taij thov.
Yawmsaub yog kuv tug zug hab kuv daim phaj hlau thaiv, kuv tso sab rua nwg, kuv txhad tau kev paab, kuv zoo sab xyiv faab kawg le hab kuv hu nkauj ua nwg tsaug.
Yawmsaub yog nwg haiv tuabneeg tug zug, yog lub chaw cawm sav rua tug kws nwg laub roj tsaa lawd.
Thov cawm koj haiv tuabneeg kuas dim, hab foom koob moov rua koj qub txeeg qub teg. Thov yug puab ib yaam le yug yaaj hab qaws puab puag moog ib txhws.
Cov timtswv sau ntuj 'e, ca le qhuas Yawmsaub, ca le qhuas tas Yawmsaub muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab hab muaj zug.
Ca le qhuas tas Yawmsaub lub npe muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa ab, ca le naav tej tsoog dawb huv pe hawm Yawmsaub.
Yawmsaub lub suab nrov sau tej dej havtxwv, Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab lub suab nroo quas ntwg, Yawmsaub lub suab nrov thoob plhawv sau tej dej havtxwv.
Yawmsaub lub suab muaj fwjchim luj heev, Yawmsaub lub suab nrov ntxhe quas ntwg.
Yawmsaub lub suab luv tej ntoo cab, Yawmsaub yeej luv tej ntoo cab peg roob Lenpanoo.
Nwg ua rua lub roob Lenpanoo dha caws qa yaam nkaus le mivnyuas nyuj, hab ua rua lub roob Xili‑oo  dha caws qa yaam nkaus le mivnyuas nyuj qus.
Yawmsaub lub suab ua suavtawg tawm ci nplaag.
Yawmsaub lub suab cu tebchaws moj saab qhua tseeg quas nkawg, Yawmsaub cu tebchaws moj saab qhua Khante yoj quas yeeg.
Yawmsaub lub suab ua rua tej ntoo qheb yoj rawv quas li hab muab tej nplooj ntoo huv haav zoov zaws zeeg taag huvsw. Mas suavdawg qw huv Yawmsaub lub tuam tsev tas, “Qhuas Yawmsaub.”
Yawmsaub nyob lub zwm txwv kaav sau cov dej nyaab, Yawmsaub nyob sau lub zwm txwv ua vaajntxwv kaav moog ib txhws.
Thov Yawmsaub pub zug rua nwg haiv tuabneeg, thov Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua nwg haiv tuabneeg kuas nyob thaaj yeeb.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv yuav qhuas ntxhas koj vem yog koj nqug kuv tawm lug hab koj tsw kheev kuv cov tshawj chim luag kuv.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv tau hu thov koj paab kuv, mas koj tau khu kuv zoo.
Au Yawmsaub, koj tau coj kuv tug ntsuj plig tawm huv tub tuag teb lug. Kuv tub yuav moog rua huv qhov tuag tassws koj tau cawm kuv txujsa rov lug.
Yawmsaub cov tuabneeg kws dawb huv 'e, mej ca le hu nkauj qhuas nwg, hab ca le ua tsaug nwg lub npe kws dawb huv.
Qhov kws Yawmsaub chim mas yog ib vuag dua xwb, qhov kws nwg ua zoo mas muaj moog ib swm neej. Kev quaj lug kua muag mas muaj ib mo kaaj ntug tassws thaus sawv ntxuv yuav muaj kev xyiv faab.
Kuv tug kheej mas thaus kuv nyob kaaj sab quas lug kuv has tas, “Kuv yuav tsw ua zug hlo le.”
Au Yawmsaub, koj ua zoo rua kuv. Koj tsaa kuv nyob ruaj yaam le lub roob khov kho. Thaus koj fee plhu ntawm kuv lawm mas kuv txhad poob sab.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv thov hu koj. Kuv tsaa suab taij Yawmsaub tas,
“Yog kuv tuag lawd, yog kuv moog rua huv tub tuag teb lawm, mas koj yuav tau daabtsw? Tej moov aav yuav qhuas koj hab pav txug koj txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau lov?
Au Yawmsaub, thov tig ntsej noog hab hlub kuv. Au Yawmsaub, thov koj ua tug kws paab kuv.”
Koj muab kuv kev quaj ntsuag ntxeev ua kev dha seev cev. Koj muab kuv tej khaub seev tsaaj hle hab muab kev zoo sab xyiv faab rua kuv naav,
kuv tug ntsuj plig txhad tau qhuas koj hab tsw xob nyob tuabywv. Au Yawmsaub, kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv yuav ua koj tsaug moog ib txhws.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv lug cawm sav rua huv koj. Thov tsw xob ca kuv raug txaaj muag hlo le, ca le cawm kuv dim vem koj ncaaj nceeg.
Thov tig ntsej noog kuv, ca le cawm kuv kuas dim sai kawg nkaus. Thov koj ua txhwb zeb kws kuv nraim cev, yog lub chaw ruaj khov kws cawm kuv dim.
Koj yeej yog kuv txhwb zeb hab kuv lub chaw ruaj khov ntaag, thov saib rua koj lub npe es coj kuv hab qha kev rua kuv.
Thov tsw xob ca kuv maag rooj hlua kws cuab kuv, tsua qhov koj yog kuv lub chaw cawm sav.
Kuv muab kuv tug ntsuj plig cob rua huv koj txhais teg. Au Yawmsaub koj yog tug Vaajtswv tseeb kws tso sab tau, koj txhwv kuv dim lawm.
Kuv  ntxub cov kws fwm tej txoov daab kws tsw muaj qaabhau, kuv tso sab rua Yawmsaub.
Kuv yuav zoo sab xyiv faab rua koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov, vem koj pum kuv txujkev txom nyem nyuaj sab, hab koj paub kuv txujkev ceblaaj,
hab koj tsw muab kuv cob rua huv yeeb ncuab txhais teg, koj muab kuv txhais kwtaw txawb rua lub chaw daav.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj hlub kuv, vem kuv saamswm raug kev txom nyem nyuaj sab, kuv lub qhov muag plooj taag vem kuv lwj sab, kuv tug ntsuj plig hab kuv lub cev kuj qaug zug.

Kuv txujsa yau quas zug vem kuv txhawj xeeb lwj sab, hab kuv lub naj lub xyoos tsawg quas zug vem kuv ntsaaj quas lawg. Kuv tug zug pluj quas zug vem kuv txhawj xeeb, hab kuv tej pob txhaa sem quas zug moog.
Kuv cov tshawj chim suavdawg saib tsw taug kuv, kuv ua lub chaw rua kwvtij zej zog ceeb hab ntshai, kuv ua lub chaw rua kuv tej phoojywg ntshai sab puag quas zug. Cov kws pum kuv tom kev ca le tswv.
Puab tsw ncu kuv yaam le tug kws tub tuag lawd, kuv zoo yaam nkaus le lub taig kws tawg lawm.
Kuv nov tuabneeg coob sws ntxhw txug kuv. Muaj kev txhawj kev ntshai rua txhua faab. Puab tuav tswvyim tawm tsaam kuv, puab tuav huv txuv kuv txujsa.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv tso sab rua koj, kuv has tas, “Koj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv.”
Kuv lub caij lub nyoog nyob huv koj txhais teg, thov koj cawm kuv dim huv kuv cov yeeb ncuab hab cov kws tswm txom kuv txhais teg.
Thov koj lub ntsej muag ci rua sau koj tug qhev. Vem koj muaj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov, thov cawm kuv dim.
Au Yawmsaub, thov tsw xob ca kuv raug txaaj muag, vem kuv tau quaj thov koj. Thov ca cov tuabneeg phem raug txaaj muag, thov ca puab lub suab ntsag tu moog rua huv tub tuag teb.
Thov muab daim tawv ncauj kws daag xaws, yog lub ncauj kws pheej has lug tuam mom khaav theeb, hab khaav txev saib tsw taug tug ncaaj nceeg.
Koj txujkev zoo muaj ntau kawg le lauj! Koj npaaj ca rua cov kws paub ntshai koj, hab muab rua cov kws cawm sav rua huv koj taab meeg ib tsoom tuabneeg.

Koj muab puab zais rua huv lub chaw nraim huv koj lub xubndag kuas dim tuabneeg tej tswvyim phem. Koj tuav rawv puab nyob tso sab plhuav rua huv qaab koj tug duab ntxoo, kuas dim tug nplaig kws sws caav sws tshe.
Qhuas Yawmsaub, tsua qhov nwg ua nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov tshwm lug rua kuv phemfwj kawg rua thaus kuv raug vej yaam le lub moos kws raug yeeb ncuab vej.
Kuv poob sab nthaav has tas, “Kuv raug muab ntab tawm huv koj lub qhov muag lawm.” Tassws koj tseed nov kuv tej lug taij thov, rua thaus kuv quaj hu thov koj paab.
Yawmsaub cov tuabneeg kws dawb huv suavdawg 'e, ca le muab sab npuab nwg. Yawmsaub tsom kwm cov kws xwb rua nwg, tassws nwg pauj taub cov kws tsaab ua luj pov khawv nkaus.
Mej suavdawg kws tog rawv Yawmsaub, ca le ua khov kho hab ua sab luj sab tuab nawj!
Tug kws tau kev zaam txem tau nyob kaaj sab lug, yog tug kws nwg tej kev txhum raug muab faus lawm.
Tug kws Yawmsaub tsw suav nwg tej kev txhum kuj tau nyob kaaj sab lug, yog tug kws tsw muaj kev daag ntxag huv nwg lub sab.
Thaus kuv tsw tau leeg txem, kuv lub cev kuj sem zuj zug moog, vem yog kuv ntsaaj quas lawg taag naj taag nub.
Koj txhais teg nyaav rua sau kuv nruab nub mo ntuj, kuv tug zug kuj qhuav taag yaam le raug tshaav ntuj kub thaus ntuj qhua.
Kuv txawm leeg kuv lub txem rua koj, kuv tsw npog kuv tej kev phem kev qas ca. Kuv has tas, “Kuv yuav leeg kuv tej kev faav xeeb rua Yawmsaub,” mas koj txhad zaam kuv tej kev txhum txem.
Vem le nuav ca txhua tug kws fwm koj thov koj rua thaus tseed ntswb tau koj. Thaus dej nyaab heev, kev txom nyem yuav lug tsw txug tug hov.
Koj yog kuv lub chaw nraim cev, koj tsom kwm tsw pub kuv raug kev ceblaaj, koj muab zaaj nkauj kws qhuas tas kuv dim lawm lug qhwv nkaus kuv.
Kuv yuav coj hab qha koj txug txujkev kws tswm nyog koj taug. Kuv yuav saib ntsoov koj taw qha koj.
Koj tsw xob ua le tug neeg hab tug luj txwv kws tsw txawj nkaag sab, kws yuav tsum khi looj thawb hab saam xauv, yog tsw ua le ntawd nwg yuav tsw nrug koj moog.
Tug tuabneeg limham raug kev txom nyem ntau heev, tassws txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov xov vej tug kws tso sab rua Yawmsaub.
Mej cov kws ncaaj nceeg 'e, ca le zoo sab hab xyiv faab rua Yawmsaub, mej cov kws lub sab ncaaj 'e, txhua tug ca le qw zoo sab.
Mej cov kws ncaaj nceeg 'e, ca le zoo sab rua Yawmsaub, Tswm nyog cov kws lub sab ncaaj qhuas nwg.
Ca le ntaus nkauj nog ncaas miv qhuas Yawmsaub, ca le ntaus nkauj nog ncaas luj hu suab zoo rua nwg.
Ca le hu zaaj nkauj tshab qhuas nwg, ca le ntaus nkauj nog ncaas zoo zoo hab qw nrov,
tsua qhov Yawmsaub tej lug ncaaj nceeg, hab txhua yaam num kws nwg ua tso sab tau.
Nwg nyam txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab qhov kws ua ncaaj, Yawmsaub txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov puv nkaus lub nplajteb.
Yawmsaub has lug xwb tswm tau lub ntuj, hab tej paa kws tawm huv nwg qhov ncauj tswm txhua yaam sau nruab ntug.
Nwg sau zog tej dej havtxwv lug ntim ua ib naab, hab khaws dej huv nruab tiv txwv ca rua huv lub txhaab.
Ca lub nplajteb huvsw paub ntshai Yawmsaub, ca ib tsoom tuabneeg thoob qaab ntuj fwm nwg heev.
Nwg has xwb, tes lub nplajteb ca le muaj, nwg has lug xwb, txawm tshwm lug.
Yawmsaub muab tej kws ib tsoom tebchaws xaav ca rhuav pov tseg, nwg ua rua tej kws ib tsoom tuabneeg npaaj ca ua tsw tau kuas tav.
Tej kws Yawmsaub npaaj ca yuav nyob moog ib txhws, tej kws nwg xaav ca huv lub sab yuav nyob moog rua txhua tam.
Lub tebchaws kws puab tug Vaajtswv yog Yawmsaub, yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug. Puab yog haiv tuabneeg kws Yawmsaub xaiv ca ua nwg le qub txeeg qub teg.
Yawmsaub nyob sau ntuj saib ntsoov tuaj, nwg saib pum ib tsoom tuabneeg.
Nwg nyob sau nwg lub zwm txwv saib ntsoov rua txhua tug kws nyob huv lub nplajteb.
Nwg yog tug kws tswm puab txhua tug lub sab, hab tshuaj saib txhua yaam kws puab ua huvsw.
Tug vaajntxwv yuav dim tsw yog vem nwg muaj tub rog coob, tug tub rog yuav dim tsw yog vem nwg muaj zug heev.
Qhov kws vaam tas tug neeg ua rog yuav paab kov yeej tsw muaj qaabhau, neeg tug zug luj kuj paab tsw tau kuas dim.
Yawmsaub lub qhov muag saib ntsoov cov kws paub ntshai nwg, hab cov kws vaam ntsoov nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov,
mas nwg yuav cawm puab tug ntsuj plig dim huv txujkev tuag, hab pub puab muaj txujsa nyob rua thaus muaj kev tshaib nqhes.
Peb tug ntsuj plig tog rawv Yawmsaub, nwg yog txujkev paab peb hab yog daim phaj hlau thaiv peb.
Peb zoo sab xyiv faab rua nwg, tsua qhov peb vaam khom nwg lub npe kws dawb huv.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nrug nraim peb, lawv le peb muaj sab vaam rua huv koj.
Kuv yuav qhuas Yawmsaub txhua lub swjhawm, lu lug qhuas nwg yuav nyob huv kuv lub qhov ncauj tsw tu le.
Kuv tug ntsuj plig khaav txug Yawmsaub. Ca cov kws raug kev txom nyem tau nov hab zoo sab.
Ca le nrug kuv qhuas Yawmsaub lub koob meej, peb ca le ua ke txhawb nqaa nwg lub npe.
Kuv tub nrhav Yawmsaub hab nwg kuj teb kuv, nwg cawm kuv dim huv kuv tej kev ntshai huvsw.
Cov kws saib ntsoov nwg yuav xyiv faab hlo, puab yuav tsw raug txaaj muag.
Tug nyuas tuabneeg txom nyem nuav quaj thov, Yawmsaub kuj noog hab cawm nwg dim nwg tej kev ceblaaj huvsw.
Yawmsaub tug tubkhai ntuj zuv vej rawv cov kws paub ntshai Yawmsaub, hab cawm kuas puab dim.
Ca le swm saib hab pum tas Yawmsaub zoo kawg le. Tug kws cawm sav rua huv nwg kuj tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Yawmsaub cov tuabneeg dawb huv 'e, mej ca le paub ntshai nwg, tsua qhov cov kws paub ntshai nwg yuav tsw tu pluag.
Cov tsuv ntxhuav mog tseed tu pluag hab tshaib plaab, tassws cov kws nrhav Yawmsaub tsw tu ncua ib yaam zoo hlo le.
Kuv cov tub 'e, ca le lug noog kuv has, kuv yuav qha mej txug qhov kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub.
Leejtwg xaav tau txujsa hab ntshaw noob nyoog ntev, sub nwg txhad tau tej yaam kws zoo?
Mej yuav tsum tswj mej tug nplaig tsw xob has lug phem, hab tswj mej daim tawv ncauj tsw xob has tej lug daag.
Ca le tswv txujkev phem hab ua qhov kws zoo, nrhav kev hum xeeb hab lawv kuas cuag.
Yawmsaub tsaa qhov muag saib ntsoov cov kws ncaaj nceeg, hab tig ntsej noog puab tej lug quaj thov.
Yawmsaub tsom ntsoov tawm tsaam cov tuabneeg ua phem, nwg yuav muab puab txav pov tseg tsw muaj leejtwg ncu txug puab huv lub nplajteb.
Thaus cov kws ncaaj nceeg quaj thov, Yawmsaub kuj noog, hab cawm puab dim puab tej kev ceblaaj huvsw.
Yawmsaub nyob ze tug kws lwj sab, hab cawm cov kws tsw muaj chaw vaam.
Cov kws ncaaj nceeg muaj ntau yaam kev txom nyem nyuaj sab, tassws Yawmsaub kuj cawm puab dim huvsw.
Nwg tsom kwm puab tej pob txhaa huvsw, tsw luv ib tug le.
Kev phem yuav tua cov tuabneeg limham, hab cov kws ntxub cov ncaaj nceeg yuav raug teem txem.
Yawmsaub txhwv nwg cov qhev txujsa, cov kws lug cawm sav rua huv nwg tsw muaj ib tug raug txem le.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj tawm tsaam cov kws tawm tsaam kuv, thov ua rog rua cov kws ua rog rua kuv.
Ca le tuav daim phaj hlau miv hab daim luj, ca le sawv tseeg paab kuv.
Ca le rhu hlo raab muv nkaug hab raab muv laim tiv cov kws lawv kuv. Thov koj has rua kuv tug ntsuj plig tas, “Kuv yog tug kws yuav cawm koj dim.”
Cov kws nrhav kev txuv kuv txujsa mas thov ca puab raug txaaj muag hab raug saib tsw taug. Cov kws xaav tswvyim phem tawm tsaam kuv, mas thov ca puab raug lawv rov qaab moog ua sab ruag qhwv taag.
Thov ca puab zoo yaam nkaus tej npluag kws cua ntsawj, ca Yawmsaub tug tubkhai ntuj ntab puab moog.
Thov ca puab txujkev tsaus ntuj hab nplua, ca Yawmsaub tug tubkhai ntuj l awv puab tswv moog.
Tub tsw tim le caag los puab cuab hlua rua kuv, tub tsw tim le caag los puab khawb qhov taub cuab txuv kuv txujsa.
Thov kuas puab raug tej kev puam tsuaj kws puab xaav tsw txug, hab thov ca puab maag rooj hlua kws puab cuab, ca puab maag kuas puam tsuaj taag.
Mas kuv tug ntsuj plig yuav xyiv faab rua huv Yawmsaub, kuv yuav zoo sab xyiv faab kawg le tsua qhov kws nwg tso kuv dim.

Kuv tej pob txhaa huvsw yuav has tas, “Au Yawmsaub, leejtwg zoo cuag le koj? Koj yog tug kws tso cov tuabneeg tsw muaj zug dim ntawm tug kws muaj zug dua puab, hab cawm cov kws tsw muaj zug hab txom nyem dim ntawm tug kws lws puab.”
Muaj cuav timkhawv phem sawv tseeg, puab nug kuv txug tej kws kuv tsw paub.
Puab ua qhov phem pauj tej kws kuv ua zoo, kuv lub sab lwj taag.
Tassws thaus puab mob mas kuv naav khaub seev tsaaj hab tswj kuv lub sab yoo mov, kuv nyo taubhau qeg qeg thov Vaajtswv,
ib yaam nkaus le kuv quaj ntsuag rua kuv ib tug kwvluag lossws rua ib tug kwvtij. Kuv moog kev yaam nkaus le tug kws quaj ntsuag rua leej nam, kuv quaj dai hau quas vag.
Tassws yog kuv dawm mas puab tuaj txoos ua ke zoo sab kawg, puab sau zog ua ke tuaj tawm tsaam kuv. Tej tuabneeg loj leeb kws kuv tsw tau paub dua le los kuj tshev kuv tsw tu le.
Puab luag kuv heev kawg has lug phem rua kuv, puab zawm nav quas zog rua kuv.
Au Yawmsaub, koj yuav tsaa muag saib xwb moog ntev le caag? Thov cawm kuv dim huv puab tej kev limham ndais ntuj, thov cawm kuv txujsa dim huv cov tsuv ntxhuav.
Mas kuv yuav ua koj tsaug rua thaus tsoom zeej suavdawg tuaj txoos ua ke, kuv yuav qhuas koj huv plawv cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd.
Cov kws kuv tsw tau ua txhum rua los ca le ua kuv cov tshawj chim, thov tsw xob kheev puab zoo sab luag kuv. Thov tsw xob kheev cov kws laam ntxub kuv do do zwg ncauj ntxw muag rua kuv.
Tsua qhov puab tsw has tej lug hum xeeb, puab tsuas xaav tej lug daag xyaav cov kws nyob tug quas yeeg huv lub tebchaws.
Puab rua ncauj luj kawg le rua kuv, puab nkaug nyos has tas, “Peb tub pum ntawm qhov muag lawm.”
Au Yawmsaub, koj tub pum lawm, thov tsw xob nyob tuabywv. Au tug Tswv, thov tsw xob nyob deb ntawm kuv.
Au kuv tug Vaajtswv kws yog kuv tug Tswv, thov tswm dheev, ca le kub sab quas lug tuav kuv txujcai hab has kuv tshaaj plaub.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov tsaa kuv cai lawv le koj kev ncaaj nceeg. Thov tsw xob ca puab zoo sab luag kuv.
Tsw xob ca puab has huv lub sab tas, “Peb tau lawv le peb lub sab nyam lawm.” Tsw xob kheev puab has tas, “Peb tub muab nwg nqog lawm.”
Thov ua rua cov kws zoo sab luag kuv tej kev txom nyem raug txaaj muag hab lub sab ruag qhwv taag. Thov ca cov kws tsaab ua luj tawm tsaam kuv tau poob ntsej muag hab raug saib tsw taug.
Ca cov kws xaav pum kuv muaj cai qw zoo sab hab ca puab zoo sab xyiv faab hab has tsw tu le tas, “Yawmsaub luj kawg nkaus, nwg txaus sab rua thaus nwg tug tub qhe noj qaab nyob zoo.”
Mas kuv tug nplaig yuav pav txug koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab yuav qhuas koj ib nub tsaus ntuj.
Txujkev txhum has tub tub rua huv tug tuabneeg limham lub sab, nwg tsw paub ntshai Vaajtswv hlo le.
Nwg rov qhuas nwg tug kheej tas nwg tej kev txhum tsw muaj leejtwg pum tsw muaj leejtwg ntxub.
Nwg qhov ncauj has tej lug phem tej lug daag. Nwg tseg kag txujkev xyum txawj xyum ntse hab tsw ua qhov zoo.
Thaus nwg pw, nwg tsuas yog ntaus tswvyim phem xwb. Nwg npaaj ua qhov kws tsw zoo xwb, nwg tsw tso txujkev phem tseg.
Au Yawmsaub, koj txujkev hlub ruaj khov sab moog nto ntuj, koj txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau sab moog nto tej fuab.
Koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg zoo yaam le Vaajtswv tej roob, qhov kws koj txav txem ncaaj yaam le dej havtxwv. Au Yawmsaub, koj tsom kwm tuabneeg hab tsaj txhu.
Au Vaajtswv, koj txujkev hlub ruaj khov mas tswm txaj kawg nkaus. Ib tsoom tuabneeg moog cawm sav rua huv qaab koj phob tis tug duab ntxoo.
Puab noj tej kws muaj nplua quas mag huv koj lub tsev tsau npo, hab koj pub puab tau haus tug nam dej kws pub koj txujkev zoo txujkev xyiv faab.
Tsua qhov txuj hauv paug sav nyob ntawm koj, peb pum txujkev kaaj vem peb nyob huv koj qhov kaaj.
Thov koj ua koj txujkev hlub ruaj khov tshwm rua cov kws paub koj tsw tu le, hab ua koj txujkev cawm dim rua cov kws sab ncaaj sab nceeg.
Thov tsw xob kheev cov tuabneeg khaav theeb txhais kwtaw tsuj kuv, hab tsw xob kheev cov tuabneeg limham txhais teg lawv tau kuv tswv.
Saib maj, cov tuabneeg phem tub qaug lawm, puab raug laim pov tseg sawv tsw taug le lawm.
Koj tsw xob ntxhuv sab txug qhov kws tuabneeg ua limham, tsw xob khib cov tuabneeg kws ua txhum.
Tsw ntev puab yuav pluj qhuav taag yaam le tej nyom, hab qhuav sem quas zug yaam le tej nroj tsuag.
Ca le tso sab rua Yawmsaub hab ua qhov zoo, koj txhad tau nyob huv lub tebchaws hab ua lub neej tso sab plhuav.
Ca le zoo sab xyiv faab rua huv Yawmsaub, mas nwg yuav pub tej kws koj lub sab ntshaw rua koj.
Ca le muab koj txujkev rua Yawmsaub coj, tso sab plhuav rua nwg, nwg yuav ua kuas tav.
Nwg yuav ua rua koj txujkev ncaaj ci kaaj quas lug, hab ua rua koj txujcai ci yaam le thaus taav su.
Ca le nyob tuabywv ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag hab ua sab ntev tog rawv nwg, tsw xob ntxhuv sab txug tug kws vaam meej lawv le nwg txujkev, lossws ntxhuv sab txug tug kws ua nwg tej tswvyim phem tav.
Ca le tswj koj txujkev chim hab tso koj txujkev npau tawg tseg. Tsw xob ntxhuv sab tsaam tes muaj kws ua phem lawm xwb.
Tsua qhov cov tuabneeg limham yuav raug muab txav tawm moog, tassws cov kws tog rawv Yawmsaub yuav tau lub tebchaws ua puab teej puab tug.
Tshuav tsw ntev cov tuabneeg limham yuav tsw muaj nyob lawm, txawm yog nrhav ntawm puab lub chaw nyob zoo zoo los tsw pum puab nyob hov ntawd lawm.
Tassws cov kws txu fwjchim yuav tau lub tebchaws ua puab teej puab tug, hab puab yuav zoo sab xyiv faab tsua qhov kws puab vaam meej nplua quas mag.
Cov tuabneeg limham tuav huv ua phem rua tug ncaaj nceeg, hab zawm nav quas zog rua nwg.
Tassws tug Tswv thuaj luag cov tuabneeg limham, tsua qhov nwg pum ntsoov puab lub caij lub nyoog saamswm lug.
Cov tuabneeg limham rhu ntaaj hab ntaa neev, txuv cov tuabneeg pluag hab cov tuabneeg txom nyem, hab tua cov tuabneeg kws ua lub neej ncaaj nceeg.
Puab raab ntaaj yuav rov chob puab lub sab, puab raab neev yuav luv.
Tej nyuas miv miv kws tug ncaaj nceeg muaj, kuj zoo dua tej kws cov tuabneeg limham coob coob muaj nplua quas mag.
Cov tuabneeg limham txhais npaab yuav luv, tassws Yawmsaub tuav rawv cov kws ncaaj nceeg.
Yawmsaub paub cov kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj lub caij lub nyoog, hab puab tej qub txeeg qub teg yuav nyob moog ib txhws.
Puab yuav tsw txaaj muag rua nub kws muaj xwm txheej phem, nub kws tshaib nqhes puab tseed muaj nplua quas mag.
Tassws cov tuabneeg limham yuav puam tsuaj. Yawmsaub cov yeeb ncuab zoo le tej paaj zoo nkauj huv tshaav zaub, puab yuav pluj moog, puab pluj moog yaam le tej paa nchu.
Cov tuabneeg limham qev txais kuj tsw them, tassws cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg lub sab daav muab pub dawb.
Cov kws Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua yuav tau lub tebchaws ua puab tug, tassws cov kws raug nwg foom yuav raug muab txav tawm moog.
Yog Yawmsaub txaus sab rua tug tuabneeg twg lub neej, nwg kuj ua rua tug hov txhais kwtaw nyob ruaj.
Txawm yog tug hov dawm, los nwg yuav tsw qaug hlo, tsua qhov Yawmsaub txhais teg fwj nwg lawm.
Kuv txeev hluas, nwgnuav laug lawm, kuv cav tsw tau pum ib tug ncaaj nceeg raug muab tso tseg, lossws pum nwg tej tub ki thov khawv.
Nwg ua sab daav muab pub hab qev txais rua luas, hab nwg tej tub ki yog koob moov.
Ca le tswv txujkev phem hab ua qhov kws zoo, mas koj yuav nyob moog ib txhws.

Yawmsaub nyam qhov kws ua ncaaj, nwg yuav tsw tso nwg cov tuabneeg dawb huv tseg. Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav raug muab tsom kwm ca moog ib txhws, tassws cov tuabneeg limham tej tub ki yuav raug muab txav pov tseg.
Cov ncaaj nceeg yuav tau lub tebchaws ua puab teej puab tug, hab tau nyob rua huv moog ib txhws.
Tug ncaaj nceeg lub qhov ncauj nthuav tswvyim tawm lug, nwg tug nplaig has tej lug raug cai.
Nwg tug Vaajtswv txuj kevcai nyob huv nwg lub sab, hab nwg txhais kwtaw tsw nplaam.
Cov tuabneeg limham soj nraim tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, hab nrhav kev yuav muab nwg tua pov tseg.
Tassws Yawmsaub yuav tsw tso nwg tseg rua huv puab txhais teg, lossws ca nwg raug txav txem rua thaus tu plaub.
Ca le tog rawv Yawmsaub hab tuav rawv nwg txujkev, mas nwg yuav tsaa koj kuas tau lub tebchaws ua koj tug. Koj yuav pum cov tuabneeg limham raug puam tsuaj.
Kuv pum ib tug tuabneeg limham muaj fwjchim quab yuam hab sab yaam le tej ntoo cab huv Lenpanoo.
Kuv hlaa moog dua ib zag, ua cav tsw muaj nwg lawm, kuv nrhav nwg los tsw pum nwg lawm.
Ca le tshuaj saib tug kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj, hab saib ntsoov tug kws lub sab ncaaj, vem tug kws nyob sab tug yeeg muaj caaj ceg.
Tassws tug kws faav xeeb yuav raug puam tsuaj huvsw. Cov kws limham caaj ceg yuav raug muab txav pov tseg.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg txujkev dim yog lug ntawm Yawmsaub lug, nwg yog puab lub chaw cawm sav rua thaus puab raug ceblaaj.
Yawmsaub paab puab hab cawm puab dim, nwg paab puab dim cov tuabneeg limham. Nwg cawm puab dim vem puab lug cawm sav rua huv nwg.
Au Yawmsaub, thaus koj chim thov koj tsw xob tshev kuv, thaus koj npau tawg tsw xob nplawm kuv.
Tsua qhov koj raab xub tub txeem rua huv kuv, koj txhais teg tub poob rua sau kuv.
Vem yog koj chim kuv lub cev txhad tsw theej thuv, vem yog kuv ua txhum kuv tej pob txhaa txhad mob ntsug quas qeeg.
Kuv tej kev txhum nyaab dhau kuv taubhau lawm, yog lub nraa kws nyaav dhau kuv tug zug.
Vem yog kuv ruag kuv tej kav txhaab txhad lwj quas zug tuaj hab tsw,
kuv khoov hab pau heev, kuv taug kev quaj qos ntsuav ib nub tsaus ntuj.
Kuv lub duav kub quas lug, hab kuv lub cev tsw theej thuv.
Kuv lub cev ntshaus taag kuv ib ce ntsoog taag, kuv ntsaaj quas lawg vem yog sab faab taag.
Au tug Tswv,  tej kws kuv xaav xaav yuav koj yeej paub huvsw, qhov kws kuv quaj quaj seev seev koj yeej nov huvsw.
Kuv lub plawv dha hab kuv tug zug pluj taag, hab kuv qhov muag pum kev tsw meej lawm.
Kuv tej kwvluag phoojywg sawv deb deb ntawm kuv txujkev mob nkeeg, hab kuv kwvtij neej tsaa los kuj sawv deb ntawm kuv hab.

Cov tuabneeg kws nrhav txuv kuv txujsa tub npaaj cuab ntxab cuab hlua rua kuv, cov tuabneeg kws xaav ua rua kuv mob pheej has txug qhov kws ua kuas puam tsuaj, hab xaav txug qhov kws yuav sawv twv kuv ib nub tsaus ntuj.
Tassws kuv ua yaam le tug laag ntseg tsw nov, kuv ua yaam le tug ruag tsw qheb ncauj has le.
Kuv zoo yaam nkaus le tug kws tsw nov lug, hab zoo le tug kws lub qhov ncauj tsw muaj lug tshev.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv tog rawv koj. Au tug Tswv kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, koj yog tug kws yuav teb kuv.
Kuv thov has tas, “Thov tsw xob ca puab zoo sab luag nyos kuv, yog cov kws khaav rua thaus kuv nplaam taw.”
Tsua qhov kuv tub yuav qaug hab kuv muaj mob tsw tu le.
Kuv leeg kuv lub txem, kuv ntxhuv sab rua kuv tej kev txhum.
Cov kws laam ua kuv cov tshawj chim do do xwb muaj zug npho, hab cov kws kuv tsw tau ua txhum rua los ntxub kuv, kuj muaj coob kawg le.
Cov kws ua phem pauj kuv tej kev zoo kuj tawm tsaam kuv, vem yog kuv ua qhov zoo.
Au Yawmsaub, thov tsw xob tso kuv tseg. Au kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov tsw xob nyob deb ntawm kuv.
Au tug Tswv kws yog kuv lub chaw cawm dim, ca le maaj nroog lug paab kuv.
Kuv has tas, “ Kuv yuav ceev faaj xyum zoo sub kuv tug nplaig txhad tsw has txhum. Kuv yuav qus ncauj nkaus rua thaus cov tuabneeg limham nyob ntawm kuv xubndag.”
Kuv nyob ntsag tu tsw has lug le, kuv nyob tuabywv los tsw zoo. Kuv lub sab ntxhuv heev quas zug tuaj,
kuv lub sab kub quas lug le. Thaus kuv tseed saamswm xaav mas suavtawg kuj cig huv lub sab, tes kuv tug nplaig txawm has tas,
“Au Yawmsaub, thov qha rua kuv paub txug kuv lub neej thaus kawg, hab kuv lub noob nyoog yuav nyob ntev le caag, hab qha kuv paub tas kuv txujsa yuav tuab lu le caag.
Koj yeej ua rua kuv txujsa nyob ntev ob peb dus xwb, koj saib kuv lub noob nyoog zoo le ib ntsais muag xwb. Txhua tug txujsa yeej nyob ntev le ua ib paas xwb.
Tuabneeg moog moog lug lug yaam le tug duab xwb, puab khwv ntxhuv sab do do xwb. Tuabneeg sau nyaj txag ua tej nam pawg tassws tsw paub leejtwg yuav khaws moog.
“Au tug Tswv,  kuv tseed tog daabtsw? Kuv tsuas yog vaam ntawm koj xwb.
Thov koj tso kuv dim kuv tej kev faav xeeb huvsw. Tsw xob ca kuv raug tej tuabneeg ruag thuaj.
Kuv yog tuabneeg ruag kuv tsw rua ncauj le tsua qhov koj yog tug kws ua tej nuav.
Thov rhu koj raab nplawm ntawm kuv moog, koj txhais teg nplawm kuv ua rua kuv tsaug ib ce kawg le.
Thaus koj tshev tuabneeg tej kev txhum hab nplawm puab, koj muab tej kws puab nyam ua kuas puam tsuaj taag yaam le tej kaab npauj ua. Tuabneeg txhua tug txujsa zoo le ua ib paas cua xwb.

“Au Yawmsaub, thov noog kuv tej lug thov, thov tig ntsej noog kuv lub suab quaj, thov koj tsw xob fee ntawm kuv lub kua muag. Tsua qhov kuv yog koj ib tug qhua kws tuaj ib vuag xwb, kuv yog ib tug kws lug dai koj ib yaam le kuv tej laug txhua tug.
Thov koj fee plhu ntawm kuv, kuv txhad le tau kev xyiv faab ua ntej kws kuv tsw tau ncaim moog es kuv txujsa tu nrho.”
Kuv ua sab ntev tog rawv Yawmsaub, nwg tig lug noog kuv tej lug thov.
Nwg nqug kuv tawm huv lub qhov kws ntshai kawg, yog tawm huv lub paag aav, hab muab kuv txhais kwtaw txawb rua sau lub pob zeb, ua rua kuv xwb taw nyob ruaj khov.
Nwg muab zaaj nkauj tshab tso rua huv kuv lub qhov ncauj, yog zaaj qhuas peb tug Vaajtswv. Tuabneeg coob coob yuav pum hab ntshai, hab yuav tso sab rua Yawmsaub.
Tug kws tso sab rua Yawmsaub kuj nyob kaaj sab lug, yog tug kws tsw tig moog nrhav cov tuabneeg khaav theeb lossws nrhav cov kws yuam kev moog pe daab.

Au kuv tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, koj tau ua ntau yaam phemfwj hab npaaj tseg ntau yaam rua peb, tsw muaj leejtwg zoo cuag le koj. Yog kuv yuav pav hab has txug tej hov mas muaj ntau dhau suav tsw txheeb.
Koj tsw xaav yuav tej tsaj hab tej hov txhua chaw kws muab xyeem, tassws koj tub qheb kuv qhov ntsej nov koj tej lug. Qhov kws tua tsaj hlawv xyeem hab xyeem daws txem, koj tsw tau rob.
Kuv has tas, “Kuv nyob nuav, huv thooj ntawv kuj sau txug kuv.
Au kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv nyam ua lawv le koj lub sab nyam, koj txuj kevcai nyob huv kuv lub sab.”
Kuv tub has txuj xuv zoo txug txujkev cawm dim rua thaus cov tuabneeg coob coob tuaj txoos ua ke. Au Yawmsaub, koj yeej paub tseeb tas kuv tsw kaw kuv lub qhov ncauj ca hlo le.

Kuv tsw tau zais koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg ca rua huv kuv lub sab, kuv tub has txug koj txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau hab qhov kws koj cawm dim. Kuv tsw tau npog koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov hab koj txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau rua thaus cov tuabneeg coob coob tuaj txoos ua ke.
Au Yawmsaub, thov tsw xob tso qhov kws koj khuvleej kuv tseg, thov koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov hab koj txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau tsom kwm kuv moog ib txhws.
Tej xwm txheej phem vej kuv ntau kawg suav tsw txheeb. Kuv tej kev txhum lawv cuag kuv ua rua kuv tsw pum kev le, muaj ntau dua kuv tej plaubhau sau kuv taubhau. Kuv lub sab yaaj taag.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj txaus sab cawm kuv dim, au Yawmsaub, thov maaj nroog tuaj paab kuv lauj!
Thov ca txhua tug kws tsom ntsoov txuv kuv txujsa raug txaaj muag hab lub sab ruag qhwv taag. Thov ca cov kws xaav ua rua kuv raug mob raug lawv thim rov qaab moog hab poob ntsej muag.
Thov ca cov kws luag nyos kuv poob sab nthaav vem puab raug txaaj muag,
Thov ca txhua tug kws nrhav koj xyiv faab hab zoo sab rua huv koj. Thov ca cov kws nyam koj txujkev cawm dim has tsw tu tas, “Yawmsaub luj kawg nkaus.”
Kuv mas pluag hab txom nyem, tassws tug Tswv tseed mob sab kuv. Au kuv tug Vaajtswv, koj yog tug kws paab kuv hab cawm kuv dim, thov tsw xob tog ntev.
Tug kws mob sab cov tuabneeg pluag kuj nyob kaaj sab lug, Yawmsaub cawm tug hov rua nub kws raug ceblaaj.
Yawmsaub tsom kwm nwg hab tuav nwg txujsa nyob, nwg raug hu tas yog tug kws tau nyob kaaj sab lug huv lub tebchaws. Koj yuav tsw muab nwg cob rua yeeb ncuab ua lawv le puab lub sab nyam.
Thaus nwg raug mob pw sau lub txaaj Yawmsaub tuav nwg. Thaus nwg mob koj khu nwg tej mob zoo huvsw.
Kuv mas kuv has tas, “Au Yawmsaub, thov koj hlub kuv, thov khu kuv, vem yog kuv tau ua txhum rua koj.”
Kuv cov yeeb ncuab has phem txug kuv tas, “Thaus twg nwg le tuag hab nwg lub npe puam tsuaj moog?”
Thaus ib tug twg tuaj tshaam kuv, nwg has lug daag xwb, tassws nwg lub sab khaws tej lug phem ca. Thaus nwg tawm moog nwg coj kuv lub moo moog xyaav rua txhua qhov.
Txhua tug kws ntxub kuv puab ntxhw quas tawg txug kuv, puab xaav phem rua kuv.
Puab has tas, “Muaj ib tug mob phem lug raug nwg lawm, nwg yuav tsw sawv huv nwg lub chaw pw le lawm.”
Txawm yog kuv tug kwvluag zoo kws kuv tso sab rua hab nrug kuv noj ua ke, los yuav tsaa lauj taw tuam kuv.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj hlub kuv, thov tsaa kuv sawv sub kuv txhad ua pauj rua puab.
Yog le nuav kuv txhad paub tas koj txaus sab rua kuv, yog qhov kws kuv cov yeeb ncuab kov tsw yeej kuv.
Koj tuav kuv ca vem yog kuv lub sab ncaaj, hab muab kuv txawb rua ntawm koj lub xubndag moog ib txhws.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub kws yog cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv, ib txwm thau u lug hab moog ib txhws tsw kawg. Amee! Amee!
Muas lwj lab sab quas tsuag rua lub haav kws muaj dej ndwg ndo le caag, au Vaajtswv, kuv tug ntsuj plig kuj lab sab quas tsuag rua koj ib yaam le ntawd.
Kuv tug ntsuj plig nqhes Vaajtswv, yog tug Vaajtswv kws muaj txujsa nyob. Yuav thaus twg kuv le tuaj pum Vaajtswv lub ntsej muag?
Kuv tej kua muag ua kuv le zaub mov nruab nub mo ntuj, rua thaus tuabneeg thom kuv tsw tu has tas, “Koj tug Vaajtswv nyob hovtwg?”

Thaus kuv quaj kev txom nyem huv lub sab tawm lug kuv ncu txug tej nuav, yog kuv txeev nrug cov pejxeem ua ke hab coj puab moog ua ib paab rua huv Vaajtswv lub tuam tsev, muaj suab qw zoo sab hab suab nkauj ua tsaug, yog ib tsoom pejxeem coob tuaj ua ke ua kevcai.
Kuv tug ntsuj plig 'e, ua caag koj qaug zug taag le nuav, ua caag koj ntxhuv sab taag rua huv kuv lub cev? Ca le muaj sab vaam rua Vaajtswv, tsua qhov kuv yuav qhuas nwg dua. Nwg yog tug kws paab kuv
hab yog kuv tug Vaajtswv. Kuv tug ntsuj plig qaug zug taag rua huv kuv, vem le nuav kuv txhad ncu txug koj huv lub tebchaws ntawm tug dej Yalatee hab lub roob Hawmoo hab lub pov roob Mibxa.
Muaj suab dej tsaws tsua nrov quas voog, yog dej tub hu dej tub, koj tej nam nthwv dej huvsw nphau nyaab hlo kuv lawm.
Nruab nub Yawmsaub has kuas nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov tshwm lug rua kuv, mo ntuj nwg zaaj nkauj nrug nraim kuv, yog tej lug thov Vaajtswv kws pub txujsa rua kuv.
Kuv has rua Vaajtswv kws yog kuv txhwb zeb has tas, “Ua caag koj nov qaab kuv lawm? Ua caag kuv yuav moog quaj qos ntsuav vem yog yeeb ncuab quab yuam kuv?”
Kuv cov tshawj chim thuaj luag kuv, mob yaam nkaus tej pob txhaa ntsoog taag, rua thaus puab thom kuv tsw tu has tas, “Koj tug Vaajtswv nyob hovtwg?”

Kuv tug ntsuj plig 'e, ua caag koj qaug zug taag le nuav, ua caag koj ntxhuv sab taag rua huv kuv lub cev? Ca le muaj sab vaam rua ntawm Vaajtswv, tsua qhov kuv yuav qhuas nwg dua. Nwg yog tug kws paab kuv hab yog kuv tug Vaajtswv.
Au Vaajtswv, thov koj tsaa kuv cai, hab has kuv tshaaj plaub ntawm cov tuabneeg tsw fwm koj. Thov koj cawm kuv dim ntawm cov tuabneeg daag hab cov tuabneeg tsw ncaaj.
Koj yog tug Vaajtswv kws yog kuv lub chaw cawm sav, ua caag koj tso kuv tseg lawm? Ua caag kuv yuav moog quaj qos ntsuav vem yog yeeb ncuab quab yuam kuv?
Thov koj tso koj txujkev kaaj hab txujkev tseeb lug, thov ca ob txuj hov coj kuv moog, hab coj kuv moog txug koj lub roob dawb huv hab koj lub chaw nyob.
Mas kuv yuav moog rua ntawm Vaajtswv lub thaaj xyeem, moog txug Vaajtswv kws yog kuv lub chaw zoo sab xyiv faab kawg nkaus. Au Vaajtswv, kuv tug Vaajtswv 'e, kuv yuav ntaus nkauj nog ncaas qhuas koj.

Kuv tug ntsuj plig 'e, ua caag koj qaug zug taag le nuav, ua caag koj ntxhuv sab taag r ua huv kuv lub cev? Ca le muaj sab vaam rua Vaajtswv, tsua qhov kuv yuav qhuas nwg dua. Nwg yog tug kws paab kuv hab yog kuv tug Vaajtswv.
Au Vaajtswv, peb lub qhov ntsej tau nov hab peb tej laug tau pav txug tej num kws koj tau ua rua thaus puab swm neej yaav thau u.
Koj txhais teg tau lawv tej tebchaws tswv moog, huas koj cog peb tej laug nyob. Koj ua rua ib tsoom tuabneeg raug kev txom nyem, huas koj muab peb tej laug tso nyob ywj pheej.

Tsw yog puab tej ntaaj paab puab txeeb tau lub tebchaws hov, hab tsw yog puab txhais teg kov yeej, tassws yog koj txhais teg xws hab koj txhais npaab hab qhov kws koj tsaa qhov muag saib puab tsua qhov koj txaus sab rua puab.
Koj yog kuv tug vaajntxwv hab kuv tug Vaajtswv kws has tseg kuas Yakhauj kov yeej.
Vem yog muaj koj peb txhad le thawb tau peb cov tshawj chim, vem muaj koj lub npe peb txhad le tsuj tau cov kws tawm tsaam peb,
tsua qhov kuv tsw tso sab rua kuv raab neev nti, hab kuv raab ntaaj los cawm tsw tau kuv.
Tassws koj tau cawm peb dim ntawm peb cov tshawj chim hab ua rua cov kws ntxub peb raug txaaj muag.
Peb khaav txug Vaajtswv tsw tu le, hab peb yuav ua tsaug rua koj lub npe ib txhws moog le.
Los koj tseed tso peb tseg hab ua rua peb poob qeg, hab tsw tau tawm nrug peb cov tub rog moog.
Koj ua rua peb thim ntawm peb cov tshawj chim rov qaab, hab peb tej yeeb ncuab txeeb tau peb tej hov txhua chaw moog lawm.
Koj ua rua peb zoo yaam nkaus le tej yaaj kws yuav coj moog tua, hab ua rua peb tawg ua saab ua sua moog rua ib tsoom tebchaws.
Koj muab koj haiv tuabneeg muag pheejyim kawg le, koj tsw tau tshaaj thawj le.
Koj ua rua peb raug luas zej zog thuaj, ua rua peb raug cov kws nyob ib ncig peb luag hab saib tsw taug.
Hab ua rua peb moog tag luas ncauj luas lu rua huv ib tsoom tebchaws, hab ua lub chaw rua ib tsoom tuabneeg luag.
Kuv poob ntsej muag taag naj taag nub, hab kev txaaj muag npug nkaus kuv lub plhu,
vem yog raug tej lug kws luas thuaj luag hab saib tsw taug, vem yog cov yeeb ncuab hab cov kws cib nyeej.
Txawm yog peb tsw tau nov qaab koj hab tsw tau rhuav koj tej lug cog tseg, los txhua yaam nuav lug raug peb.
Peb lub sab kuj tsw faav xeeb peb txhais kwtaw kuj tsw ncaim ntawm koj txujkev,
los koj ca peb ntsoog taag rua huv maa tej chaw nyob, hab muab txujkev tsaus ntuj lug npug peb.
Yog peb tau nov qaab peb tug Vaajtswv lub npe hab tsaa teg rua luas tej daab,
tes Vaajtswv txawm tsw paub qhov nuav lawm lov? Tsua qhov nwg yeej paub tej kws peb xaav tuabywv huv lub sab.
Vem tim koj peb txhad raug muab tua taag naj taag nub, hab raug muab suav yaam le cov yaaj kws coj moog tua.
Au tug Tswv, ca le sawv tseeg, ua caag koj tseed pw tsaug zug? Ca le tswm dheev. Tsw xob muab peb tso tseg ib txhws.
Ua le caag koj yuav fee plhu ntawm peb? Ua caag koj yuav nov qaab qhov kws peb raug kev txom nyem raug quab yuam?
Peb tug ntsuj plig khoov moog ti nkaus aav, peb lub cev pua lua rua huv peg teb.
Thov koj ca le sawv tseeg lug paab peb, thov txhwv peb dim vem yog saib rua koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov.
Kuv lub sab muaj tej lug zoo puv phwj yog, kuv yuav hu tej nkauj sws phim rua vaajntxwv. Kuv tug nplaig zoo yaam nkaus le tug Kws txawj sau ntawv tug cwjmem.
