Koj zoo nraug tshaaj ib tsoom tuabneeg huvsw. Tej lug koob moov ndwg tawm huv koj daim tawv ncauj lug, vem Vaajtswv tau foom koob moov rua koj ib txwm lug.
Vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg 'e, ca le rws raab ntaaj rua ntawm duav. Koj yog tug kws muaj meej thawb hab muaj fwjchim meej mom.
Koj kws muaj fwjchim meej mom ca le caij neeg tawm moog kov yeej, es paab tau txujkev tseeb hab tuav tau txujcai. Thov kuas koj txhais teg xws ua tau tej yaam kws txaus ntshai tshwm lug.
Koj raab xub ntse chob vaajntxwv tej yeeb ncuab lub sab, ib tsoom tuabneeg qaug rua ntawm koj xubndag.
Koj lub zwm txwv kws Vaajtswv pub rua koj muaj nyob moog ib txhws tsw kawg. Koj tuav tug cwj ua vaajntxwv kaav ncaaj kaav nceeg.
Koj nyam txujkev ncaaj nceeg, koj ntxub txujkev limham. Vem le nuav Vaajtswv, koj tug Vaajtswv tau muab cov roj kws ua kuas zoo sab xyiv faab laub tsaa koj luj dua koj cov kwvluag.

Koj tej tsoog tsho tsw qaab zwb quas lawg yog muaj roj tsw qaab hab roj ntoo alau‑es hab moov xyaab txob pleev rua lawm. Huv koj lub tsev kws xuas kaug ntxhw ua luas ntaus nkauj nog ncaas ua rua koj zoo sab.
Tej vaajntxwv le ntxhais kuj nrug cov quaspuj kws tu koj ua num ua ke, puj vaajntxwv coj tej kub huv lub moos Aufi sawv ntawm koj saab xws.
Mivntxhais 'e, ca le noog, ca le ua tuab zoo xaav hab tig koj lub qhov ntsej noog. Ca le nov qaab koj haiv tuabneeg hab koj txwv tsev tuabneeg.
Mas vaajntxwv yuav nyam koj lub cev kws zoo nkauj. Vem nwg yog koj tug tswv koj yuav tsum fwm nwg.
Cov tuabneeg huv Thailab yuav coj tshaav ntuj tuaj rua koj, hab cov pejxeem kws nplua nuj kawg
yuav coj txhua yaam nyaj txag tuaj saam fwm koj. Vaajntxwv tug nkauj nyaab naav tej tsoog tsho kws muaj xuv kub ntus huv lub txaaj.
Puab coj nwg naav lub tsho kws txaij nraug quas zeeg moog cuag vaajntxwv, hab coj cov hluas nkauj dawb huv kws ua luag nrug nwg ua ke,
coj puab moog ua zoo sab xyiv faab kawg le, moog rua huv vaajntxwv lub tsev.
Au vaajntxwv, koj tej tub yuav nyob koj tej laug lub chaw, koj yuav tsaa puab ua thawj kaav thoob plhawv lub nplajteb.
Kuv yuav ua rua koj lub npe raug luas txhawb nqaa rua huv txhua tam tuabneeg moog le. Mas ib tsoom tuabneeg yuav qhuas koj moog ib txhab ib txhws le.
Vaajtswv yog peb lub chaw cawm sav hab yog peb tug zug, yog tug kws paab rua txhua lub swjhawm kws raug ceblaaj.
Vem le hov peb txhad tsw ntshai txawm yog lub nplajteb yuav ntxeev, hab tej roob yuav nphau rua huv havtxwv,
txawm yog dej havtxwv nphau pis nthwv hab nrov tseeg quas nkawg, hab tej roob ua zug quas kais vem tej nam nthwv dej ntsawj kuj xwj.
Muaj ib tug nam dej ndwg ua rua Vaajtswv lub nroog zoo sab, yog tug kws Luj Dua Ndais lub chaw nyob kws dawb huv.
Vaajtswv nyob huv plawv lub nroog mas lub nroog yuav tsw ua zug, thaus kaaj ntug Vaajtswv yuav paab nwg.
Ib tsoom tuabneeg kuj ntxhuv quas nyo hab ib tsoom tebchaws tseeg quas nkawg qaug taag. Vaajtswv tsaa suab hlo mas lub nplajteb yaaj ntshws.
Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus nrug nraim peb, Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv yog peb lub chaw cawm sav.
Ca le lug, lug saib Yawmsaub tej num, saib nwg ua rua lub nplajteb nyob do cuas le caag.
Nwg ua rua kev ua rog taj tug moog thoob qaab ntuj kawg. Nwg luv raab neev hab tsoo tej muv tawg hab hlawv tej daim phaj thaiv.
“Ca le nyob tuabywv hab paub tas kuv yog Vaajtswv. Ib tsoom tebchaws txhawb nqaa kuv, thoob nplajteb qhuas kuv.”
Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus nrug nraim peb, Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv yog peb lub chaw cawm sav.
Ib tsoom tuabneeg 'e, ca le npuaj teg, qw hu nkauj zoo sab xyiv faab nrov nrov rua Vaajtswv.
Yawmsaub yog tug luj dua ndais, yog tug kws txaus ntshai, yog tug vaajntxwv luj kws kaav taag nrho lub nplajteb.
Nwg ua kuas tej tuabneeg lug nyob rua huv peb kev tswjfwm, hab ua kuas tej tebchaws nyob rua huv peb qaab xwb taw.
Nwg xaiv qub txeeg qub teg rua peb, yog yaam kws Yakhauj kws Vaajtswv hlub khaav quas ntxhas.
Vaajtswv nce moog muaj suab qw nrov, Yawmsaub nce moog muaj suab raaj kub yaaj.
Ca le hu nkauj qhuas Vaajtswv, ca le hu nkauj qhuas los maj. Ca le hu nkauj qhuas peb tug vaajntxwv, ca le hu nkauj qhuas los maj.
Tsua qhov Vaajtswv yog tug vaajntxwv kws kaav taag nrho lub nplajteb. Ca le hu nkauj zoo sab qhuas nwg.
Vaajtswv kaav hlo ib tsoom tebchaws, Vaajtswv nyob sau nwg lub zwm txwv kws dawb huv.
Tej thawj huv ib tsoom tuabneeg tuaj txoos ua ke ua Aplahaa tug Vaajtswv haiv tuabneeg. Tej daim phaj thaiv lub nplajteb yog Vaajtswv le. Nwg yog tug kws raug muab txhawb nqaa sab kawg nkaus.
Yawmsaub yog tug luj kawg tswm nyog yuav qhuas nwg kawg rua huv peb tug Vaajtswv lub nroog, yog Yawmsaub lub roob dawb huv
kws sab hab zoo nkauj kawg, ua rua thoob nplajteb xyiv faab hlo, yog lub roob Xi‑oo kws nyob peg suab, yog tug tuam vaajntxwv lub nroog.
Huv tej chaw ruaj khov huv lub nroog hov, mas Vaajtswv qha tas nwg yog lub chaw tiv thaiv kws ruaj khov.
Saib maj, tej vaajntxwv sau zog ua ke, puab ua ib paab tuaj ua rog.
Mas thaus puab pum dheev lub nroog hov puab kuj poob sab nthaav, puab ntshai kawg raag tswv taag.
Puab ntshai ib ce tshee quas nyo hab lwj sab kawg yaam nkaus le tug quaspuj kws ua mob teb,
hab yaam le thaus cua ntsawj saab nub tuaj nplawm Thasi tej nkoj txwg puam tsuaj taag.
Peb tau nov le caag peb kuj pum muaj le ntawd rua huv Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus lub nroog, kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv lub nroog kws Vaajtswv tsaa kuas nyob ruaj moog ib txhws.
Au Vaajtswv, peb xaav txug koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov rua huv koj lub tuam tsev.
Au Vaajtswv, lu lug qhuas koj muaj moog thoob plawg qaab ntuj ib yaam le koj lub npe nrov nchaa moog. Koj txhais teg xws puv nkaus txujkev ncaaj nceeg.
Ca lub roob Xi‑oo zoo sab, ca Yuta tej ntxhais xyiv faab vem yog koj txav txem ncaaj.
Mej ca le moog ncig lub nroog Xi‑oo, moog puag ncig hlo, hab suav tej chaw tsom faaj.
Ua tuab zoo saib tej ntsaa loog hab tshuaj saib tej chaw ruaj khov, sub mej txhad has tau rua lwm tam paub tas,
nuav yog Vaajtswv, yog peb tug Vaajtswv ib txhab ib txhws hab nwg yuav coj peb kev moog ib txhws le.
Ib tsoom tuabneeg 'e, ca le noog tej lug nuav. Txhua tug kws nyob huv qaab ntuj, ca le tig ntsej noog,
tsw has cov yau cov hlub cov muaj cov pluag huvsw.
Kuv lub qhov ncauj yuav has tej lug kws muaj tswvyim, hab kuv lub sab yuav xaav txug kev txawj ntse.
Kuv yuav tig ntsej noog tej paaj lug, kuv yuav ntaus nkauj nog ncaas txhais tej txhaj mim txwv.
Ua caag kuv yuav ntshai rua thaus raug kev ceblaaj txom nyem, hab thaus cov tuabneeg txhum kws tswm txom kuv nyob vej kuv,
yog cov tuabneeg kws tso sab rua puab tej nyaj txag, hab khaav txug qhov kws puab muaj txag nplua quas mag?
Tsw muaj leejtwg txhwv tau nwg tug kheej, hab them taug nwg txujsa le nqe rua Vaajtswv.
Tsua qhov tas tug nqe kws txhwv tau txujsa hov kim heev, npaum twg los kuj tsw txaus
kws yuav ca nwg muaj txujsa nyob moog ib txhws, hab tsw pum qhov tuag.
Nwg yuav pum tas tug kws txawj ntse los kuj yuav tuag, tug tuabneeg ruag hab tug tsw paub qaabhau los kuj yuav puam tsuaj ib yaam nkaus, yuav tseg puab tej nyaj txag ca rua lwm tug.
Txawm yog puab txeev hu puab thaaj aav lawv le puab tej npe, los puab lub qhov ntxaa yeej yog puab lub vaaj tse moog ib txhws, yog puab le chaw nyob moog taag txhua tam.
Tuabneeg lub meej mom paab tsw tau nwg caj sa nyob, puab kuj zoo yaam nkaus le tej tsaj txhu kws yuav puam tsuaj xwb.
Nuav yog txujkev kws cov kws tso sab rua puab tug kheej yuav taug, nuav yog cov kws txaus sab rua puab tej lug lub khuab thaus kawg.

Puab raug teem moog rua huv tub tuag teb yaam le tej yaaj. Tug yug yaaj kws coj puab yog txujkev tuag, puab nqeg ncaaj nraim rua huv qhov ntxaa, puab lub cev yuav lwj taag. Tub tuag teb yog puab lub tsev nyob.
Tassws Vaajtswv yuav txhwv kuv tug ntsuj plig dim huv tub tuag teb qaab fwjchim, tsua qhov Vaajtswv yuav txais kuv.
Mej tsw xob ntshai rua thaus leejtwg nplua nuj tuaj, hab thaus nwg vaaj tse muaj koob meej  quas zug tuaj,
tsua qhov thaus nwg tuag nwg tsw coj daabtsw moog, nwg tej koob meej tsw nrug nwg nqeg moog.
Txawm yog thaus nwg tseed muaj txujsa nyob nwg suav tas nwg tau zoo, hab txawm yog luas qhuas nwg thaus nwg vaam meej,
los nwg tseed yuav moog nrug nwg tej laug nyob kws yuav tsw rov pum dua qhov kaaj hlo le.
Tuabneeg lub meej mom paab tsw tau nwg caj sa nyob, puab kuj zoo yaam nkaus le tej tsaj txhu kws yuav puam tsuaj.
Tug muaj fwjchim luj kws yog Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has, hab hu lub nplajteb txwj saab nub tuaj moog txug saab nub poob.
Vaajtswv ci huv lub nroog Xi‑oo tuaj, yog lub nroog kws zoo nkauj kawg nkaus.
Peb tug Vaajtswv tuaj, nwg tsw tau nyob ntsag tu. Muaj nplaim tawg kub ceev moog ua nwg ntej, muaj cua daaj cua dub ntsawj hlub vej puag ncig nwg.
Nwg hu lub ntuj sau u hab lub nplajteb tuaj, sub nwg txhad txav txem rua nwg haiv tuabneeg has tas,
“Ca le sau zog cov kws muab sab npuab kuv lug cuag kuv, yog cov kws muab tsaj xyeem cog lug rua kuv.”
Lub ntuj qha Vaajtswv txujkev ncaaj nceeg, tsua qhov Vaajtswv yog tug kws txav txem ntaag.
“Kuv haiv tuabneeg 'e, ca le tig ntsej noog, kuv yuav has, Yixayee 'e, kuv yuav ua timkhawv kom mej. Kuv yog Vaajtswv, yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
Kuv tsw ntuag mej txug qhov kws mej muab tsaj xyeem. Tej kws mej muab hlawv xyeem nyob ntawm kuv lub xubndag tsw tu le.
Kuv tsw cheem tsum ib tug txwv nyuj ntawm mej lub tsev, lossws ib tug txwv tshws ntawm mej lub nkuaj hlo le.
Tsua qhov txhua tug tsaj qus huv haav zoov, hab tej tsaj txhu sau quas txheeb lub roob yog kuv le.
Kuv paub txhua tug noog sau tej roob, hab txhua tug tsaj kws nkaag huv tshaav zaub yog kuv le.
Yog kuv tshaib kuv yuav tsw has mej, tsua qhov lub nplajteb hab txhua yaam kws nyob huv yog kuv le.
Kuv noj tej nqaj txwv nyuj hab haus ntshaav tshws lov?
Ca le coj tej lug ua tsaug tuaj xyeem rua Vaajtswv, hab pauj tej kws mej yeem lug r ua tug kws Luj Dua Ndais.
Ca le hu thov kuv rua nub kws raug ceblaaj, kuv yuav cawm mej dim hab mej yuav ua rua kuv tau koob meej.”
Tassws Vaajtswv has rua cov tuabneeg limham tas, “Koj muaj feem daabtsw cim kuv tej kaab ke, lossws koj daim tawv ncauj has kuv tej lug cog tseg?
Tsua qhov mej ntxub tej lug qhuab qha, hab muab kuv tej lug laim rua tom mej qub qaab.
Yog mej pum tub saab mej ca le nrug puab ua ke, hab moog koom nrug cov tuabneeg ua nkauj ua nraug ua ke.
Mej qheb hlo mej lub ncauj has lug phem, hab tej lug daag ntxag lu rawv mej tug nplaig.
Mej nyob tsawg ab ham mej tej kwvtij, mej tseed xyaav mej tej kwvtij kws koom nam.
Mej tub ua tej nuav los kuv nyob tuabywv, tes mej xaav tas kuv zoo ib yaam le mej. Tassws nwgnuav kuv ntuag mej hab has mej qhov txhum.
“Mej cov kws nov qaab Vaajtswv, ca le tshuaj saib zaaj nuav. Yog tsw ua le nuav kuv yuav muab mej dua, yuav tsw muaj ib tug twg paab tau mej dim.
Tug kws coj tej lug ua tsaug tuaj xyeem kuj yog ua rua kuv tau ntsej muag. Kuv yuav ua Vaajtswv txujkev cawm dim tshwm rua tug kws tu nwg lub neej raug cai.”
Au Vaajtswv, thov koj khuvleej kuv lawv le koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov, thov tshem kuv tej kev faav xeeb kuas pluj moog lawv le koj txujkev khuvleej kws muaj nplua quas mag.
Thov ntxuav kuv tej kev phem kev qas pluj taag, hab ntxuav kuas kuv dawb huv tsw muaj txem.
Kuv paub kuv txujkev faav xeeb, hab kuv lub txem nyob rawv ntawm kuv xubndag.
Kuv tau ua txhum rua koj, yog ua rua koj tuab leeg xwb, hab ua tau tej kws koj pum tas phem kawg, koj txhad txav txem raug cai, hab qhov kws koj rau txem tsw muaj chaw thuaj le.
Saib maj, kuv yeej yug lug huv txujkev txhum, hab kuv nam xeeb kuv huv txujkev txhum txem.
Koj yeej xaav yuav qhov tseeb huv nruab sab, vem le nuav thov koj qha tswvyim rua huv kuv lub sab.
Thov muab zaub txwg theem ua kevcai ntxuav kuv, kuv txhad le huv, thov ntxuav kuv, kuv txhad le dawb dua daus xwb daus npu.
Thov ca kuv nov txujkev xyiv faab kev zoo sab, thov ca kuv tej pob txhaa kws koj tsoo ntsoog lawd rov xyiv faab.
Thov fee plhu ntawm kuv lub txem, hab tshem kuv tej kev txhum txem huvsw moog.
Au Vaajtswv, thov koj tswm lub sab dawb huv rua huv kuv, hab pub lub sab tshab ruaj khov rua kuv.
Tsw xob muab kuv laim pov tseg ntawm koj lub xubndag moog, hab tsw xob coj koj tug Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv ncaim kuv moog.
Thov pub txujkev xyiv faab kws koj cawm kuv dim rov rua kuv, hab thov pub kuv muaj lub sab npuab koj moog le.
Mas kuv yuav qha cov kws faav xeeb paub koj txujkev, hab cov tuabneeg muaj txem yuav rov lug cuag koj.
Au Vaajtswv koj yog tug Vaajtswv kws cawm kuv dim, thov koj cawm kuv dim qhov kws ua rua luas lug ntshaav, mas kuv tug nplaig yuav hu nkauj txug qhov kws koj cawm dim.
Au tug Tswv,  thov koj qheb kuv lub qhov ncauj, mas kuv daim tawv ncauj txhad has tej lug kws qhuas koj.
Koj tsw zoo sab rua tej tsaj kws muab xyeem. Txawm yog kuv ua kevcai hlawv xyeem los koj tsw txaus sab yuav.
Tej kws muab xyeem es Vaajtswv txaus sab yuav yog lub sab mog sab muas. Au Vaajtswv, koj yuav tsw fee plhu ntawm lub sab mog sab muas kws leeg txem tag tag.
Thov koj ua zoo rua Xi‑oo lawv le koj lub sab nyam, thov rov ua ntsaa loog thaiv Yeluxalee.
Mas koj yuav zoo sab rua tej tsaj kws muab xyeem raug kev raug cai, yog tej kws tua xyeem hab tej kws muab hlawv kheej xyeem. Mas yuav muab txwv nyuj xyeem rua sau koj lub thaaj.
Nam tuabneeg muaj fwjchim 'e, ua caag koj yuav khaav qhov kws koj ua phem? Vaajtswv txujkev hlub yeej muaj taag naj taag nub.
Nam tuabneeg daag 'e, koj ntaus tswvyim ua kuas puam tsuaj, koj tug nplaig ntse ib yaam le nav chais ntse.
Koj nyam kev phem heev dua kev zoo, koj nyam kev daag heev dua has tseeb.
Tug nam nplaig daag 'e, koj nyam has txhua lu lug kws ua kuas puam tsuaj xwb.
Tassws Vaajtswv yuav muab koj tsoo kuas puam tsuaj moog ib txhws, nwg yuav ntsab nkaus koj chua koj tawm huv koj lub tsev moog, nwg yuav muab koj dob huv cov tuabneeg caj lub tebchaws moog.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav pum hab yuav ntshai, hab yuav luag nwg has tas,
“Swm saib tug kws tsw kheev ca Vaajtswv ua nwg lub chaw cawm sav, nwg tso sab rua nwg tej kev muaj txag nplua nuj, hab muab qhov kws ua limham lug txhawb nwg tug zug.”
Kuv mas zoo yaam nkaus le tsob txwv aulib ntsuab ntsuab nyob huv Vaajtswv lub tsev, kuv tso sab rua Vaajtswv txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov moog ib txhab ib txhws.
Kuv yuav ua koj tsaug ib txhws le rua tej kws koj tau ua lug lawm, kuv yuav tshaaj tawm koj lub npe taab meeg cov kws fwm koj tsua qhov koj lub npe zoo kawg.
Cov tuabneeg ruag xaav huv lub sab tas, “Tsw muaj Vaajtswv.” Puab lub sab phem kawg le hab puab ua tej kev txhum kws qas vuab tsuab. Tsw muaj ib tug twg ua zoo hlo le.
Vaajtswv saib sau ntuj tuaj rua tuabneeg nplajteb, saib yuav muaj ib tug twg kws ntse hab nrhav Vaajtswv.
Puab txhua tug kuj poob ntawm Vaajtswv lawm, hab puab lub sab phem taag huvsw ib yaam nkaus. Tsw muaj ib tug ua zoo, tsw muaj hlo le.
Cov kws ua phem tsw paub le lov, yog cov kws noj kuv haiv tuabneeg yaam le noj ncuav, hab tsw taij thov Vaajtswv le?

Puab yuav nyob ntshai kawg ua sab puag tsug, ntshai heev dua le kws puab txeev ntshai, tsua qhov Vaajtswv ua rua cov tuabneeg kws tuaj ntaus mej tej pob txhaa dha rw quas sua. Mej ua rua puab raug txaaj muag tsua qhov Vaajtswv tub tso puab tseg lawm.
Xaav kuas muaj kev cawm dim tshwm huv Xi‑oo tuaj rua cov Yixayee. Thaus Vaajtswv pub nwg haiv tuabneeg rov vaam meej le qub, Yakhauj yuav xyiv faab, Yixayee yuav zoo sab.
Au Vaajtswv, thov koj lub npe cawm kuv dim, thov koj tug fwjchim tsaa kuv muaj cai.
Au Vaajtswv, thov koj noog kuv lub suab thov, thov tig ntsej noog kuv tej lug ntawm kuv lub qhov ncauj.
Vem yog cov tuabneeg khaav theeb tub sawv tawm tsaam kuv, cov tuabneeg ua nruj ua tswv nrhav txuv kuv txujsa, puab tsw ca Vaajtswv nyob ntawm puab lub xubndag.
Vaajtswv yeej yog tug kws paab kuv, Tug tswv  yog tug kws tsom kwm kuv txujsa.
Nwg yuav muab tej kev phem rov pauj rua kuv cov yeeb ncuab. Thov koj kws ua ncaaj nceeg ua kuas puab puam tsuaj.
Kuv yuav xyeem hov txhua chaw lawv le kuv zoo sab pub rua koj. Au Yawmsaub, kuv yuav ua tsaug koj lub npe tsua qhov yog lub npe zoo kawg.
Koj tub cawm kuv dim txhua txujkev ceblaaj huvsw, hab kuv lub qhov muag tub pum kuv cov yeeb ncuab swb lawm.
Au Vaajtswv, thov koj tig ntsej noog kuv tej lug thov, thov tsw xob fee qhov kws kuv taij thov.
Thov koj tsaa qhov ntsej noog hab teb kuv. Kuv yeej zeem kuv tej kev txom nyem lawm lauj, kuv ntxhuv sab kawg
rua yeeb ncuab lub suab, tsua qhov kws cov tuabneeg limham tswm txom kuv. Puab coj kev ceblaaj txom nyem lug rua kuv, puab khaws tej kev ntxub kuv chim rua nruab sab moog le.
Kuv lub sab lwj quas ntsuav, qhov kws ntshai txujkev tuag poob lug tsuam kuv.
Txujkev ntshai ua ib ce tshee quas nyo kuj lug raug kuv, hab txujkev ceeb hab ntshai nyaab hlo kuv.
Mas kuv has tas, “Kuv xaav xaav muaj tis yaam le nquab txhad le yaa tau tswv moog nyob tug quas yeeg.
Kuv yeej yuav tswv moog deb deb, kuv yuav moog su huv tebchaws moj saab qhua.
Kuv yuav maaj moog nrhav chaw nraim cev moog nraim tej nam cua daaj cua dub kws hlub hlub.”
Au tug Tswv,  thov ua kuas puab ntxhuv taag hab ua kuas puab has lug tsw sws paub, tsua qhov kuv pum kev limham ndais ntuj hab kev sws ntaus sws tua huv lub nroog
hab moog sau ntsaa loog puag ncig lub nroog nruab nub mo ntuj. Tej kev phem hab tej kev ceblaaj txom nyem muaj nyob huv lub nroog,
txujkev puam tsuaj muaj nyob huv plawv. Tej kev quab yuam kev ntxo luas lug noj lug haus muaj huv tej kab khw tsw tu le.
Tsw yog yeeb ncuab luag kuv xwb, tes kuv tub thev taug. Tsw yog cov kws tawm tsaam kuv khaav theeb rua kuv xwb, tes kuv tub tau chaw nraim,
tassws tub yog koj kws yog tug kws nrug kuv nyob sws luag sawv sws txwg, ua kuv phoojywg kwvluag ntaag.
Ib txeev sws thaam qha sab hlo, ib yeej koom ua ib lub sab moog rua huv Vaajtswv lub tuam tsev.
Thov txujkev tuag lug rua puab cov ntawd, ca puab nqeg caj quas tshav rua huv tub tuag teb, vem yog txujkev phem nyob huv puab lub tsev hab nyob huv puab lub sab.
Tassws kuv hu thov Vaajtswv mas Yawmsaub yuav cawm kuv dim.
Kuv tsaa suab ntsaaj suab ywg thaus sawv ntxuv thaus taav su hab thaus tsaus ntuj, mas nwg yuav noog kuv lub suab.
Nwg yuav tso kuv tug ntsuj plig dim tso sab quas lug ntawm qhov kws kuv ua rog, vem yog muaj tuabneeg coob coob sawv ntseg nreeg ua rog rua kuv.
Vaajtswv kws nyob sau lub zwm txwv kaav ib txwm thau u lug yeej yuav noog kuv tej lug thov hab yuav muab puab txu, vem yog puab tsw ntxeev dua sab hab tsw fwm tsw paub ntshai Vaajtswv.
Kuv tug kwvluag tsaa teg ntaus nwg tej phoojywg, nwg rhuav nwg tej lug cog tseg.
Nwg tej lug nplag heev dua le roj mig tassws kev ua rog nyob huv nwg lub sab, nwg tej lug mog lug muas heev dua le roj tassws tej lug hov yog raab ntaaj kws rhu hlo lug.
Ca le muab koj lub nraa tso plhuav rua Yawmsaub, mas nwg yuav tuav rawv koj, nwg yuav tsw ca cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg ua zug quas kais.

Au Vaajtswv, koj yuav muab cov tuabneeg phem laim pov tseg rua huv lub nam qhov kws tub kawg. Cov nam tuabneeg noj nyoog hab faav xeeb yuav tsw muaj txujsa nyob txug ib nraab ntawm puab lub noob nyoog. Kuv mas kuv yuav tso sab rua koj.
Au Vaajtswv, thov hlub kuv vem yog muaj tuabneeg tsuj kuv, cov kws ua rog rua kuv quab yuam kuv taag naj taag nub.
Kuv cov yeeb ncuab muab kuv tsuj ib nub tsaus ntuj le, vem yog muaj tuabneeg coob coob ua rog rua kuv khaav quas ntxhas.
Thaus kuv ntshai kuv tso sab rua koj,
kuv tso sab rua Vaajtswv kws kuv qhuas nwg tej lug, kuv tso sab rua Vaajtswv tsw ntshai le. Tej tuabneeg nqaj tawv yuav ua tau le caag rua kuv?
Puab nrhav kev ua tsw zoo rua kuv tej num taag naj taag nub le, puab tsuas yog xaav txug tej kev phem kws yuav ua rua kuv xwb.
Puab sau zog ua ke tswv nraim tog kuv, puab soj kuv qaab taug kuv lw, puab xaav txuv kuv txujsa.
Thov ua pauj rua puab vem yog puab ua txhum. Au Vaajtswv, thov koj npau tawg es muab cov tuabneeg hov ntaus kuas qaug taag.
Koj tub suav kuv tej kev ntxhuv sab, hab khaws kuv tej kua muag rua huv koj lub thauv, hab muab sau huvsw ca rua huv koj phoo ntawv lawm.
Nub kws kuv thov koj mas koj yuav ua rua kuv cov yeeb ncuab thim rov qaab. Kuv paub tseeb tas yuav muaj le nuav vem Vaajtswv tuaj kuv tog.
Kuv tso sab rua Vaajtswv kws kuv qhuas nwg tej lug, kuv tso sab rua Yawmsaub kws kuv qhuas nwg tej lug,
kuv tso sab rua Vaajtswv tsw ntshai le. Tej tuabneeg yuav ua tau le caag rua kuv?
Au Vaajtswv, kuv yuav tsum pauj tej kws kuv yeem lug tseg rua koj lawm, kuv yuav xyeem hov txhua chaw rua koj ua koj tsaug.
Tsua qhov koj tau tso kuv tug ntsuj plig dim txujkev tuag, koj yeej paab kuv txhais kwtaw dim qhov kws qaug, sub kuv txhad ua tau lub neej ntawm Vaajtswv xubndag taug txujkev kaaj kws pub txujsa.

Au Vaajtswv, thov koj khuvleej kuv, thov khuvleej kuv, tsua qhov kuv tug ntsuj plig lug cawm sav rua huv koj. Kuv lug cawm sav rua huv koj phob tis tug duab ntxoo moog txug thaus tej kev puam tsuaj dhau taag lawd.
Kuv quaj thov Vaajtswv kws Luj Dua Ndais, yog tug Vaajtswv kws ua txhua yaam tav rua kuv.
Nwg yuav tso kev dim sau ntuj lug cawm kuv, nwg yuav ua rua cov kws tsuj yuam kuv raug txaaj muag. Vaajtswv yuav tso nwg txujkev hlub ruaj khov hab nwg txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau lug.
Kuv pw huv plawv cov tsuv ntxhuav kws fuas quas tso noj tuabneeg. Puab tej kaug nav yog tej muv hab tej xub, puab tug nplaig yog raab ntaaj kws ntse.
Au Vaajtswv, thov ca koj raug txhawb nqaa sab dhau lub ntuj, thov koj tug fwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab nthuav thoob plawg nplajteb.
Puab cuab hlua rua kuv txhais kwtaw, kuv tug ntsuj plig ntshai khoov ntshws. Puab khawb qhov taub cuab kuv kev tassws puab rov poob rua huv lub qhov hov.
Au Vaajtswv, kuv lub sab ruaj khov, kuv lub sab ruaj khov tag. Kuv yuav hu nkauj, kuv lub sab yuav seev suab hu nkauj.
Kuv lub sab ca le tswm dheev. Nkauj nog ncaas luj hab nkauj nog ncaas miv 'e, ca le tswm dheev. Kuv yuav tsaa kuas kaaj ntug tswm dheev.
Au tug Tswv, kuv yuav ua koj tsaug rua huv ib tsoom tuabneeg, kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas koj rua huv ib tsoom tebchaws.
Koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov luj kawg moog nto ntuj, hab koj txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau sab moog txug cov fuab.
Au Vaajtswv, thov ca koj raug txhawb nqaa sab dhau lub ntuj, thov koj tug fwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab nthuav thoob plawg nplajteb.
Mej cov num tswv, mej has ncaaj has nceeg lov? Mej tu plaub rua tuabneeg nplajteb ncaaj lov?
Tsw yog le ntawd, mej lub sab npaaj tej tswvyim phem, mej txhais teg tseb kev limham ndais ntuj rua sau nplajteb.
Cov tuabneeg limham yuam kev txwj thaus nruab thab lug lawm, txwj nub kws yug puab lug yeej ua txhum yog has lug daag.
Puab muaj taug yaam nkaus le taug naab, yaam nkaus le naab raaj kub sai laag ntseg kws ntsaws qhov ntsej,
txhad tsw nov tug kws yug naab lub suab hab tsw noog tug kws ua khawv koob rua naab.
Au Vaajtswv, thov tsoo puab cov nav kuas luv, Au Yawmsaub, thov rhu tsuv ntxhuav mog tej los yuaj pov tseg.
Thov kuas puab pluj plag moog yaam le dej ndwg, ca puab zoo le tej nyom kws muab tsuj qhuav taag ntawm txujkev.
Thov ca puab zoo le cov npluaj kws yaaj ua kua nplaum taag, hab zoo le tej mivnyuas kws pob es tsw pum lub nub.
Thov rhuav tshem puab sai dua le lub laujkaub nov kub sau cov nplaim tawg lab hab ntsuab.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav zoo sab rua thaus pum Vaajtswv pauj taub. Puab yuav muab tej tuabneeg phem cov ntshaav lug ntxuav kwtaw.
Tuabneeg yuav has tas, “Yeej muaj nqe zug rua cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tag tag le lauj, yeej muaj Vaajtswv kws txav txem rua nplajteb.”
Au kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov tso kuv dim ntawm kuv cov yeeb ncuab, thov tsom kwm kuv ntawm cov kws sawv tawm tsaam kuv.
Thov tso kuv dim ntawm cov tuabneeg ua phem, hab thov cawm kuv dim ntawm cov tuabneeg noj nyoog.
Saib maj, puab zuv kev tog nrhw kuv txujsa, cov tuabneeg nyaum sau tuaj ua ke tawm tsaam kuv. Au Yawmsaub, tsw yog kuv ua txhum muaj txem,
hab tsw yog kuv yuam kev es puab dha moog npaaj txhwj. Thov koj ca le sawv tseeg tuaj paab kuv hab tsaa qhov muag saib.

Vaajtswv Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus koj yog cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv. Ca le tswm dheev lug teem txem rua ib tsoom tebchaws, thov tsw xob khuvleej cov kws faav xeeb hab xaav tswvyim phem ib tug le.
Puab naj mo rov lug tsej yaam le dev hab ncig moog thoob plhawv lub nroog.
Puab nyob hov ntawd, puab ncauj ncaa quas thua, hab raab ntaaj nyob ntawm puab daim tawv ncauj, puab xaav tas tsw muaj leejtwg yuav noog puab has.
Au Yawmsaub, koj luag puab, koj thuaj ib tsoom tebchaws suavdawg.
Koj kws yog kuv tug zug, kuv yuav nyob tog nrhw koj, tsua qhov Vaajtswv koj yog kuv lub chaw ruaj khov.
Kuv tug Vaajtswv kws muaj kev hlub ruaj khov yuav ntswb kuv, kuv tug Vaajtswv yuav pub kuas kuv pum kuv cov yeeb ncuab swb hlo.
Au tug Tswv kws yog daim phaj thaiv peb, tsw xob tua puab pov tseg tsaam tes kuv cov tuabneeg nov qaab. Ca koj tug fwjchim ua rua puab ua zug quas kais hab qaug ntawg.
Vem yog puab qhov ncauj muaj txem hab puab daim tawv ncauj has tej lug txhum, ca puab maag qhov kws puab khaav theeb. Vem yog puab tej lug tsawm foom hab puab tej lug daag,
ca le ua npau tawg quas vog muab puab ua kuas puam tsuaj, ua rua puab pluj taag tsw tshuav ib tug le, mas tuabneeg thoob qaab ntuj txhad paub tas Vaajtswv kaav Yakhauj.
Puab naj mo rov lug tsej yaam le dev hab ncig moog thoob plhawv lub nroog.
Puab ncig moog nrhav ncauj noj, yog noj tsw tsau tes txawm nyooj.

Tassws kuv yuav hu nkauj txug koj tug fwjchim. Thaus taagkig kuv yuav hu nkauj txug koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov, tsua qhov koj tau ua kuv lub chaw ruaj khov hab ua lub chaw cawm sav rua thaus kuv raug kev txom nyem.
Tug kws yog kuv tug zug, kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas koj. Au Vaajtswv, koj yog kuv lub chaw ruaj khov, hab koj yog tug Vaajtswv kws hlub kuv tsw tu le.
Au Vaajtswv, koj tau muab peb tso tseg hab muab peb tej chaw tiv thaiv tsoo pob taag. Koj tau chim rua peb, tassws thov koj pub peb rov zoo le qub.
Koj tau ua rua lub tebchaws ua zug quas kais hab ua rua aav tu pis nreeg. Thov koj khu tej kaab kws tawg pleb hov tsua qhov aav yoj quas yeeg.
Koj tau ua rua koj haiv tuabneeg raug kev txom nyem heev, koj tau muab cawv txwv maab rua peb haus ua rua peb qaug qos nuag.
Koj tsaa tug chij rua cov kws fwm hab ntshai koj, sub puab txhad tswv xub neev moog rua ntawm tug chij hov.
Thov koj txhais teg xws paab kuas kov yeej hab thov koj teb peb, sub cov kws koj hlub txhad le tau dim.
Vaajtswv has ntawm lub chaw pe hawm nwg tas, “Kuv yuav zoo sab hlo muab lub moos Sekhee faib hab muab lub haav Xukhau faib.
Kile‑a tebchaws yog kuv tug, Manaxe tebchaws yog kuv le, Efa‑i tebchaws yog kuv lub mom hlau, Yuta tebchaws yog kuv tug cwj nreg,
Mau‑a tebchaws yog lub phaaj dej kws kuv ntxuav cev, kuv laim kuv txhais khau rua sau Entoo tebchaws, kuv qw lub suab kws kov yeej rua sau Filixatee tebchaws.”
Leejtwg yuav coj kuv moog rua huv lub moos kws muaj ntsaa loog thaiv? Leejtwg yuav coj kuv moog rua huv Entoo?
Au Vaajtswv, koj muab peb tso tseg lawm lov? Au Vaajtswv, koj tsw nrug peb cov tub rog tawm moog lov?
Thov koj paab peb tiv cov tshawj chim, tsua qhov tuabneeg paab mas tsw tau qaabhau hlo le.
Yog peb nrug Vaajtswv mas peb yuav kov yeej. Nwg yog tug kws yuav tsuj ntag peb cov tshawj chim.
Au Vaajtswv, thov noog kuv lub suab hu, thov koj tig ntsej noog kuv tej lug thov.
Kuv tsaa suab thov koj tim qaab ntug tuaj rua thaus kuv sab yaaj taag. Thov coj kuv lug txug txhwb zeb kws sab dua kuv,
tsua qhov koj yog kuv lub chaw cawm sav, koj yog lub chaw ruaj khov sab sab kws tiv tau yeeb ncuab.
Kuv thov nyob huv koj lub tsev ntaub moog ib txhws, thov ca kuv nyob tso sab plhuav rua huv qaab koj phob tis tug duab ntxoo.
Au Vaajtswv, koj tub nov tej lug kws kuv yeem tseg rua koj, koj tau muab cov kws fwm hab ntshai koj lub npe le qub txeeg qub teg pub rua kuv.
Thov txuas vaajntxwv txujsa, thov pub kuas nwg lub naj xyoo nyob txug txhua tam tuabneeg.
Thov ca nwg nyob sau lub zwm txwv taab meeg Vaajtswv moog ib txhws, thov ca txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov hab txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau tsom kwm nwg.
Mas kuv txhad yuav hu nkauj qhuas koj lub npe tsw tu le, rua thaus kuv naj nub pauj tej kws kuv tau yeem tseg lawm.
Kuv tug ntsuj plig nyob tuabywv tog Vaajtswv ib leeg, kuv txujkev dim lug ntawm nwg lug xwb.
Nwg tuab leeg yog kuv txhwb zeb hab kuv txujkev cawm dim, hab yog lub chaw ruaj khov, kuv txhad tsw ua zug.
Mej txhua tug yuav koom ntaus ib leeg ntev le caag ua rua nwg qaug yaam le lub ntsaa loog kws pheeb zuav hab yaam le lub laj kaab kws tub yuav qaug?
Puab xaav muab nwg thawb poob ntawm lub meej mom. Puab zoo sab rua tej kev daag, puab lub ncauj foom moov, tassws puab lub sab tsawm foom.
Kuv tug ntsuj plig nyob tuabywv tog Vaajtswv ib leeg, vem kuv txujkev vaam lug ntawm nwg lug.
Nwg tuab leeg yog kuv txhwb zeb hab yog kuv txujkev cawm dim, hab yog kuv lub chaw ruaj khov, kuv txhad tsw ua zug.
Kuv txujkev cawm dim hab kuv lub koob meej nyob ntawm Vaajtswv, Vaajtswv yog kuv txhwb zeb luj hab yog kuv lub chaw cawm sav.
Cov pejxeem 'e, ca le tso sab rua Vaajtswv txhua lub swjhawm, ca le qha tej kws nyob huv mej lub sab rua nwg. Vaajtswv yog peb lub chaw cawm sav.
Cov tuabneeg ua yau tsuas yog ib paas cua xwb, cov tuabneeg ua luj kuj yog ib vuag dua xwb. Thaus muab kiv puavleej swb dhau, muab ob leeg ua ke tseed swb dhau ib paas cua.
Tsw xob tso sab qhov kws quab yuam luas, tsw xob vaam do qhov kws lws luas. Yog muaj nyaj txag ntau quas zug, tsw xob tso sab rua tej nyaj hov.
Vaajtswv tau has ib zag, kuv tau nov ob zag lawm tas tug fwjchim yog Vaajtswv le.
Au tug Tswv, txujkev hlub ruaj khov yog koj le, vem koj ua pauj rua tuabneeg lawv le tej kws puab ua.
Au Vaajtswv, koj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv nrhav koj, kuv tug ntsuj plig nqhes nrhav koj. Kuv lub cev qaug zug taag xaav tau koj, yaam le cov aav kws qhuav nkig nkuav tsw muaj dej.
Kuv txeev pum koj huv lub chaw pe koj, hab pum ntsoov koj tug fwjchim luj hab tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab.
Vem koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov zoo dua txujsa, mas kuv daim tawv ncauj yuav qhuas koj.
Kuv yuav qhuas koj taag kuv txujsa, kuv yuav tsaa kuv txhais teg thov rua koj lub npe.
Kuv tug ntsuj plig tsau npo yaam le noj zoo nqaj zoo qhauv, hab kuv daim tawv ncauj yuav qhuas koj xyiv faab hlo.
Thaus kuv pw sau txaaj kuv xaav txug koj, hab kuv tshawb nrhav koj ib mos kaaj ntug.
Vem koj yog tug kws paab kuv, kuv nyob huv koj phob tis tug duab ntxoo hu nkauj xyiv faab hlo.
Kuv tug ntsuj plig tuav rawv koj, koj txhais teg xws fwj kuv ca.
Cov kws nrhav txuv kuv txujsa, yuav nqeg moog rua huv qhov kws tub kawg huv nplajteb.
Puab yuav raug muab cob rua nav ntaaj nav rag, puab yuav ua qauv rua maa noj.
Tassws vaajntxwv yuav xyiv faab rua huv Vaajtswv. Txhua tug kws tuav Vaajtswv lub npe twv yuav qhuas ntxhas nwg, vem cov tuabneeg daag lub qhov ncauj raug muab kaw lawm.
Au Vaajtswv, thov koj noog kuv lub suab ywg, thov tsom kwm kuv txujsa ntawm cov yeeb ncuab kws txaus ntshai kawg le.
Thov muab kuv nraim kuas dhau cov tuabneeg limham tej tswvyim phem, hab nraim kuas dhau cov tuabneeg ua phem tej tswvyim.
Puab huv puab tug nplaig zoo yaam nkaus le huv ntaaj, hab muab tej lug nyaum tso yaam nkaus le nruab xub tshuaj lawm,
Puab nyob huv lub chaw zuv kev tua rua cov tuabneeg tsw txhum, puab tua taamswm tsw ntshai leejtwg le.
Puab tuav rawv puab tug tswvyim phem ruaj ruaj le, puab has txug qhov kws muab vuj hlua cuab tuabywv, puab xaav tas, “Leejtwg pum tau peb?”
Puab npaaj tswvyim phem has tas, “Peb tau xaav tswvyim ntse kawg le.” Tej kws tuabneeg xaav hab tej kws nyob huv puab lub sab yeej tub kawg le.
Tassws Vaajtswv yuav xuas neev tua puab mas puab yuav raug mob taamswm.
Vem yog tim puab tug nplaig nwg yuav ua rua puab puam tsuaj. Txhua tug kws pum puab yuav luag cu hau quas nyo.
Mas suavdawg yuav ntshai, puab yuav pav txug Vaajtswv tej num, hab ua tuab zoo xaav txug tej kws Vaajtswv tau ua lawd.
Ca cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg zoo sab xyiv faab rua huv Yawmsaub, hab cawm sav rua huv nwg. Ca txhua tug kws sab ncaaj qhuas nwg.
Au Vaajtswv, tswm nyog qhuas koj rua huv Xi‑oo, hab yuav muab tej kws yeem lug rua koj,
vem koj yog tug kws noog tej lug thov. Ib tsoom tuabneeg suavdawg yuav tuaj cuag koj
vem yog tim puab lub txem. Thaus peb tej kev faav xeeb kov yeej peb lawm, koj kuj zaam txem rua peb.
Tug kws koj xaiv hab coj lug nyob ze, yog nwg nyob huv koj tej tshaav puam kuj kaaj sab lug. Peb yuav tsau npo tej kws zoo huv koj lub tsev, yog koj lub tuam tsev kws dawb huv.
Au Vaajtswv kws yog peb txujkev dim, koj teb peb hab ua tej num kws txaus ntshai kawg cawm peb. Koj yog tug kws thoob lub qaab ntuj kawg hab havtxwv kws nyob deb kawg vaam khom.
Koj yog tug kws swv koj tug zug tsaa tej roob nyob ruaj, hab muab koj tug fwjchim lug naav.
Koj tswj dej havtxwv lub suab nrov hab tswj tej nam nthwv dej havtxwv lub suab nrov vig voog, hab tswj ib tsoom tuabneeg tej suab nrov ua nqaaj ua nqug.
Cov kws nyob ntawm nrwm nplajteb kws deb kawg kuj ntshai koj tej txujci phemfwj. Koj ua rua lub chaw kws nub tawm hab lub chaw kws nub poob qw zoo sab xyiv faab.
Koj tuaj saib hab ywg dej rua lub nplajteb, koj ua rua muaj txhua yaam nplua mag. Vaajtswv tej haav dej muaj dej puv nkaus, koj pub muaj qoob loos lawv le koj tub npaaj ca lawd.
Koj ywg dej rua tej nav khais ntau nplua mag, hab ua rua tej caaj aav taj taag, hab tso naag lug aav noo quas zaws, hab foom koob moov kuas tawg paaj txw txwv.
Ib xyoos koj foom moov kuas tau qoob ntau nplua quas mag, koj lub tsheb tso tej kws zoo poob lug ntau kawg.
Tej tshaav zaub huv tebchaws moj saab qhua kuj mog quas nyoos, tej pov roob muab kev zoo sab xyiv faab lug naav,
tej nraag taj muaj tej nam paab tshws paab yaaj laum nkaus, huv tej txhoj haa muaj qoob loos zoo puv nkaus, tej nuav qw hu nkauj ua ke xyiv faab kawg.
Thoob lub nplajteb 'e, ca le tsaa suab qw xyiv faab rua Vaajtswv,
ca le hu nkauj has txug nwg lub npe kws muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab, ca le tsaa suab qhuas nwg kawg nkaus le.
Ca le has rua Vaajtswv tas, “Koj teg num txaus ntshai kawg le. Koj tug fwjchim luj kawg nkaus ua rua koj cov yeeb ncuab pe khwb nkaus rua ntawm koj xubndag.
Thoob lub nplajteb pe hawm koj, puab hu nkauj qhuas koj, puab hu nkauj qhuas koj lub npe.”
Ca le lug saib tej kws Vaajtswv tau ua. Tej num kws Vaajtswv ua rua huv plawv tuabneeg mas txaus ntshai kawg le.
Nwg muab dej havtxwv hloov ua nruab nqhuab, tuabneeg xuas kwtaw hlaa hlo lub haav dej. Hov ntawd peb zoo sab xyiv faab rua Vaajtswv,
kws muaj fwjchim kaav moog ib txhws, nwg yog tug kws lub qhov muag saib ntsoov ib tsoom tebchaws. Tsw xob ca cov kws faav xeeb tsaab nwg tug kheej ua luj.
Ib tsoom tuabneeg 'e, ca le qhuas peb tug Vaajtswv, ca le ua kuas nov lub suab qhuas nwg.
Nwg yog tug kws tuav peb kuas muaj txujsa nyob huv cov tuabneeg caj hab tsw pub peb txhais kwtaw nplaam.
Au Vaajtswv, koj tau swm peb, koj swm peb yaam nkaus le swm nyaj.
Koj tau coj peb lug rua huv phob tswg, koj tau muab kev txom nyem rua peb rws.
Koj tau ca tuabneeg caij neeg tsuj peb taubhau, peb tau kwm haav suavtawg kwm haav dej, tassws nwgnuav koj coj peb lug txug qhov chaw kws muaj nplua quas mag.
Kuv yuav coj tej hov txhua chaw kws hlawv xyeem tuaj rua huv koj lub tuam tsev, kuv yuav muab tej kws kuv yeem lug tseg lawm rua koj,
lawv le kuv daim tawv ncauj tau has ca hab kuv lub qhov ncauj tau cog lug rua thaus kuv raug kev ceblaaj txom nyem.
Kuv yuav muab tej tsaj kws rog rog ua kevcai hlawv xyeem, hab muab txwv yaaj hlawv xyeem paa nchus ua ke. Kuv yuav muab txwv nyuj txwv tshws xyeem.
Mej txhua tug kws fwm hab paub ntshai Vaajtswv, ca le lug noog. Kuv yuav has txug tej kws Vaajtswv tau ua paab kuv.
Kuv tsaa suab quaj nrov thov nwg hab kuv tug nplaig qhuas ntxhas nwg.
Yog kuv tseed khaws tej kev txhum rua huv kuv lub sab, tug Tswv  yuav tsw noog kuv tej lug.
Tassws Vaajtswv yeej noog lawm tag, nwg tub tig ntsej noog kuv lub suab thov.
Qhuas Vaajtswv, tsua qhov nwg tsw tso kuv tej lug thov tseg hab tsw muab nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov rhu ntawm kuv moog.
Thov Vaajtswv hlub peb hab foom koob moov rua peb, hab ua nwg lub ntsej muag ci ntsaa ab tuaj rua peb,
sub taag nrho lub nplajteb txhad paub koj txujkev, hab ib tsoom tebchaws suavdawg paub koj txujkev cawm dim.
Au Vaajtswv, thov ca ib tsoom tuabneeg qhuas koj, ca txhua haiv tuabneeg qhuas koj.
Ca ib tsoom tebchaws zoo sab hab hu nkauj xyiv faab, vem koj txav txem ncaaj rua ib tsoom tuabneeg, hab coj ib tsoom tebchaws huv nplajteb.
Au Vaajtswv, thov ca ib tsoom tuabneeg qhuas koj, ca txhua haiv tuabneeg qhuas koj.
Lub nplajteb tau qoob loos lawm, hab Vaajtswv, peb tug Vaajtswv, foom koob moov rua peb.
Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua peb lawm, ca thoob plawg lub qaab ntuj kawg fwm hab paub ntshai nwg.
Thov Vaajtswv sawv tseeg, thov ca nwg cov yeeb ncuab tswv tawg ua saab ua sua, thov ca cov kws ntxub nwg tswv ntawm nwg hauv ntej moog.

Tej paa nchu raug lawv yaa taag moog le caag, thov koj muab puab lawv tswv taag ib yaam le ntawd. Cab ntaab yaaj pes ntsuav rua ntawm suavtawg le caag, kuj thov ca cov tuabneeg limham puam tsuaj ntawm Vaajtswv lub xubndag le ntawd.
Thov ca cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg xyiv faab, ca puab zoo sab xyiv faab rua ntawm Vaajtswv xubndag, ca puab qw zoo sab hlo.
Ca le hu nkauj rua Vaajtswv, ca le hu nkauj qhuas nwg lub npe, ca le tsaa suab hu nkauj rua tug kws caij fuab. Nwg lub npe yog Yawmsaub, ca le qw zoo sab hlo rua ntawm nwg xubndag.
Vaajtswv kws nyob huv nwg lub chaw dawb huv nwg ua cov mivnyuas kws tsw muaj txwv leej txwv, hab tuav cov puj ntsuag txujcai.
Vaajtswv pub cov kws tsw muaj vaag muaj tse tau vaaj tau tsev nyob, nwg tso cov kws raug kaw tawm lug nyob kaaj sab hlo, tassws cov kws faav xeeb nyob huv lub tebchaws kws qhuav nkig nkuav.
Au Vaajtswv, thaus koj coj koj haiv tuabneeg moog, thaus koj moog huv tebchaws moj saab qhua,
lub nplajteb tseeg quas nkawg, lub ntuj tso naag lug taab meeg Vaajtswv xubndag, yog Vaajtswv ntawm lub roob Xinai, kws yog Yixayee tug Vaajtswv.
Au Vaajtswv, koj tso naag lug heev thoob plawg. Thaus koj qub txeeg qub teg qaug zug, koj txhawb kuas rov muaj zug.
Koj paab yaaj lug nyob rua huv. Au Vaajtswv, vem koj ua zoo koj txhad pub rua cov kws txom nyem.
Tug Tswv has nwg tej lug, mas cov kws coj xuv zoo coob kawg le,
has tas, “Tej vaajntxwv hab puab tej tub rog tswv lawm, puab tswv taag lawm.” Cov quaspuj kws nyob huv tsev kuj muab tej hov txhua chaw kws txeeb tau lug faib.
Txawm yog mej cov kws pw huv plawv tej nkuaj yaaj, los mej tau moj zeeg nquab taug kws kauj tis luam nyaj, plaub tis luam tseem kub.
Thaus tug kws muaj fwjchim lujv kawg nkaus ua rua tej vaajntxwv tswv ua saab ua sua, mas daus xwb daus npu tau lug rua sau lub roob Xamoo.
Lub roob kws muaj fwjchim luj huv Npasaa 'e, lub roob kws muaj ntau lub ncov huv Npasaa tebchaws 'e,
lub roob kws muaj ntau lub ncov 'e, ua le caag koj yuav saib ua khib sab quas tsawv rua lub roob kws Vaajtswv xaiv ca ua nwg lub chaw nyob, kws yog lub chaw kws Yawmsaub yuav nyob moog ib txhws?
Tug Tswv tuaj ntawm Xinai tuaj rua huv lub chaw dawb huv muaj tsheb ua rog khov kho quas txheeb quas vaam lub nrug nwg ua ke.

Koj nce rua sau lub roob sab, coj cov kws nteg tau nrug koj moog hab txais tej tshaav ntuj ntawm tej tuabneeg, txawm yog cov kws faav xeeb los kuj pub hab, sub koj kws yog Vaajtswv Yawmsaub txhad lug nyob hov ntawd.
Ca le qhuas tug Tswv  kws naj nub rws peb lub nraa. Vaajtswv yog peb txujkev cawm dim.
Peb tug Vaajtswv yog tug Vaajtswv kws cawm dim. Qhov kws dim kev tuag nyob ntawm Vaajtswv Yawmsaub.
Vaajtswv yuav tsoo nwg cov yeeb ncuab lub taubhau kuas tawg, yog cov kws taug txujkev txhum lub taj taubhau kws muaj plaubhau ntev.
Yawmsaub has tas, “Kuv yuav coj puab rov ntawm Npasaa lug, kuv yuav coj puab tawm huv qaab havtxwv lug,
sub mej txhais kwtaw txhad tau kwm puab cov ntshaav hab mej cov dev tug nplaig txhad tau yaim tej tshawj chim cov ntshaav.”
Au Vaajtswv, koj cov tuabneeg ua tsheej ib paab tshwm plawg tuaj lawm, yog kuv tug Vaajtswv kws yog kuv tug vaajntxwv paab tuabneeg, nkaag rua huv lub chaw kws pe hawm koj.
Cov kws hu nkauj moog ua ntej, cov kws ntaus nkauj nog ncaas ua tom qaab kawg, cov hluas nkauj npuaj nruag ntxhas tuaj nruab nraab.
Mej kws yog Yixayee cov noob 'e, ca le qhuas Vaajtswv, ca le qhuas Yawmsaub rua thaus cov tuabneeg coob coob tuaj txoos ua ke.
Xeem Npeeyamee kws yog paab tsawg dua tej moog ua ntej, Yuta cov thawj kws nyob ua tej paab coob coob hab Xenpuloo cov thawj hab Nathali cov thawj moog lawv qaab.
Au Vaajtswv, thov koj npaaj koj tug fwjchim lug. Au Vaajtswv, thov koj ua koj tug zug tshwm lug ib yaam le koj tub ua paab peb lug lawm.
Vem yog muaj koj lub tuam tsev huv Yeluxalee mas tej vaajntxwv txhad coj tshaav ntuj tuaj pub rua koj.

Thov koj txwv tej tsaj qus kws nyob huv tej haav lojkov, yog paab txwv nyuj hab cov mivnyuas nyuj kws yog ib tsoom tuabneeg, moog txug thaus puab txu fwjchim es coj nyaj daim tuaj pub rua koj. Thov koj ua rua cov tuabneeg kws nyam ua rog tswv ua saab ua sua taag.
Thov ca puab coj tej tooj lab huv Iyi tebchaws lug, ca Khuj  tebchaws maaj tsaa teg rua Vaajtswv.
Ib tsoom tebchaws huv nplajteb 'e, ca le hu nkauj rua Vaajtswv, ca le hu nkauj qhuas tug Tswv,
yog tug kws caij cov fuab sau ntuj kws yeej nyob ib txhab ib txhws lug. Noog maj, nwg xaa nwg lub suab tawm moog, yog lub suab kws muaj fwjchim luj.
Ca le qhuas tas Vaajtswv muaj fwjchim, nwg fwjchim meej mom nyob sau cov Yixayee, nwg tug fwjchim nyob sau nruab ntug.
Vaajtswv nyob huv lub chaw kws pe nwg mas txaus ntshai kawg, nwg yog cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv, nwg pub nwg tug zug hab nwg tug fwjchim rua nwg haiv tuabneeg. Ca le qhuas Vaajtswv.
Au Vaajtswv, thov cawm kuv dim, tsua qhov dej nyaab nto kuv cej daab lawm.
Kuv zum rua huv lub paag haav av tub tub tsw muaj daabtsw tag taw. Kuv lug rua huv qhov kws dej tub mas dej ndwg lug nyaab hlo kuv.
Kuv quaj quaj qaug zug taag, kuv roj paas qhuav taag, kuv qhov muag tsaus muag taag vem kuv tog rawv kuv tug Vaajtswv.

Cov tuabneeg kws laam ntxub kuv do do mas muaj ntau dua kuv cov plaubhau sau taubhau. Cov tuabneeg kws xaav txuv kuv muaj fwjchim heev, puab laam ua yeeb ncuab rua kuv do do le. Nwgnuav kuv yuav tsum thim tej kws kuv tsw tau nyag moog hab lov?
Au Vaajtswv, koj yeej paub tas kuv yuam kev, tej kev txhum kws kuv ua zais tsw tau ntawm koj.

Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, thov tsw xob ca cov kws vaam khom koj raug txaaj muag vem tim kuv. Au Yixayee tug Vaajtswv, thov tsw xob ca cov kws nrhav koj poob ntsej muag vem tim kuv.
Vem saib rua koj mas kuv txhad raug thuaj hab kev txaaj muag npug nkaus kuv lub plhu.
Kuv raug ua ib tug qhua txawv ntsej muag rua kuv cov kwvtij, hab ua lwm haiv tuabneeg rua kuv nam cov tub.
Kuv kub sab quas lug rua koj lub tuam tsev kawg daag kawg zug mas tej lug kws luas thuaj koj txhad poob rua sau kuv.
Thaus kuv txu lub sab yoo mov mas kuv txhad raug luas thuaj luag.
Thaus kuv muab khaub seev tsaaj lug naav kuv tag luas ncauj luas lu.
Cov kws nyob ntawm rooj loog kuj has txug kuv, cov kws quav dej quav cawv phim nkauj hu txug kuv.

Au Yawmsaub, kuv tug kheej mas kuv thov koj. Au Vaajtswv, lub swjhawm kws txaus koj sab, thov koj teb kuv vem koj txujkev hlub ruaj khov muaj nplua quas mag. hab muab koj txujkev cawm dim kws tso sab tau paab kuv.
Thov cawm kuv dim huv lub paag av kws zum, thov tso kuv dim ntawm kuv cov yeeb ncuab hab dim huv tej dej tub tub.
Thov tsw xob ca dej ndwg nyaab hlo kuv, thov tsw xob ca qhov dej tub nqog kuv, tsw xob ca kev tuag tuab kaug kuv.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj teb kuv tsua qhov koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov zoo kawg. Vem koj txujkev khuvleej muaj nplua quas mag thov tig lug rua kuv.
Koj tsw xob fee plhu ntawm koj tug qhev. Kuv raug txom nyem lwj sab, thov kawgkag teb kuv.
Thov lug ze kuv, thov txhwv kuv dim, thov tso kuv dim vem kuv muaj yeeb ncuab.
Koj yeej paub tej kws luas thuaj kuv, hab paub kuv kev txaaj muag hab kev poob ntsej muag. Koj yeej paub kuv cov tshawj chim huvsw lawm.
Kuv raug luas thuaj ua rua kuv lub sab lwj taag kuv txhad poob sab nthaav. Kuv nrhav ib tug khuvleej tassws tsw muaj le, kuv nrhav ib tug nplig kuv tassws nrhav tsw ntswb.
Puab muab tshuaj ab ua mov rua kuv noj, thaus kuv nqhes dej puab muab kua qaub rua kuv haus.
Thov ca puab lub rooj noj ua yej ua ntxab cuab puab, ca puab tej kev noj haus xyeem rua Vaajtswv ua qhov taub cuab puab.
Thov kuas puab lub qhov muag tsaus, puab txhad tsw pum kev, hab ua kuas puab lub duav saav moog le.
Thov nchuav koj txujkev npau tawg rua sau puab hab muab koj txujkev chim kws kub kawg lawv kuas cuag puab.
Ca puab lub yeej nyob do cuas, tsw xob tseg leejtwg nyob huv puab tej tsev ntaub.
Puab tswm txom tug kws raug koj nplawm, puab pheej pav txug tug kws koj ua kuas mob lawd tej kev txom nyem.
Thov koj rau txem rua puab rau taag los rau thab, thov koj tsw xob zaam puab lub txem le.
Thov muab puab npe thuam huv phoo ntawv kws sau cov tuabneeg caj tej npe moog, tsw xob muab puab nce npe rua huv cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg.
Kuv raug kev txom nyem hab raug mob. Au Vaajtswv, thov koj cawm kuv hab muab kuv txawb rua lub chaw sab.
Kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas Vaajtswv lub npe, kuv yuav ua nwg tsaug qhuas nwg lub koob meej.
Tej nuav yuav txaus Yawmsaub lub sab heev dua le tua nyuj lossws xyeem taag nrho txwv nyuj kub hab rau huvsw.
Ca cov kws raug quab yuam pum hab zoo sab. Mej cov kws nrhav Vaajtswv, ca mej lub sab rov muaj zug,
tsua qhov Yawmsaub noog cov tuabneeg txom nyem, hab tsw nov qaab nwg cov tuabneeg kws raug kaw.
Lub ntuj lub teb hab dej havtxwv hab txhua yaam kws moog moog lug lug rua huv ca le qhuas nwg.
Tsua qhov Vaajtswv yuav cawm Xi‑oo kuas dim, hab yuav tswm Yuta tej moos dua tshab, mas nwg cov tuabneeg yuav tau nyob rua huv ua puab teej puab tug,
nwg cov qhev tej tub ki yuav tau ua qub txeeg qub teg, hab cov kws nyam Vaajtswv lub npe yuav nyob rua huv.
Au Vaajtswv, thov koj txaus sab cawm kuv dim, au Yawmsaub, thov maaj nroog tuaj paab kuv lauj!
Thov ca cov kws xaav txuv kuv txujsa raug txaaj muag hab lub sab ruag qhwv taag. Thov ca cov kws xaav ua rua kuv mob raug lawv thim rov qaab hab poob ntsej muag.
Thov ca cov kws luag nyos kuv poob sab nthaav vem puab raug txaaj muag.
Thov ca txhua tug kws nrhav koj xyiv faab hab zoo sab rua huv koj. Thov ca cov kws nyam koj txujkev cawm dim has tsw tu tas, “Vaajtswv luj kawg nkaus.”
Kuv yog tug pluag hab txom nyem. Au Vaajtswv, thov leej maaj tuaj cuag kuv. Koj yog tug kws paab kuv hab cawm kuv dim. Au Yawmsaub, tsw xob tog ntev.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv lug cawm sav rua huv koj. Thov tsw xob ca kuv raug txaaj muag hlo le.
Vem koj ncaaj nceeg, thov koj paab hab cawm kuv. Thov tig ntsej noog kuv hab cawm kuv dim
Thov koj ua txhwb zeb kws kuv nraim cev, yog lub chaw ruaj khov kws cawm kuv dim, tsua qhov koj yog kuv txhwb zeb hab kuv lub chaw ruaj khov.
Au kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov cawm kuv dim huv cov tuabneeg limham txhais teg, dim huv cov tuabneeg tsw ncaaj hab tuabneeg nyaum lub xwb teg.
Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, koj yog kuv lub chaw vaam, koj yog kuv lub chaw tso sab txwj thaus yau lug.
Txwj thaus yug kuv lug kuv yeej vaam koj, koj yog tug kws coj kuv tawm huv nam lub plaab lug. Kuv yeej qhuas koj tsw tu ncua le.
Kuv ua txujci rua tuabneeg coob coob phemfwj, tassws koj yog kuv lub chaw cawm sav kws ruaj khov.
Tej lug qhuas koj puv nkaus kuv lub qhov ncauj, hab ua rua koj tau koob meej ib nub tsaus ntuj.
Thaus kuv laug lawd thov tsw xob muab kuv laim tseg, thaus kuv tug zug taag lawm thov tsw xob tso kuv tseg.
Kuv cov yeeb ncuab pheej has txug kuv, cov kws tog nrhw txuv kuv txujsa pheej ntaus tswvyim,
hab has tas, “Vaajtswv tso nwg tseg lawm. Ca le lawv moog nteg nwg, tsua qhov tsw muaj leejtwg yuav paab nwg dim.”
Au Vaajtswv, tsw xob nyob deb kuv, au kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov maaj nroog tuaj paab kuv.
Thov ca cov kws tawm tsaam kuv raug txaaj muag hab raug puam tsuaj. Thov ca cov kws nrhav kev ua phem rua kuv raug thuaj raug luag poob ntsej muag kawg.
Tassws kuv yuav muaj sab vaam moog tsw tu le, kuv tseed yuav qhuas koj heev zuj zug.
Kuv lub qhov ncauj yuav pav txug koj tej num ncaaj nceeg, yuav has txug tej num kws koj cawm kuv dim ib nub tsaus ntuj, txawm yog tej num hov ntau kawg kuv paub tsw taag kuj xwj.
Kuv yuav coj Vaajtswv Yawmsaub tej num kws muaj fwjchim moog hab, kuv yuav qhuas koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg kws yog koj tuab leeg le.
Au Vaajtswv, koj tub qha kuv txwj thaus yau lug, hab kuv tseed pav koj tej num phemfwj.

Txawm yog txug thaus kuv laug heev plaubhau dawb paug kuj xwj, au Vaajtswv, koj tsw xob tso kuv tseg, moog txug thaus kuv pav koj tug fwjchim rua txhua tam kws yuav lug, hab pav koj tug zug rua tej kws tseed yuav yug lug.
Au Vaajtswv, koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg moog txug sau ntuj kws sab kawg. Au Vaajtswv, koj yog tug kws ua tej num luj, leejtwg yuav zoo cuag le koj?
Koj yog tug kws ua rua kuv ntswb kev ceblaaj txom nyem ntau heev, mas koj yuav ua rua kuv rov muaj zug, hab yuav coj kuv tawm lub qhov tub tub huv nplajteb rov lug.
Koj yuav pub koob meej tsaav rua kuv, hab rov nplig kuv.
Au kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv yuav ntaus nkauj nog ncaas luj qhuas koj txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau. Au Yixayee tug Tswv kws Dawb Huv, kuv yuav ntaus nkauj nog ncaas miv hu nkauj qhuas koj.
Kuv daim tawv ncauj yuav qw xyiv faab hlo rua thaus kuv hu nkauj qhuas koj. Kuv tug ntsuj plig kws koj cawm dim yuav hu hab.
Kuv tug nplaig yuav has txug koj txujkev paab kws ncaaj nceeg taag naj taag nub, tsua qhov cov kws nrhav kev ua phem rua kuv raug txaaj muag hab poob ntsej muag lawm.
Au Vaajtswv, thov koj pub koj txujkev kws tu plaub ncaaj rua vaajntxwv, hab pub koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg rua nwg.
Thov ca nwg ua ncaaj kaav koj cov tuabneeg hab tu plaub ncaaj rua koj cov tuabneeg kws pluag.
Ca tej roob tshwm kev vaam meej rua cov pejxeem hab tej pov roob tshwm txujkev ncaaj nceeg.
Thov kuas vaajntxwv has cov pejxeem kws pluag tej plaub, hab cawm cov tuabneeg txom nyem kuas dim, hab tsoo cov kws quab yuam luas.
Thov kuas nwg muaj txujsa nyob ntev ib yaam le lub nub hab ib yaam le lub hli, ib tam dhau ib tam moog le.
Thov kuas nwg zoo yaam nkaus le naag kws lug rua sau tej nroj tsuag kws nyav txav, hab zoo yaam le pluav naag kws lug ntub lub nplajteb.
Thaus nwg tseed nyob, thov kuas txujkev ncaaj nceeg vaam meej tuaj hab kev sab tug muaj nplua quas mag moog txug thaus lub hli tsw muaj lawm.
Thov kuas nwg kaav taag nrho ntawm havtxwv saab nub tuaj moog txug havtxwv saab nub poob, hab ntawm tug dej Yufeti moog txug qaab ntuj kawg.
Ca cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv ntuj nraag teb do pe rua ntawm nwg xubndag, hab ca nwg cov yeeb ncuab yaim moov aav.
Ca lub nroog Thasi hab tej koog povtxwv tej vaajntxwv them se rua nwg. Ca Senpa hab Xenpa tej vaajntxwv coj hov txhua chaw tuaj pub.
Thov kuas ib tsoom vaajntxwv suavdawg pe nwg, hab ib tsoom tebchaws suavdawg ua koom rua nwg.
Tsua qhov nwg tso cov tuabneeg txom nyem dim rua thaus puab thov, yog cov tuabneeg pluag hab yog cov kws tsw muaj leejtwg paab.
Nwg khuvleej cov tuabneeg tsw muaj zug hab cov kws txom nyem, hab cawm cov tuabneeg txom nyem txujsa.
Nwg txhwv puab txujsa ntawm txujkev raug quab yuam hab raug ua nruj ua tswv. Nwg saib puab cov ntshaav tswm txaj.
Thov ca nwg muaj txujsa nyob ntev, thov ca luas coj tej kub huv moos Senpa tuaj pub rua nwg. Ca luas thov Vaajtswv paab nwg tsw tu le hab thov Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua nwg taag naj taag nub.

Thov kuas muaj qoob loos nplua mag huv lub tebchaws, ca txhua lub roob muaj qoob loos zoo rawv lwb quas li, thov kuas ntsu qoob yaam le lub roob Lenpanoo. Hab ca cov tuabneeg huv tej moos fuam vaam coob yaam nkaus le tej nroj tsuag tom teb.

Thov kuas nwg lub npe nyob moog ib txhws, thov kuas nwg lub koob meej nyob moog ntev yaam nkaus le lub nub. Vem yog muaj nwg, thov ca tuabneeg tau koob moov. Ib tsoom tebchaws yuav hu tas nwg yog tug tau koob moov.
Qhuas Yawmsaub kws yog Yixayee tug Vaajtswv, yog tug kws tuab leeg xwb txhad ua tau txujci phemfwj.
Qhuas nwg lub npe kws muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa ab moog ib txhws. Thov nwg tug fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab puv nkaus huv nplajteb huvsw. Amee hab Amee.
Yexi tug tub Tavi tej lug thov taag le nuav.
Vaajtswv yeej ua zoo rua cov Yixayee tag tag le, yog ua zoo rua cov kws lub sab dawb huv.
Kuv mas kuv txhais kwtaw tub yuav dawm, kuv txhais kwtaw tub yuav nplaam tuab tag,
vem yog kuv khib cov kws khaav theeb, rua thaus kuv pum cov tuabneeg phem vaam meej.
Puab tsw muaj mob hlo le, puab lub cev nyob zoo hab muaj zug npho.
Puab tsw raug ceblaaj le lwm tug, puab tsw raug xwm txheej phem le lwm tug.
Vem le nuav puab txhad muab qhov kws khaav theeb lug ua saw coj, puab muab qhov kws ua nruj ua tswv lug ua tsoog naav.
Puab rog rog qhov muag qe tauv, tej tswvyim phem phwj huv puab lub sab lug.
Puab thuaj luag hab has tej lug kws xaav ua phem, puab tsaab ua luj hem tas yuav quab yuam.
Puab tsaa ncauj tawm tsaam lub ntuj, puab tug nplaig kuj lig xaiv thoob nplajteb.
Vaajtswv cov pejxeem txhad tig lawv puab qaab, hab yuav puab tej lug ib yaam le haus dej ntau heev.
Puab has tas, “Vaajtswv yuav paub tau le caag? Tug kws Luj Dua Ndais txawj paub lov?”
Saib maj, cov tuabneeg phem zoo le nuav ntaag, puab pheej noj qaab nyob zoo hab vaam meej tuaj.
Kuv tu kuv lub sab dawb huv, hab ntxuav kuv txhais teg tsw ua txhum do do xwb.
Kuv raug tej xwm txheej phem ib nub tsaus ntuj, hab raug muab nplawm txhua taagkig.
Yog kuv tau has tas, “Kuv yuav has le ntawd,” kuj yog kuv faav xeeb rua koj cov mivnyuas.
Tassws thaus kuv xaav tas kuv yuav nkaag sab zaaj nuav le caag, kuv pum tas yog teg num kws khwv kawg,
txug thaus kuv nkaag moog rua huv lub chaw pe Vaajtswv, kuv txhad tshuaj pum puab txujkev qhov kawg.
Qhov tseeb koj yeej muab puab tso rua huv txujkev kws nplua, koj ua rua puab qaug puam tsuaj taag.
Ib plag ntshws xwb puab raug puam tsuaj, puab raug txujkev ntshai muab ntxuav tu noob nrho moog lawm lauj!
Au tug Tswv, thaus koj tswm dheev lug, koj nov qaab puab tug duab lawm, ib yaam le zaaj npau suav rua thaus yug tswm dheev lug.
Thaus kuv tug ntsuj plig ywg hab chim, thaus chob txug kuv lub sab,
kuv txawm ruag tsw paub daabtsw le, kuv zoo le ib tug tsaj txhu rua koj.
Txawm le caag los kuv pheej nrug nraim koj, koj tuav rawv kuv txhais teg xws ca.
Koj tej lug taw qha coj kuv txuj hauv kev, hab yaav tom qaab koj yuav coj kuv kuas tau koob meej.
Dhau koj lawm kuv muaj leejtwg sau ntuj ceeb tsheej? Dhau koj lawm kuv tsw ntshaw ib yaam daabtws huv lub nplajteb.
Kuv lub cev hab lub sab yuav qaug zug moog, tassws Vaajtswv yog kuv lub sab tug zug, hab yog kuv teej kuv tug moog ib txhws.
Vem tas cov kws nyob deb koj yuav puam tsuaj, koj ua rua cov kws tsw muab sab npuab koj pluj moog.
Kuv mas qhov kws kuv nyob ze Vaajtswv yog qhov zoo. Kuv muab Vaajtswv Yawmsaub ua kuv lub chaw cawm sav, sub kuv txhad tau pav txug koj tej num huvsw.
Au Vaajtswv, ua caag koj muab peb laim pov tseg ib txhws? Ua caag koj yuav npau tawg quas vog rua cov yaaj kws nyob huv koj tshaav zaub?

Thov ncu txug koj cov tuabneeg kws koj tau thau u lug lawm, puab yog cov kws koj tub txhwv lug ua ib haiv tuabneeg ua koj qub txeeg qub teg. Thov ncu txug lub roob Xi‑oo kws yog lub chaw kws koj txeev nyob.
Thov koj txhais kwtaw moog ncig lub chaw kws pob taag ib txhws. Yeeb ncuab tau muab txhua yaam huv lub chaw pe Vaajtswv ua puam tsuaj taag.
Koj cov tshawj chim qw zoo sab huv plawv koj lub tsev dawb huv, puab tau tsaa puab tug chij rua huv.
Saib mas puab zoo yaam nkaus le cov kws tsaa taus yuav ntuv tsob ntoo lawm.
Tej txag ntoo kws muab sais zoo nkauj puab kuj xuas taus xuas rauj tsoo pob taag huvsw.
Puab muab suavtawg hlawv lub chaw pe koj kub nyab taag rua huv aav, puab ua rua lub chaw kws koj lub npe nyob qas tsw huv.
Puab lub sab xaav tas, “Peb yuav kov yeej hlo luas huvsw.” Puab muab Vaajtswv tej chaw dawb huv txhua lub huv lub tebchaws hlawv huvsw.
Peb tsw pum txujci phemfwj daabtsw le, tsw muaj ib tug xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug lawm, peb cov tsw muaj leejtwg paub sov ntev le caag.
Au Vaajtswv, cov tshawj chim yuav luag koj ntev le caag? Yeeb ncuab yuav thuaj koj lub npe moog ib txhws le lov?
Ua caag koj yuav nkaum koj txhais teg? Ca le xyaab koj txhais teg xws ntawm koj lub cev tuaj ua kuas puab puam tsuaj.
Txawm le hov los Vaajtswv kws yog kuv tug vaajntxwv muaj nyob thau u lug lawm, nwg tub coj txujkev cawm dim rua huv lub nplajteb lawm.
Koj swv koj tug fwjchim cais dej havtxwv. Koj tsoo tej zaaj taubhau huv dej havtxwv.
Koj tsoo zaaj Levi‑athaa  cov taubhau hab muab nwg rua tej tsaj qus huv tebchaws moj saab qhua noj.
Koj qheb hauv dej hauv haav. Koj ua rua tej dej cag kws ndwg ib txhws qhuav taag.
Nruab nub los yog koj le, mo ntuj los yog koj le. Koj tswm lub hli hab tswm lub nub nyob ruaj chaw.
Koj tu nrwm huvsw rua lub nplajteb nyob. Koj tswm muaj caij kub caij no.
Au Yawmsaub, thov ncu txug qhov nuav tas cov yeeb ncuab tau luag koj hab cov tuabneeg ruag tau has lug phem le caag rua koj lub npe.
Tsw xob muab tug nquab taug cwb rua tsaj qus, tsw xob nov qaab koj cov tuabneeg pluag txujsa moog ib txhws.
Thov saib rua koj tej lug cog tseg, tsua qhov tej chaw tsaus ntuj huv lub tebchaws mas txujkev ua nruj ua tswv muaj nyob puv nkaus.
Tsw xob ca cov kws raug luas tsuj tau txaaj muag. Ca cov tuabneeg pluag hab cov txom nyem qhuas koj lub npe.
Au Vaajtswv, ca le sawv tseeg, has koj tshaaj plaub. Thov ncu ntsoov tas cov tuabneeg ruag luag koj taag naj taag nub le caag.
Tsw xob nov qaab koj cov tshawj chim lub suab nrov, yog lub suab ua nqaaj ua nqug kws cov tawm tsaam koj pheej qw tsw tu le.
Au Vaajtswv, peb ua koj tsaug, peb ua koj tsaug. Koj lub npe nyob ze. Peb pav koj tej num kws phemfwj.
Koj has tas, “Txug lub swjhawm kws kuv teem ca lawm kuv yuav txav txem ncaaj nceeg.
Thaus lub nplajteb hab txhua tug kws nyob huv tseeg quas nkawg, kuv yog tug kws tuav lub nplajteb tej ncej kuas nyob ruaj khov.
Kuv has rua cov kws khaav theeb tas, ‘Tsw xob khaav theeb,’ hab has rua cov tuabneeg limham tas, ‘Tsw xob tsaa koj txwm kub,
tsw xob tsaa koj tug kub kuas sab hab tsw xob khaav theeb has lug tuam mom.’ ”
Qhov kws tsaa ua luj tsw yog tshwm saab nub tuaj lug lossws tawm saab nub poob tuaj, hab tsw yog tshwm huv tebchaws moj saab qhua lug,
tassws yog Vaajtswv yog tug txav txem, nwg txu ib tug qeg, tsaa ib tug sab.

Tsua qhov huv Yawmsaub txhais teg muaj ib lub khob muaj cov cawv txwv maab kws sws tim npau npuag quas vog puv nkaus. Nwg yuav muab cov cawv hov hliv rua puab haus mas tej tuabneeg limham huv nplajteb suavdawg yuav haus taag nrho khob ntawd.
Tassws kuv yuav zoo sab xyiv faab moog ib txhws, kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv.
Nwg yuav muab cov tuabneeg limham tug kub txav pov tseg, huas cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tug kub mas yuav raug muab tsaa kuas sab.
Huv Yuta puavleej paub Vaajtswv, Vaajtswv lub npe nrov nchaa thoob huv Yixayee.
Vaajtswv lub chaw nyob yog huv Xalee, nwg lub tsev nyob yog huv Xi‑oo.
Nwg nyob qhov ntawd muab raab xub kws ci nplaag hab tej daim phaj hlau hab tej ntaaj hab tej cuab yeej ua rog luv pis ntho pov tseg.
Koj tug fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab, koj tug fwjchim meej mom sab dua tej roob kws nyob moog ib txhws.
Tej tuabneeg sab luj sab tuab raug muab lws lawm, puab tsaug zug moog ib txhws. Cov tub rog suavdawg swv tsw tau puab txais teg lawm.
Au Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv, thaus koj tshev puab mas cov neeg hab cov kws caij neeg feeb tuag taag.
Koj yog tug kws txaus ntshai kawg. Thaus koj chim leejtwg yuav sawv tau ntawm koj xubndag?
Koj nyob sau ntuj muab kev txav txem tshaaj tawm, mas lub nplajteb ntshai hab nyob tuabywv,
rua thaus Vaajtswv sawv tseeg teem txem cawm cov tuabneeg suavdawg kws raug quab yuam huv nplajteb kuas dim.
Tuabneeg tej kev chim ua rua luas qhuas koj ntau dua, cov kws dim tej kev chim hov, koj yuav muab sa hlo rua ntawm duav.
Ca le yeem lug rua Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv hab ua lawv le tej lug yeem tseg hov. Ca cov kws nyob vej puag ncig nwg coj hov txhua chaw tuaj pub rua nwg, yog tug kws tswm nyog ntshai hab fwm,
hab yog tug kws txu cov thawj tej fwjchim, yog tug kws tej vaajntxwv huv nplajteb ntshai kawg.
Kuv quaj thov Vaajtswv, kuv tsaa suab thov nrov rua Vaajtswv sub nwg txhad le noog kuv.
Nub kws kuv raug txom nyem ceblaaj kuv nrhav tug Tswv, thaus mo ntuj kuv tsaa teg thov tsw tsaug leeg le, los tsw muaj ib yaam daabtsw nplig kuv lub sab le.
Kuv xaav txug Vaajtswv mas kuv kuj seev quas yeeg. Kuv tshawb nrhav mas kuv sab ntsws yaaj taag.
Koj tuav rawv kuv daim tawv muag tsw kheev kuas qe muag. Kuv ntxhuv sab kawg has tsw tau ib lus le.
Kuv xaav txug yaav thau u, kuv ncu txug tej xyoo thau u.
Kuv lub sab has lug tuj tawg mo ntuj, kuv tshawb nrhav hab kuv tug ntsuj plig nug has tas,
“Tug tswv yuav muab peb tso tseg moog ib txhws lov? Nwg yuav tsw txaus sab rua peb dua le lawm lov?
Nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov tu ncua moog ib txhws le lov? Nwg lu lug cog tseg taag tsw muaj rua txhua tam lawm lov?
Vaajtswv nov qaab hlub peb lawm lov? Vem nwg chim nwg txhad tsw taab ncuab peb lawm lov?”
Kuv txhad has tas, “Qhov kws kuv raug mob tub yog Vaajtswv kws Luj Dua Ndais txhais teg tsw thooj le qub lawm.”
Kuv yuav ncu txug Yawmsaub tej num, kuv yuav ncu txug tej yaam phemfwj kws koj tau ua yaav thau u lawm.
Kuv yuav tshawb nrhav txhua yaam kws koj tau ua lug lawm hab xaav txug koj tej num kws muaj fwjchim.
Au Vaajtswv, koj txujkev txhad le dawb huv xwb. Muaj tug timtswv twg kws yuav luj cuag le peb tug Vaajtswv?
Koj yog tug Vaajtswv kws ua tej num phemfwj, hab qha koj tug fwjchim tshwm huv plawv ib tsoom tuabneeg.
Koj txhais npaab kws muaj zug tau txhwv koj haiv tuabneeg, kws yog Yakhauj hab Yauxej caaj ceg.
Au Vaajtswv, thaus dej pum koj, thaus tej dej pum koj dej kuj ntshai kawg, huv qaab thu kuj tseeg ua zug kais.
Tej fuab tso naag lug, lub ntuj nrov nroo quas ntwg, koj tej xub ci quas nplaag rua txhua faab.
Koj tej xub tua nrov quas ntwg huv tej khaub zeeg cua, koj tej tsag lig xub ci nplaag rua huv lub qaab ntuj. Lub nplajteb tseeg ua zug quas kais.
Koj txuj nam kev moog huv havtxwv, koj taug kev huv dej havtxwv luj, los tsw muaj leejtwg pum koj tug neev taw.
Koj swv Mauxe hab Aloo txhais teg coj koj haiv tuabneeg yaam nkaus le coj paab yaaj.
Kuv cov tuabneeg 'e, ca le tig ntsej noog kuv tej lug qha, mej ca le tig ntsej noog tej lug ntawm kuv qhov ncauj.
Kuv yuav rua ncauj has paaj lug, kuv yuav has tej lug kws muab npog ca yaav thau u lawm,
yog has txug tej kws peb tau nov tau paub kws peb tej laug tau has rua peb.

Peb yuav tsw muab zais tsw qha rua puab tej tub ki, peb yuav pav rua txhua tam kws saamswm lug kuas paub txug Yawmsaub tej num kws tswm nyog qhuas hab nwg tug fwjchim, hab tej txujci phemfwj kws nwg tau ua.
Nwg tau tswm tsaa tej kaab ke rua huv Yakhauj hab rhawv kevcai rua huv Yixayee, yog tej kws nwg has kuas peb tej laug qha rua puab tej tub ki,
sub lwm tam txhad le paub txug tej nuav, yog puab tej tub ki kws tseed tsw tau yug lug, mas puab yuav sawv qha rua puab tej mivnyuas hab,
sub puab txhad muaj sab vaam rua huv Vaajtswv hab tsw nov qaab Vaajtswv tej num tassws tuav rawv nwg tej lug nkaw,
txhad tsw ua lawv le puab tej laug kws yog tam kws tawv ncauj hab faav xeeb, yog tam kws sab tsw ruaj khov, hab tsw muaj lub sab xwb rua Vaajtswv.
Cov tuabneeg Efa‑i coj neev nti thim ntawm tshaav rog rov qaab rua nub kws ua rog.
Puab tsw tuav Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg hab tsw kaam ua lawv le Vaajtswv txuj kevcai.
Puab tsw ncu txug tej kws Vaajtswv tub ua lug lawm hab ncu tsw txug tej txujci phemfwj kws nwg ua tshwm rua puab.
Nwg tub ua tej num phemfwj rua puab tej laug lub qhov muag pum ntsoov huv Iyi tebchaws hab huv tej laj teb Xau‑aa.
Nwg muab dej havtxwv faib hlo rua ob saab ca puab hlaa huv plawv moog, nwg ua rua dej tauv rua ob saab yaam le ntsaa loog.
Nruab nub nwg muab tauv fuab coj puab mo ntuj nwg ua nplaim tawg ci coj puab ib mos kaaj ntug.
Nwg phua tej pob zeb huv tebchaws moj saab qhua hab pub dej rua puab haus ntau kawg le yaam nkaus le txhawv huv qhov tub lug.
Nwg ua dej txhawv huv phaab zeb lug, nwg ua dej ndwg lug yaam nkaus le ib tug nam dej.
Los puab tseed yimfuab ua txhum rua nwg, puab faav xeeb rua Vaajtswv kws Luj Dua Ndais huv ntuj nraag teb do.
Puab txhob txwm swm Vaajtswv, puab txhad kuas Vaajtswv pub tej kws puab nqhes rua puab noj.
Puab tshev ywg Vaajtswv tas, “Vaajtswv yuav npaaj tau rooj mov rua peb noj huv tebchaws moj saab qhua nuav lov?
Vaajtswv ntaus phaab zeb ua rua dej txhawv lug hab dej ndwg lug nyaab hlo ntug. Nwg yuav muab tau mov tau nqaj rua nwg haiv tuabneeg noj hab lov?”
Vem le hov, thaus Yawmsaub nov lawm nwg npau tawg kawg le, mas muaj suavtawg tshwm plawg rua Yakhauj, hab nwg chim luj quas zug rua Yixayee,
tsua qhov puab tsw ntseeg Vaajtswv hab tsw tso sab rua nwg tug fwjchim kws cawm tau kuas dim.
Txawm le caag los nwg tseed has tau lub ntuj hab qheb tau rooj ntug.
Nwg tso mana  lug rua puab noj nwg pub tej mov sau ntuj lug rua puab.
Tuabneeg tau noj tej tubkhai ntuj tej mov, Vaajtswv pub mov rua puab noj nplua quas mag.
Nwg ua rua cua saab nub tuaj ntsawj rua sau ntuj hab nwg swv nwg tug fwjchim coj tej cua kws nyob saab nraag ntsawj tuaj.
Nwg tso nqaj lug rua puab yaam nkaus le tej moov aav, yog cov noog yaa lug coob npaum le tej xuab zeb huv havtxwv.
Nwg tso poob lug rua huv plawv puab lub zog, poob rua ib ncig puab tej chaw nyob.
Puab tau noj tsau npo, vem yog Vaajtswv pub tej kws puab nqhes rua puab.
Ua ntej kws puab tsw tau zoo nqhes, thaus kws nqaj tseed nyob huv puab qhov ncauj,
Vaajtswv txujkev npau tawg tshwm rua puab, nwg tua puab cov tuabneeg kws muaj zug heev dua luas pov tseg, yog nwg muab cov tuabneeg kws zoo tshaaj huv cov Yixayee pov tseg.
Txawm yog muaj tej xwm nuav huvsw los puab tseed ua txhum. Txawm yog nwg ua tej num phemfwj los puab tsw ntseeg.
Nwg txhad ua rua puab lub noob nyoog pluj taag yaam nkaus le ua paa xwb, hab ua rua puab lub naj lub xyoos pluj plag ua rua puab ntshai kawg le.
Thaus nwg tua puab, puab kuj lug nrhav nwg, puab le ntxeev dua sab hab kub sab quas lug nrhav Vaajtswv.
Puab le ncu txug has tas Vaajtswv yog puab txhwb zeb, Vaajtswv kws Luj Dua Ndais yog tug kws txhwv puab dim.
Tassws puab lub ncauj has lug qaab zwb rua Vaajtswv, hab puab tug nplaig daag nwg xwb.
Puab tsw ruaj sab rua nwg, puab tsw tuav rawv Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg.

Txawm le ntawd los nwg tseed taab ncuab puab, nwg zaam puab tej kev txhum hab tsw ua kuas puab puam tsuaj taag. Vaajtswv tswj quas nreeg nwg txujkev chim ca, nwg tsw khawb nwg txujkev npau tawg huvsw lug.
Nwg ncu ntsoov tas puab tsuas yog tuabneeg nqaj tawv xwb, puab yog cua kws ntsawj moog lawm tsw rov lug dua le lawm.
Puab faav xeeb rua Vaajtswv huv tebchaws moj saab qhua ntau zag, hab ua rua nwg tu sab huv ntuj nraag teb do.
Puab tseed pheej rov swm Vaajtswv sab hab ua rua tug Dawb Huv huv cov Yixayee chim heev.
Puab tsw ncu txug Vaajtswv tug fwjchim, hab tsw ncu txug nub kws Vaajtswv txhwv puab dim huv cov tshawj chim lug,
rua thaus nwg ua tej txujci phemfwj rua huv Iyi tebchaws hab ua nwg tej txujci phemfwj rua huv tej laj teb Xau‑aa.
Nwg muab puab tej haav dej ntxeev ua ntshaav taag, puab txhad haus tsw tau puab tej haav dej.
Nwg tso tej nam paab yoov ntsuab lug rua huv puab lug txuv puab, hab tso qaav lug ua kuas puab puam tsuaj.
Nwg tso kaab lug txov puab tej qoob, tso kooj ntaas lug noj puab tej daag zug.
Nwg tso lawg lug ntaus puab tej txwv maab puam tsuaj, hab tso te lug tua puab tej ntoo txwv cua.
Puab tej nyuj raug lawg ntaus tuag taag, puab tej nam paab yaaj paab tshws raug xub tua.
Nwg tso nwg txujkev chim heev rua sau puab, yog kev npau tawg kev chim hab kev txom nyem, yog paab tubkhai ntuj kws ua kuas puam tsuaj.
Nwg qheb kev rua nwg txujkev chim, nwg tsw tseg puab caj sa le, nwg muab puab txujsa cob nkaus rua tej mob phem.
Nwg muab tej tub hlub huv Iyi tebchaws tua huvsw, yog puab thawj tug zug kws nyob huv Haa tej tsev ntaub.
Vaajtswv coj nwg haiv tuabneeg tawm lug ib yaam le coj yaaj, hab coj puab moog huv tebchaws moj saab qhua yaam le paab yaaj paab tshws.
Nwg coj puab moog tso sab plhuav puab txhad tsw ntshai. Tassws dej havtxwv nyaab hlo puab tej yeeb ncuab.
Nwg coj puab lug rua huv nwg lub tebchaws kws dawb huv, lug txug lub roob kws nwg txhais teg xws txeeb tau.
Nwg muab lwm haiv tuabneeg lawv tawm ntawm puab hauv ntej moog. Nwg muab lub tebchaws faib ua qub txeeg qub teg rua puab, hab ca txhua xeem Yixayee nyob huv lwm haiv tuabneeg tej tsev ntaub.
Los puab tseed swm hab faav xeeb rua Vaajtswv kws Luj Dua Ndais, hab tsw ua lawv le nwg tej lug.
Puab tig rov qaab hab faav xeeb ib yaam nkaus le puab tej laug. Puab lem quas ceeg yaam nkaus le raab neev nti kws swv tsw tau.
Tsua qhov puab ua tej chaw sab teev daab zwg Vaajtswv npau tawg, puab txaug tej txoov daab lug ua rua Vaajtswv khib.
Thaus Vaajtswv tau nov mas nwg txhad npau tawg kawg hab nwg muab Yixayee tso plhuav tseg.
Nwg tseg hlo nwg lub chaw nyob huv Silau, yog lub tsev ntaub kws nwg nyob huv plawv tuabneeg.
Nwg txhad muab lub swb xaab kws yog Vaajtswv tug fwjchim rua yeeb ncuab coj moog, yog muab nwg tug fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab rua huv cov tshawj chim txhais teg.
Nwg muab nwg haiv tuabneeg cob rua nav ntaaj hab nwg npau tawg heev rua nwg qub txeeg qub teg.
Suavtawg rhuav tshem puab tej tub hluas taag hab puab tej ntxhais hluas tsw nov suab nkauj ua tshoob.
Puab cov pov thawj raug ntaaj tua tuag taag, cov pov thawj tej quaspuj tsw paam tsw quaj le.
Mas tug Tswv txhad sawv tseeg yaam nkaus le tswm nruab daab ndub lug, yaam nkaus le ib tug txwvneej muaj zug qw nrov vem yog haus cawv txwv maab.
Nwg ntaus nwg cov yeeb ncuab thim hlo hab ua rua puab txaaj muag ib txhws le.
Nwg tsw leeg yuav Yauxej caaj ceg hab tsw xaiv xeem Efa‑i.
Nwg xaiv xeem Yuta hab lub roob Xi‑oo kws nwg hlub.
Nwg ua lub chaw kws pe nwg zoo yaam le sau ntuj hab zoo yaam nkaus le lub nplajteb kws nwg tswm ca nyob moog ib txhws.
Vaajtswv xaiv nwg tug qhev Tavi hab coj nwg tawm huv nkuaj yaaj lug,
yog coj nwg tawm huv qhov kws yug cov maum yaaj kws muaj mivnyuas mog lug ua tug tswv yug yaaj, yug Yakhauj kws yog Vaajtswv haiv tuabneeg, yog yug Yixayee kws yog Vaajtswv qub txeeg qub teg.
Tavi ua lub sab ncaaj yug puab, nwg txhais teg kws txawj coj tau puab.
Au Vaajtswv, lwm haiv tuabneeg tau txeem moog rua huv koj qub txeeg qub teg, puab tau ua rua koj lub tuam tsev kws dawb huv qas tsw huv, puab tau muab Yeluxalee ua pob taag.
Puab muab koj cov qhev tej cev tuag rua tej laj daav sau nruab ntug noj, hab muab koj cov tuabneeg kws dawb huv tej nqaj rua tej tsaj qus huv nplajteb noj.
Puab muab tej tuabneeg nuav cov ntshaav nchuav lug yaam le dej puag ncig Yeluxalee, hab tsw tshuav leejtwg muab puab log.
Peb raug tej tuabneeg zej zog thuaj luag, hab raug tej tuabneeg kws nyob ib ncig peb luag hab saib tsw taug.
Au Yawmsaub, yuav ntev le caag? Koj yuav chim moog ib txhws le lov? Koj txujkev khib yuav hlawv yaam le suavtawg kub moog le lov?
Thov koj muab koj txujkev chim nchuav rua sau cov tuabneeg kws tsw paub koj, hab rua sau tej tebchaws kws tsw tuav koj lub npe thov.
Vem yog puab tau rhuav tshem Yakhauj hab muab nwg tej chaw nyob tso tseg pam taag.
Thov tsw xob muab peb tej laug tej kev txhum coj lug rau txem rua peb. Thov koj taab ncuab peb sai sai nuav vem peb poob qeg kawg le.
Au Vaajtswv kws yog peb txujkev cawm dim, thov paab peb lauj, vem yog saib rua koj lub npe kws muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab. Thov cawm peb hab zaam peb lub txem vem yog saib rua koj lub npe.
Ua caag ib tsoom tebchaws yuav has tas, “Puab tug Vaajtswv nyob hovtwg?” Thov kuas ib tsoom tebchaws paub taab meeg peb lub qhov muag tas yog koj pauj taub koj cov qhev tej ntshaav kws ndwg lug.
Thov kuas cov kws raug nteg lub suab quaj nrov tuaj txug ntawm koj xubndag. Thov koj swv koj tug fwjchim luj tuav cov raug txem tuag txujsa.
Au tug Tswv, thov pauj tej kws cov kws nyob ib ncig peb thuaj luag koj xyaa npaug rua ntawm puab lub xubndag.
Peb kws yog koj haiv tuabneeg, yog koj paab yaaj kws nyob huv koj lub tshaav zaub yuav ua koj tsaug ib txhws, peb yuav qhuas koj ib tam dhau ib tam moog le.
Au Yixayee tug tswv yug yaaj, koj coj Yauxej ib yaam le coj paab yaaj, thov koj tig ntsej noog. Koj nyob lub zwm txwv sau cov Khelunpee, thov koj tsom tug duab ci tuaj
taab meeg Efa‑i hab Npeeyamee hab Manaxe. Thov tsaa koj tug fwjchim sawv hab lug cawm peb dim.
Au Vaajtswv, thov koj paab peb rov zoo le qub, ca koj lub ntsej muag ci rua peb sub peb txhad le dim.
Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, koj yuav chim rua koj haiv tuabneeg tej lug thov ntev le caag?
Koj tub muab kua muag ua zaub mov rua puab noj, hab muab kua muag rua puab haus txaus nkaus.
Koj ua rua cov kws nyob ib ncig peb nrug peb sws txeeb tebchaws, hab peb cov yeeb ncuab luag peb.
Au Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, thov koj paab peb rov zoo le qub, ca koj lub ntsej muag ci rua peb sub peb txhad le dim.
Koj coj ib tsob txwv maab tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug, koj lawv lwm haiv tuabneeg tawm moog hab muab tsob txwv maab hov cog rua huv.
Koj nthua thaaj teb du lug, tsob txwv maab ntsa caag tub hab nthuav moog thoob lub tebchaws.
Nwg tej duab ntxoo roog tej roob, nwg tej ceg ntxoov tej ntoo cab kws luj kawg.
Nwg tej ceg nthuav moog txug Havtxwv, hab tej ntsuag hlaav fuam moog txug tug dej Yufeti.
Ua caag koj tsoo nwg tej ntsaa loog pob taag, txhua tug kws dua kev txhad le de nwg tej txwv?
Npua teb tom haav zoov lug tsuj nwg, txhua yaam tsaj tom teb kuj lug noj taag.
Au Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, thov tig rov qaab lug lauj! Thov saib sau ntuj tuaj pum, thov mob sab tsob txwv maab nuav,
yog tsob kws koj txhais teg xws cog ca hab yog tug ceg kws koj ua kuas hlub zoo rua koj.
Puab muab suavtawg hlawv tsob txwv maab hov hab muab ntuv qaug lawm. Thov ca puab puam tsuaj rua thaus koj saib ntsoov hab ntuag puab.
Thov ca koj txhais teg nyob sau tug kws nyob ntawm koj saab teg xws, yog tuabneeg tug tub kws koj ua kuas ruaj khov rua koj.
Mas peb yuav tsw tig ntawm koj moog dua le lawm. Thov koj pub peb muaj txujsa nyob, peb yuav thov hu koj lub npe.
Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, thov koj paab peb rov zoo le qub, ca koj lub ntsej muag ci rua peb sub peb txhad le dim.
Ca le hu nkauj nrov rua Vaajtswv kws yog peb tug zug, ca le qw zoo sab xyiv faab rua Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv.
Ca le tsaa suab hu nkauj ntaus nruag npuaj hab ntaus nkauj nog ncaas miv kws lub suab zoo noog hab nkauj nog ncaas luj.
Ca le tshuab raaj kub yaaj rua nub hli xab hab nub hli nraa, hab nub kws peb ua kevcai paam noj paam haus.
Tsua qhov yog kaab ke kws cov Yixayee yuav tsum coj, yog Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv txuj kevcai.
Nwg muab tej lug nuav ua kaab ke rua Yauxej coj rua thaus Vaajtswv moog tawm tsaam Iyi tebchaws. Kuv nov ib lub suab kws kuv tsw tau txeev paub dua has tas,
“Kuv txu lub nraa ntawm puab xub pwg, hab daws lub tawb ntawm puab txhais teg.
Thaus koj raug txom nyem koj hu mas kuv tso koj dim, kuv nyob huv twv fuab kws xub nroo teb koj, kuv swm koj ntawm dej Melinpa.
Kuv haiv tuabneeg 'e, ca le noog, kuv yuav qhuab ntuag mej. Cov Yixayee 'e, xaav kuas mej noog kuv has.
Mej tsw xob teev luas tej daab rua huv plawv mej, hab tsw xob pe luas lwm haiv tuabneeg tej daab qhuas.
Kuv yog Yawmsaub, yog mej tug Vaajtswv kws coj mej tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug. Ca le rua mej lub qhov ncauj kuas luj es kuv yuav ntsaws kuas mej noj tsau.
“Tassws kuv haiv tuabneeg tsw noog kuv lug, cov Yixayee tsw txais yuav kuv.
Kuv txhad ca puab ua lawv le puab lub sab tawv hab ua lawv le kws puab xaav ca.
Kuv xaav kuas kuv haiv tuabneeg noog kuv has, xaav kuas Yixayee taug kuv tej kev.
Mas kuv yuav ua rua puab cov yeeb ncuab swb sai sai, kuv yuav tsaa teg tawm tsaam puab cov tshawj chim.
Mas cov tuabneeg kws ntxub Yawmsaub yuav pw lua ntawm nwg xubndag, puab yuav raug txem moog ib txhws le.
Kuv yuav muab cov mog kws zoo kawg rua mej noj hab pub cov zwb ntaab ntawm tej qaab tsuas rua mej kuas txaus nkaus mej lub sab.”
Vaajtswv lug nyob tsawg huv plawv ib tsoom tubkhai ntuj, nwg nyob huv plawv tej timtswv txav txem
has tas, “Mej yuav tu plaub tsw ncaaj, hab tuaj tug tuabneeg limham tog ntev le caag?
Ca le tu plaub ncaaj rua cov kws tsw muaj zug hab cov kws tsw muaj txwv, hab tsaa cov txom nyem hab cov tu pluag txujcai.
Ca le cawm cov kws qaug zug hab cov txom nyem kuas dim, ca le paab puab dim huv cov tuabneeg limham txhais teg.
Puab tsw paub hab tsw nkaag sab, puab taug txujkev tsaus ntuj nti, tej taw tag lub nplajteb ua zug quas kais huvsw.
Kuv has tas, ‘Mej yog timtswv, mej puavleej yog tug kws Luj Dua Ndais le tub.’
Txawm le ntawd los mej yuav tuag yaam le tuabneeg, hab qaug ntawg yaam le ib tug thawj qaug.”
Au Vaajtswv, thov sawv tseeg txav txem rua lub nplajteb, tsua qhov ib tsoom tebchaws puavleej yog koj le.
Au Vaajtswv, thov tsw xob nyob tuabywv. Au Vaajtswv, tsw xob nyob ntsag tu es tsw quav ntsej.
Saib maj, koj cov yeeb ncuab tub ua zum quas zawg, cov kws ntxub koj los kuj tsaa taubhau nplawg nta.
Puab xaav tswvyim ntse kawg le yuav tawm tsaam koj haiv tuabneeg, puab tuav huv yuav tiv cov kws koj tsom kwm.
Puab has tas, “Ca le lug, peb muab haiv tuabneeg hov ntxuav kuas tu noob nrho. Tsw xob tseg Yixayee lub npe ca rua leejtwg ncu tau hlo le.”
Puab koom ib lub sab ntaus tswvyim phem. Puab sws cog lug tawm tsaam koj,
yog cov tuabneeg Entoo hab cov tuabneeg Isama‑ee hab cov Mau‑a, cov Haka,
cov Kenpaa, cov Aamoo hab cov Amalej, cov Filixatee hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Thailab.
Axilia kuj tuaj nrug koom teg hab, puab ua Lauj cov tub ki le teg taw kws muaj zug.
Thov koj ua rua puab yaam nkaus le koj ua rua cov Mintee, hab yaam nkaus le ua rua Xixela hab Yanpi ntawm tug dej Khisoo.
Puab raug muab ua kuas puam tsuaj taag ntawm lub moos Eentau, hab ua luaj ua chiv taag rua huv aav lawm.
Thov koj ua rua puab cov kws ua hlub zoo yaam nkaus le Aulej hab Xe‑ev, hab ua rua puab cov thawj suavdawg zoo yaam nkaus le Xenpa hab Xamuna,
yog cov kws has tas, “Ca peb txeeb Vaajtswv tej tshaav zaub ua peb tug.”
Au kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov ua rua puab zoo yaam nkaus le cov moov aav kws cua ntsawj yaa kaaj nab, zoo yaam nkaus le tej npluag kws cua ntsawj yaa taag.
Suavtawg kub tej haav zoov le caag hab nplaim tawg kub tej toj roob hauv peg cig le caag,
thov koj tso cua daaj cua dub lug lawv puab ib yaam nkaus le hov, hab tso koj tej khaub zeeg cua lug ua rua puab ntshai kawg.
Au Yawmsaub, thov ua rua puab poob ntsej muag sub puab txhad le lug nrhav koj lub npe.
Thov kuas puab raug txaaj muag hab poob sab moog ib txhws. Thov ua kuas puab poob ntsej muag puam tsuaj taag.
Thov ua kuas puab paub tas koj tuab leeg xwb kws npe hu ua Yawmsaub txhad yog tug Vaajtswv Luj Dua Ndais kws kaav taag nrho thoob nplajteb.
Au Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, koj lub chaw nyob yog lub chaw kws nyam kawg le.
Kuv tug ntsuj plig ntshaw hab xaav txug Yawmsaub lub tuam tsev, kuv lub sab lub cev hu nkauj xyiv faab rua Vaajtswv kws muaj txujsa nyob.

Au Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, kws yog kuv tug vaajntxwv hab kuv tug Vaajtswv, txawm yog noog tsev los nrhav tau chaw nyob, hab luv kuj nrhav tau chaw ua zeg rua nwg nteg qai rua ntawm koj lub thaaj.
Cov kws nyob huv koj lub tuam tsev tau nyob kaaj sab lug, puab hu nkauj qhuas koj tsw tu ncua le.
Cov kws puab tug zug nyob huv koj tau nyob kaaj sab lug, huv puab lub sab yog txuj nam kev kws moog rua Xi‑oo.
Thaus puab hlaa lub haav Npakha  moog, puab ua kuas dej txhawv, cov naag hauv xyoo ua kuas tau koob moov.
Puab moog pheej muaj zug tsaav ntxwv, puab yuav pum tej timtswv tug Vaajtswv nyob huv Xi‑oo.
Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, thov noog kuv tej lug, au Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv, thov tig ntsej noog.
Au Vaajtswv, thov saib daim phaj hlau kws thaiv peb, thov tsaa muag saib tug kws koj laub roj tsaa ca lawd lub ntsej muag.

Nyob ib nub huv koj tej tshaav puam tuam tsev, zoo dua le nyob lwm qhov ib txheeb nub. Kuv xaav ua tug kws zuv kuv tug Vaajtswv lub qhov rooj tuam tsev, zoo dua le nyob huv cov tuabneeg limham lub tsev ntaub.
Vaajtswv Yawmsaub yog lub nub hab daim phaj hlau thaiv. Nwg pub txujkev hlub hab koob meej rua peb. Yawmsaub tsw tseg ib yaam zoo kws tsw pub rua cov tuabneeg ncaaj.
Au Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, tug kws tso sab rua koj tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Au Yawmsaub, koj tub hlub koj lub tebchaws, koj tub pub Yakhauj rov tau vaam meej le qub.
Koj tub zaam koj cov tuabneeg tej kev txhum, hab daws puab lub txem huvsw.
Koj tub thim koj tej kev npau tawg huvsw rov qaab, koj tub tig hlo ntawm koj txujkev chim kws kub heev.
Au Vaajtswv kws cawm peb dim, thov paab peb rov zoo le qub, thov koj tso qhov kws koj chim rua peb tseg.
Koj yuav chim rua peb moog ib txhws lov? Koj yuav ca koj txujkev chim nyob moog rua txhua tam lov?
Koj yuav tsw pub peb lub neej rov zoo le qub lov, sub koj cov tuabneeg txhad tau kev xyiv faab rua huv koj?
Au Yawmsaub, thov ua koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov tshwm lug rua peb, hab thov pub koj txujkev dim rua peb.
