Thov ca kuv tau nov tej lug kws Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has, tsua qhov nwg has txujkev kaaj sab lug rua nwg haiv tuabneeg, kws yog nwg cov tuabneeg dawb huv. Tsw xob ca puab tig rov moog rua txujkev ruag.
Nwg txujkev cawm dim yeej lug ze cov kws fwm hab paub ntshai nwg, nwg tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab txhad nyob huv peb lub tebchaws.
Txujkev hlub ruaj khov hab txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau yuav sws ntswb, txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab txujkev kaaj sab lug yuav sws nwj.
Txujkev ua ncaaj yuav tawm huv aav tuaj, txujkev ncaaj nceeg yuav saib sau ntuj tuaj.
Yawmsaub yeej yuav pub tej kws zoo, mas peb lub tebchaws yuav tau qoob loos nplua mag.
Txujkev ncaaj nceeg yuav moog ua nwg ntej, hab npaaj kev rua nwg kwtaw taug.
Au Yawmsaub, thov tig ntsej noog hab teb kuv, tsua qhov kuv pluag hab txom nyem.
Thov tsom kwm kuv txujsa ca tsua qhov kuv fwm koj. Thov cawm koj tug qhev kws tso sab rua koj. Koj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv.
Au tug Tswv, thov koj hlub kuv tsua qhov kuv quaj thov koj taag naj taag nub.
Au tug Tswv, thov pub kuas koj tug tub qhe zoo sab tsua qhov kuv muab hlo kuv lub sab rua koj.
Au tug Tswv, koj yog tug kws zoo kawg hab zaam txem, koj txujkev hlub muaj nplua quas mag rua cov kws hu thov koj.
Au Yawmsaub, thov tig ntsej noog kuv tej lug thov, thov noog kuv lub suab taij thov.
Nub kuv raug txom nyem ceblaaj kuv thov hu koj vem koj yeej yuav teb kuv.
Au tug Tswv, dhau koj lawm tsw muaj ib tug timtswv twg yuav zoo cuag le koj, hab tsw muaj ib teg num twg kws yuav zoo cuag le koj teg num.
Au tug Tswv, txhua haiv tuabneeg kws koj tau tswm lug yuav tuaj pe rua ntawm koj xubndag, hab yuav qhuas koj lub npe kuas tau koob meej.
Tsua qhov koj luj kawg hab ua teg num phemfwj kawg, koj tuab leeg txhad yog Vaajtswv.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj qha koj txujkev rua kuv sub kuv txhad ua tau lawv le koj txujkev tseeb, thov paab kuas kuv ua hlo ib sab paub ntshai koj lub npe.
Au tug Tswv kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv yuav ua koj tsaug kawg kuv lub sab hab kuv yuav qhuas koj lub npe kuas tau koob meej moog ib txhws.
Tsua qhov koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov luj kawg rua kuv, hab koj tau tso kuv tug ntsuj plig dim lub qhov tub tub huv tub tuag teb lug.
Au Vaajtswv, cov tuabneeg khaav theeb tau sawv tseeg tiv kuv, ib paab tuabneeg kws ua nruj ua tswv nrhav txuv kuv txujsa, puab tsw quav ntsej koj hab.
Au tug Tswv, koj yog tug Vaajtswv kws khuvleej hab hlub, koj tsw chim sai, koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov hab koj txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau muaj nplua quas mag.
Thov tig khuvleej kuv, thov pub zug rua koj tug qhev, hab cawm koj tug nkauj qhev tug tub.
Thov ua ib yaam txujci qha koj txujkev hlub rua kuv, sub cov kws ntxub kuv txhad pum hab raug txaaj muag, vem Yawmsaub, koj tau paab kuv hab nplig kuv lub sab.
Lub nroog kws Yawmsaub tswm nyob sau lub roob dawb huv.
Yawmsaub nyam Xi‑oo tej rooj loog heev dua le tej chaw kws Yakhauj cov tuabneeg nyob txhua qhov huvsw.
Vaajtswv lub nroog 'e, tej tuabneeg has tej lug qhuas koj kawg le.
Huv cov kws paub kuv, kuv yuav suav Lahaj hab Npanpiloo. Filixatee tebchaws hab lub nroog Thailab hab Khuj tebchaws, mas kuv yuav suav tas, “Cov nuav kuj yug rua huv Xi‑oo.”
Luas yuav has txug Xi‑oo tas, “Tug nuav hab tug hov yug huv lub nroog ntawd.” Vaajtswv kws Luj Dua Ndais yuav tsaa kuas lub nroog hov ruaj khov.
Thaus Yawmsaub sau ib tsoom tuabneeg tej npe ca, nwg suav tas, “Tug nuav yug hov ntawd.”
Cov kws hu nkauj hab cov kws dha seev cev suavdawg has tas, “Peb txhua lub hauv dej txhawv huv koj lug.”
Au Yawmsaub, tug Vaajtswv kws cawm kuv dim, nruab nub kuv thov koj paab mo ntuj kuv quaj hu rua ntawm koj xubndag.
Ca kuv tej lug thov tuaj txug ntawm koj xubndag, thov tig ntsej noog kuv lub suab thov.
Tsua qhov kuv tug ntsuj plig raug txom nyem ceblaaj kawg nkaus hab kuv txujsa tub moog yuav txug tub tuag teb.
Kuv raug muab xaam nrug cov tuabneeg kws tub yuav moog rua huv qhov tuag. Kuv yog ib tug kws tsw muaj zug hlo le,

zoo yaam nkaus le tug kws luas muab tso tseg rua huv cov tuabneeg tuag, yaam nkaus le cov kws raug tua tuag nyob huv lub qhov ntxaa, yog cov kws koj tsw ncu txug lawm vem yog puab raug txav ntawm koj txhais teg lawm.
Koj muab kuv tso tub tub rua huv qhov tuag, yog lub qhov kws tub tub hab tsaus ntuj nti.
Koj txujkev npau tawg nyaav kawg rua sau kuv, hab koj muab koj tej nam nthwv dej huvsw nphau lug nyaab kuv.
Koj tau ua rua kuv tej kwvluag tso kuv tseg, koj tau muab kuv ua yaam kws puab ceeb hab ntshai. Kuv raug muab kaw kuv txhad dim tsw tau le.
Kuv qhov muag tsw pum kev taag vem yog kuv quaj lwj sab. Au Yawmsaub, kuv naj nub thov hu koj, kuv cev teg rua koj.
Koj yuav ua txujci phemfwj rua cov kws tuag lov? Cov kws nyob huv tub tuag teb yuav sawv tseeg qhuas koj lov?
Puab yuav pav koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov rua huv qhov ntxaa lov, hab pav koj txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau rua huv Anpantoo  lov?
Nyob huv qhov tsaus ntuj puab yuav paub koj tej txujci phemfwj lov, nyob lub chaw kws tsw ncu qaab daabtsw le, puab yuav paub koj txujkev cawm dim lov?
Au Yawmsaub, kuv quaj thov koj, thaus taagkig kuv lub suab thov tuaj cuag koj.
Au Yawmsaub, ua caag koj muab kuv tso pov tseg? Ua le caag koj yuav fee plhu ntawm kuv lawm?
Txwj thaus kuv tseed hluas lug kuv raug txom nyem nyuaj sab hab nyob ze txujkev tuag, kuv thev tej kev ntshai kawg kws koj ua rua kuv, kuv tsw txawj ua le caag lawm.
Koj txujkev npau tawg nyaab hlo kuv, tej kev ntshai kawg kws koj ntaus kuv ua rua kuv puam tsuaj.
Tej kev ntshai hov nyob vej puag ncig kuv zoo yaam nkaus le dej nyaab taag naj taag nub mas nyaab hlo kuv taag nrho.
Koj tau ua rua cov kws hlub kuv hab kuv cov phoojywg ncaim ntawm kuv, kuv muab qhov tsaus ntuj lug ua kuv phoojywg xwb.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv yuav hu nkauj txug koj txujkev hlub ruaj khov moog ib txhws. Kuv lub qhov ncauj yuav pav txug koj txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau rua txhua tam tuabneeg.
Kuv has tas koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov yuav nyob moog ib txhws, koj tsaa koj txujkev ncaaj nyob ruaj rua sau ntuj.
Koj has tas, “Kuv cog lug rua tug kws kuv xaiv ca lawm, kuv tau yeem lug rua kuv tug qhev Tavi tas,
‘Kuv yuav tsaa koj caaj ceg nyob moog ib txhws hab kuv yuav ua rua koj lub zwm txwv nyob ruaj moog txhua tam tuabneeg.’ ”
Au Yawmsaub, ca lub ntuj qhuas koj teg num phemfwj, hab qhuas koj txujkev ncaaj rua thaus cov tuabneeg dawb huv tuaj txoos ua ke.
Tsua qhov sau ntuj leejtwg yuav pev tau zoo le Yawmsaub? Huv ib tsoom tuabneeg qaum ntuj leejtwg zoo cuag le Yawmsaub?
Koj yog tug Vaajtswv kws cov tuabneeg dawb huv ntshai rua thaus tuaj sablaaj ua ke, hab yog tug kws txaus ntshai kawg heev dua tej kws nyob ib ncig ntawm koj.
Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, leejtwg muaj fwjchim luj ib yaam le koj? Au Yawmsaub, koj txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau nyob puag ncig koj.
Koj tswj rawv tej nthwv dej ndaas huv havtxwv. Thaus tej nthwv dej ndaas sab sab koj kuj tswj kuas nyob ntsag tu.
Koj tsoo tug nam zaaj Lahaj yaam nkaus le ib tug kws raug tua, koj swv koj txhais teg kws muaj fwjchim ua rua koj cov yeeb ncuab tswv tawg taag.
Lub ntuj yog koj le, lub nplajteb yog koj le. Koj tau tswm lub nplajteb hab txhua yaam kws nyob huv.
Saab peg hab saab nraag los yog koj tswm. Lub roob Thanpau hab lub roob Hawmoo qhuas koj lub npe xyiv faab hlo.
Koj txhais npaab muaj fwjchim hab koj txhais teg kws muaj zug hab koj txhais teg xws raug muab tsaa sab sab le.
Txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab qhov kws txav txem ncaaj yog lub taw tag koj lub zwm txwv, txujkev hlub ruaj khov hab txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau moog ua koj ntej.
Au Yawmsaub, cov tuabneeg kws paub qw zoo sab rua koj tau nyob kaaj sab lug, yog cov kws taug kev huv qhov kaaj kws tawm ntawm koj xubndag lug.
Puab zoo sab xyiv faab huv koj lub npe ib nub tsaus ntuj, hab puab qhuas ntxhas koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg.
Koj yog puab tug zug kws muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa ab. Vem koj hlub peb mas koj txhad tsaa peb txwm kub kuas sab,
tsua qhov peb daim phaj hlau kws thaiv yog Yawmsaub le, peb tug vaajntxwv yog Yixayee tug Vaajtswv kws dawb huv le.

Yaav thau u koj tau has huv zaaj yug quas toog rua tug kws lub sab xwb rua koj tas, “Kuv tau paab ib tug kws sab luj sab tuab, kuv tau tsaa ib tug kws kuv xaiv huv cov pejxeem lug kuas nyob lub chaw sab.
Kuv tau nrhav kuv tug qhev Tavi hab muab kuv cov roj kws dawb huv laub tsaa nwg.
Kuv txhais teg txhad nrug nraim nwg moog ib txhws, hab kuv txhais npaab yuav pub zug rua nwg.
Yeeb ncuab yuav ntxag tsw tau nwg, cov tuabneeg limham yuav quab yuam tsw tau nwg.
Kuv yuav tsoo nwg cov tshawj chim rua ntawm nwg xubndag, hab kuv yuav ntaus cov kws ntxub nwg kuas tuag.
Kuv txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau hab kuv txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov yuav nrug nraim nwg. Vem nwg tuav kuv lub npe nwg txwm kub yuav raug muab tsaa kuas sab.
Kuv yuav tsaa nwg txhais teg rua sau dej havtxwv hab tsaa nwg txhais teg xws rua sau tej haav dej.
Mas nwg yuav hu thov kuv tas, ‘Koj yog kuv leej txwv, yog kuv tug Vaajtswv hab yog txhwb zeb kws cawm kuv dim.’
Hab kuv yuav tsaa nwg ua tug tub hlub, ua tug vaajntxwv luj dhau tej vaajntxwv huv nplajteb huvsw.
Kuv yuav muab kuv txujkev hlub ruaj khov cob rua nwg moog ib txhws, hab tej lug kws kuv cog tseg rua nwg yuav nyob ruaj khov.
Kuv yuav tsaa nwg caaj ceg kuas nyob moog ib txhws, hab tsaa nwg lub zwm txwv nyob ntev le kws lub ntuj nyob.
Yog nwg tej tub ki tso kuv txuj kevcai tseg hab tsw ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai,
yog puab ua txhum kuv tej kaab ke hab tsw tuav rawv kuv tej lug nkaw,
mas kuv yuav xuas nplawm rau txem rua puab tej kev faav xeeb, hab xuas nplawm kav theej rau txem rua puab tej kev txhum.
Tassws kuv yuav tsw rhu kuv txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov ntawm nwg lug, hab tsw tso kuv txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau tseg.
Kuv yuav tsw rhuav kuv tej lug cog tseg hab tsw hloov tej lug kws tawm huv kuv daim tawv ncauj lawm.
Kuv tuav kuv txujkev dawb huv yeem lug ruaj ca. Kuv yuav tsw daag Tavi.
Nwg caaj ceg yuav nyob moog ib txhws, nwg lub zwm txwv yuav nyob ntev le lub nub rua ntawm kuv xubndag.
Yuav tsaa nwg nyob moog ib txhws yaam le lub hli kws ua timkhawv tseeb sau nruab ntug.”
Tassws nwgnuav koj muab nwg pov tseg hab tsw yuav lawm, koj npau tawg rua tug kws koj laub roj tsaa lawd.
Koj tau rhuav tej lug kws koj cog tseg rua koj tug qhev, koj tau ua rua nwg lub mom kub puag tsuas rua huv cov moov aav.
Koj muab nwg tej ntsaa loog huvsw tsoo tawg ua tej lub qhov, koj muab nwg tej chaw ruaj khov tsoo pob taag.
Txhua tug kws dua kev moog kuj lws nwg, tej tuabneeg zej zog kuj thuaj luag nwg.
Koj tsaa nwg cov tshawj chim txhais teg xws sab, koj ua rua nwg cov yeeb ncuab suavdawg zoo sab xyiv faab.
Koj tig nav ntaaj rua nwg hab tsw paab nwg nyob ruaj khov huv lub tshaav rog.
Koj rhu tug cwj ntawm nwg txhais teg moog, hab muab nwg lub zwm txwv laim rua huv peg teb.
Koj muab nwg lub noob nyoog hluas txav tuab lu, koj muab kev txaaj muag npug nkaus nwg lub plhu.
Au Yawmsaub, yuav ntev le caag? Koj yuav tswv nraim moog ib txhws lov? Koj txujkev npau tawg yuav kub yaam nkaus le suavtawg ntev le caag?
Thov koj ncu txug kuv swm neej kws ib vuag dua xwb. Koj tau tswm ib tsoom tuabneeg lug nyob dawb nyob do xwb.
Muaj ib tug tuabneeg twg kws yuav muaj txujsa nyob moog le tsw txawj tuag? Leejtwg yuav cawm tau nwg tug ntsuj plig dim huv tub tuag teb tug fwjchim?
Au tug Tswv, koj txujkev hlub ruaj khov thau u dua twg lawm? Koj tau cog tseg tas yuav pub rua Tavi lawv le koj txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau.
Au tug Tswv, thov koj ncu txug qhov kws koj tug qhev raug luas saib tsw taug le caag, hab qhov kws kuv rws ib tsoom tuabneeg tej lug thuaj rua nruab sab le caag.
Au Yawmsaub, koj cov yeeb ncuab thuaj luag kuv, puab luag tug kws koj laub roj tsaa lawd txhua kauj ruam.
Qhuas Yawmsaub moog ib txhws. Amee hab Amee.
Au tug Tswv, koj yeej yog peb lub chaw nyob txhua tam lug le.
Ua ntej kws toj roob hauv peg tsw tau tshwm lug, hab koj tsw tau tswm lub nplajteb hab lub qaab ntuj, koj yeej yog Vaajtswv ib txwm thau u lug moog ib txhws tsw kawg.
Koj ua rua tuabneeg rov ua moov aav, hab has tas, “Tuabneeg tej tub ki 'e, ca le rov qaab lauj!”
Ib txheeb xyoo koj saib zoo le naag mo kws dhau lug lawm xwb, lossws zoo le ib lub caij ib tsoo teev thaus tsaus ntuj.
Koj muab tuabneeg kuav hlo moog, puab zoo le zaaj npau suav, zoo le tej nroj tsuag kws taagkig nyav tuaj,
thaus taagkig kuj hlub mog nyoos, thaus tsaus ntuj kuj tuag tshaav ntsws lawm.
Peb raug koj txujkev chim ntxuav pov tseg, koj txujkev npau tawg ua rua peb ntshai poob sab nthaav.
Koj muab peb tej kev txhum txawb rua ntawm koj lub xubndag, tej kev txhum kws peb ua nraim quas nreeg koj muab txawb rua qhov pum kev taab meeg koj.
Peb lub noob nyoog pluj quas zug taag rua huv koj txujkev npau tawg, peb lub naj xyoo kawg quas zug yaam le xyu ib paas xwb.

Peb noob nyoog tsuas yog xyaa caum xyoo xwb, lossws nyob ntawm peb tug zug kuj txug yim caum xyoo. Tassws swm neej nyob hov tsuas yog muaj num khwv hab kev ceblaaj, tsw ntev kuj pluj taag hab peb kuj dua lawm.
Leejtwg paub koj txujkev chim tug fwjchim? Koj txujkev npau tawg npaum le kws peb paub ntshai koj.
Thov koj qha kuas peb paub suav peb txhua nub, sub peb lub sab txhad muaj tswvyim.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj rov lug. Tseed tshuav ntev le caag? Thov koj khuvleej koj cov tub qhe.
Thov pub kuas thaus taagkig peb tsau npo koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov, sub peb txhad zoo sab hab xyiv faab taag peb swm neej.
Thov pub kev xyiv faab rua peb ntau nub npaum le kws koj ca peb raug txom nyem, hab ntau xyoo npaum le kws peb ntswb xwm txheej phem.
Thov ua koj tej num tshwm rua koj cov tub qhe pum, hab pub koj tug fwjchim luj kawg tshwm rua puab tej tub ki pum.
Thov tug Tswv kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv txujkev hlub lug rua sau peb, thov tuav tej kws peb txhais teg ua nyob ruaj rua peb, thov tuav tej kws peb txhais teg ua kuas nyob ruaj lauj!
Tug kws nyob huv tug Luj Dua Ndais lub xubndag, tug kws nyob rua huv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg  tug duab ntxoo,
yuav has rua Yawmsaub tas, “Koj yog kuv lub chaw cawm sav hab yog kuv lub chaw ruaj khov, yog kuv tug Vaajtswv kws kuv tso sab plhuav.”
Nwg yuav tso koj dim huv tug kws cuab noog rooj hlua, hab huv tej mob kws nyaav heev.
Nwg phob tis yuav roog koj hab koj yuav cawm sav rua huv qaab nwg phob kauj tis. Nwg txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau yog daim phaj hlau hab ntsaa loog thaiv.
Koj yuav tsw ntshai txujkev txhawj xeeb mo ntuj, hab tsw ntshai raab xub vug kws yaa tuaj nruab nub,
lossws tej mob kis kws lawv tuaj thaus tsaus ntuj, lossws tej mob phem kws ua kuas puam tsuaj thaus taav su.
Quas txheeb leej yuav qaug tuag rua ntawm koj ib saab, quas vaam leej yuav qaug tuag rua ntawm koj saab teg xws, los tej xwm txheej phem hov yuav tsw lug ze koj.
Koj lub qhov muag yuav pum ntsoov xwb, koj yuav pum qhov kws pauj taub rua cov tuabneeg limham.
Vem koj muab Yawmsaub ua koj lub chaw cawm sav, yog muab tug kws Luj Dua Ndais ua koj lub chaw nyob,
yuav tsw muaj ib yaam xwm txheej phem poob lug raug koj, hab yuav tsw muaj vej sub vej sw lug ze koj lub tsev ntaub.
Nwg yuav muab koj cob rua nwg cov tubkhai ntuj kuas puab tsom kwm koj txhua txujkev.
Puab txhais teg yuav fwj koj, sub koj kwtaw txhad tsw ntsawm pob zeb.
Koj yuav tsuj tsuv ntxhuav hab naab raaj kub sai, koj yuav tsuj ntag thaav tsuv ntxhuav hab naab.
“Vem yog nwg hlub kuv, kuv yuav tso nwg dim. Kuv yuav tsom kwm nwg ca vem nwg leeg yuav kuv lub npe.
Thaus nwg hu thov kuv, kuv yuav teb nwg. Kuv yuav nrug nraim nwg nyob rua thaus nwg raug kev ceblaaj, kuv yuav cawm nwg dim hab pub koob meej rua nwg.
Kuv yuav pub txujsa ntev rua nwg kuas txaus nkaus nwg lub sab, hab ua txujkev cawm dim tshwm rua nwg.”
Qhov kws zoo mas yuav ua Yawmsaub tsaug, hab hu nkauj qhuas koj lub npe, koj kws yog tug Vaajtswv Luj Dua Ndais,
hab pav koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov rua thaus sawv ntxuv, hab pav koj txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau rua thaus tsaus ntuj,
nrug suab nkauj nog ncaas luj hab nkauj nog ncaas miv, hab nrug suab nkauj nog ncaas phim suab nkauj.
Au Yawmsaub, koj teg num luj ua rua kuv zoo sab heev, vem tej num kws koj txhais teg ua kuv txhad hu nkauj xyiv faab hlo.
Au Yawmsaub, koj teg num luj kawg nkaus, tej kws koj xaav mas nyob tub kawg le.
Tug tuabneeg tsw thoob tswb yuav tsw paub, tug tuabneeg ruag yuav tsw nkaag sab tas,
txawm yog tej tuabneeg limham hlub mog nyoos le tej nroj tsuag, hab tej tuabneeg ua phem suavdawg kuj vaam meej, los puab yeej yuav raug puam tsuaj moog ib txhws.
Au Yawmsaub, koj nyob lub chaw sab moog ib txhws.
Au Yawmsaub, vem le nuav koj cov yeeb ncuab, koj cov yeeb ncuab yeej yuav puam tsuaj, cov tuabneeg ua phem suavdawg yuav tawg tswv taag.
Tassws koj tsaa kuv txwm kub ib yaam le nyuj qus, koj muab cov roj tshab laub rua sau kuv.
Kuv lub qhov muag tub pum kuv cov yeeb ncuab swb taag, kuv lub qhov ntsej tub nov cov tuabneeg phem kws tawm tsaam kuv lub suab quaj swb taag.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg hlub mog nyoos yaam nkaus le tsob toov laaj, hab hlub sai yaam nkaus le tsob ntoo cab huv Lenpanoo.
Puab raug muab cog rua huv Yawmsaub lub tuam tsev, hab kheev hlub rua huv peb tug Vaajtswv tej tshaav puam tuam tsev.
Thaus puab laug laug lawm los puab tseed txw txwv, hab muaj dej yug hab ntsuab tsaus nti moog ib txhws,
sub txhad qha tas Yawmsaub ncaaj nceeg. Nwg yog kuv txhwb zeb hab tsw ua ib qho tsw ncaaj hlo le.
Yawmsaub ua vaajntxwv kaav, nwg muab fwjchim meej mom lug naav, Yawmsaub muab tug zug lug sa ntawm duav. Lub nplajteb nyob ruaj khov tsw ua zug le.
Koj lub zwm txwv tub muab tsaa ca txwj thau u lug lawm, koj yeej nyob ib txwm thau u lug le.
Au Yawmsaub, dej havtxwv tsaa suab nrov, yog tej dej huv nruab tiv txwv, tej nam nthwv dej tsaa suab nrov ceev kawg.
Yawmsaub kws nyob chaw sab muaj fwjchim luj, muaj fwjchim heev dua tej dej nrov vig quas voog, heev dua tej nam nthwv dej havtxwv ndaas.
Koj tej kevcai muaj tseeb tag, Au Yawmsaub, txujkev dawb huv tswm nyog nyob huv koj lub tuam tsev moog ib txhws.
Au Yawmsaub, yog tug Vaajtswv kws pauj taub, au Vaajtswv tug kws pauj taub, thov koj tshwm plawg lug.
Au tug kws txav txem rua nplajteb, thov koj sawv tseeg, ua rua cov tuabneeg khaav theeb tau saws lawv le tswm nyog saws.
Au Yawmsaub, cov tuabneeg limham yuav zoo sab moog ntev le caag, cov tuabneeg phem yuav xyiv faab ntev le caag?
Puab has lug khaav theeb heev, cov tuabneeg ua phem suavdawg khaav theeb.
Au Yawmsaub, puab tsuj yuam koj haiv tuabneeg hab tswm txom koj qub txeeg qub teg.
Puab tua tej puj ntsuag hab lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug puab nyob, hab puab tua tej mivnyuas ntsuag kws tsw muaj txwv.
Hab puab tseed has tas, “Yawmsaub tsw pum le, Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv tsw paub le.”
Cov tuabneeg kws ruag dhau luas lwm tug 'e, ca le to taub. Cov tuabneeg tsw thoob tswb 'e, thaus twg mej le ntse?
Tug kws tswm qhov ntsej nwg tseed tsw nov hab lov? Tug kws tswm qhov muag nwg tseed tsw pum hab lov?
Tug kws nplawm txhua haiv tuabneeg nwg yuav tsw txav txem lov? Tug kws qha tuabneeg nwg tseed tsw txawj tsw ntse lov?
Yawmsaub yeej paub tej kws tuabneeg xaav, tej hov tsuas yog ua paa xwb.
Au Yawmsaub, tug kws koj nplawm hab qhuab qha kuj tau nyob kaaj sab lug, yog tug kws koj muab koj txuj kevcai qha rua,
nwg txhad tau dim qhov kws raug txom nyem ceblaaj moog txug thaus khawb tau qhov taub cuab cov tuabneeg limham.
Tsua qhov Yawmsaub yeej yuav tsw ncaim nwg haiv tuabneeg, nwg yuav tsw tso nwg qub txeeg qub teg tseg.
Qhov kws txav txem yuav rov txav lawv le txujkev ncaaj nceeg, mas cov tuabneeg sab ncaaj yuav lawv txujkev txav txem ncaaj.
Leejtwg sawv tseeg paab kuv tawm tsaam cov tuabneeg limham? Leejtwg yuav tuaj kuv tog tiv cov tuabneeg ua phem?
Yog Yawmsaub tsw paab kuv tes kuv tug ntsuj plig tub moog nyob huv qhov chaw ntsag quas tu lawm.
Thaus kuv xaav tas, “Kuv nplaam kwtaw lawm,” au Yawmsaub, koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov tuav kuv ca.
Thaus kuv lub sab muaj kev txhawj xeeb ntau, koj kuj nplig kuv lub sab kuas xyiv faab.
Cov thawj kaav kws limham yuav nrug koj ua kwvluag tau lov, yog cov kws swv tej kaab ke moog ua phem?
Puab sws koom teg xaav txuv cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg txujsa, hab muab cov tuabneeg tsw txhum rau txem tuag.
Yawmsaub yog kuv lub chaw ruaj khov, kuv tug Vaajtswv yog txhwb zeb kws kuv nraim cev.
Nwg yuav coj puab tej kev txhum rov lug rua sau puab, hab yuav muab puab ntxuav pov tseg vem yog tim puab tej kev limham. Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv yuav muab puab ntxuav pov tseg.
Ca le lug, peb ca le hu nkauj qhuas Yawmsaub, peb ca le ua suab xyiv faab rua txhwb zeb kws cawm peb dim.
Peb ca le lug rua ntawm nwg lub xubndag ua nwg tsaug, peb ca le ua lub suab xyiv faab hu nkauj qhuas nwg.
Tsua qhov Yawmsaub yog tug Vaajtswv kws luj kawg, hab yog tug vaajntxwv kws luj tshaaj plawg tej timtswv huvsw.
Tej qhov kws tub kawg huv nplajteb nyob huv nwg xwb teg, tej roob kws sab kawg kuj yog nwg le.
Nruab deg kuj yog nwg le vem yog nwg tswm, nruab nqhuab yog nwg txhais teg puab.
Ca le lug, peb ca le pe hawm nwg, peb ca le txhus caug rua ntawm Yawmsaub kws tswm peb lub xubndag.
Nwg yog peb tug Vaajtswv, peb yog nwg cov pejxeem huv nwg lub tshaav zaub, hab yog nwg paab yaaj huv nwg txhais teg. Nub nua xaav kuas mej noog nwg lub suab.
Mej tsw xob ua lub sab tawv yaam le mej tej laug ua ntawm Melinpa, yaam le nub kws nyob ntawm Maxa huv tebchaws moj saab qhua.
Txawm yog mej tej laug tub pum kuv tej num lawm, los puab tseed swm kuv, hab tshuaj saib kuv.
Kuv ntxub tam tuabneeg hov tau plaub caug xyoo, hab has tas, “Puab yog cov tuabneeg kws lub sab pheej yuam kev, hab puab tsw quav ntsej kuv txujkev.”
Vem le hov kuv txhad cog lug twv chim quas nyov tas, “Puab yuav tsw tau nkaag moog rua huv lub chaw kws kuv pub puab su hlo le.”
Ca le hu zaaj nkauj tshab rua Yawmsaub, taag nrho lub nplajteb, ca le hu nkauj rua Yawmsaub.
Ca le hu nkauj rua Yawmsaub, ca le qhuas nwg lub npe, ca le pav nwg txujkev cawm dim ib nub dhau ib nub.
Ca le pav txug nwg tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab rua huv ib tsoom tebchaws, pav txug nwg tej num phemfwj rua huv ib tsoom tuabneeg suavdawg.
Tsua qhov Yawmsaub yog tug luj kawg hab tswm nyog qhuas heev, nwg txaus ntshai heev dua tej timtswv huvsw.
Tuabneeg tej timtswv huvsw puavleej yog txoov daab xwb, tassws Yawmsaub yog tug tswm lub ntuj.
Koob meej hab fwjchim meej mom nyob ntawm nwg xubndag, tug zug hab qhov kws zoo nkauj nyob huv lub chaw pe hawm nwg.
Txhua haiv tuabneeg txhua xeem 'e, ca le qhuas Yawmsaub, ca le qhuas tas Yawmsaub muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab hab muaj zug.
Ca le qhuas tas Yawmsaub lub npe muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa ab kws tswm nyog qhuas kawg le, ca le coj tej kws xyeem tuaj rua huv nwg tej tshaav puam tuam tsev.
Ca le naav tej tsoog kws dawb huv pe hawm Yawmsaub, taag nrho lub nplajteb, ca le tshee nyo rua ntawm nwg xubndag.
Ca le has rua huv ib tsoom tebchaws tas, “Yawmsaub ua vaajntxwv kaav. Lub nplajteb yeej nyob ruaj khov tsw ua zug hlo le. Nwg yuav txav txem ncaaj rua ib tsoom tuabneeg.”
Lub ntuj ca le zoo sab, lub nplajteb ca le xyiv faab, dej havtxwv hab txhua yaam kws nyob huv, ca le qw nrov ntsug qeeg.
Tej teb hab txhua yaam kws nyob huv ca le qw zoo sab. Tej xyoob ntoo huvsw huv haav zoov yuav hu nkauj xyiv faab,
rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag vem yog nwg yuav lug, nwg yuav lug txav txem rua lub nplajteb. Nwg yuav txav txem ncaaj nceeg rua lub nplajteb hab ib tsoom tuabneeg lawv le nwg txujkev tseeb.
Yawmsaub ua vaajntxwv kaav. Ca nplajteb xyiv faab, ca tej tebchaws kws coob kawg ntawm ntug havtxwv zoo sab.
Muaj fuab hab muaj qhov tsaus ntuj nti nyob vej nwg, txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab qhov kws txav txem ncaaj yog lub taw tag nwg lub zwm txwv.
Muaj suavtawg cig ua nwg ntej hab hlawv nwg tej yeeb ncuab kws nyob ib ncig.
Nwg tej tsag lig xub ci nplaag thoob qaab ntuj, lub nplajteb pum hab tseeg quas nkawg.
Tej roob yaaj pes ntsuav le cab ntaab rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag, rua ntawm tug Tswv kws kaav taag nrho lub nplajteb lub xubndag.
Lub ntuj tshaaj tawm nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab ib tsoom tuabneeg suavdawg pum nwg tug fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab.
Txhua tug kws pe txoov daab raug txaaj muag, yog cov kws khaav txug puab tej daab kws tsw muaj qaabhau. Tej timtswv huvsw pe ntawm nwg xubndag.
Xi‑oo tau nov mas zoo sab, hab Yuta tej ntxhais  xyiv faab, vem yog Vaajtswv koj lug txav txem.
Au Yawmsaub, koj yog tug Luj Dua Ndais sau lub nplajteb huvsw, koj sab dhau tej timtswv huvsw ntau npaug.
Yawmsaub hlub cov kws ntxub kev phem, nwg tsom kwm nwg cov tuabneeg dawb huv txujsa, nwg cawm puab dim huv cov tuabneeg limham txhais teg.
Txujkev kaaj ci rua cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, hab txujkev xyiv faab muaj rua cov tuabneeg sab ncaaj.
Mej cov kws ncaaj nceeg, ca le zoo sab rua huv Yawmsaub, hab ua tsaug nwg lub npe kws dawb huv.
Ca le hu zaaj nkauj tshab rua Yawmsaub, tsua qhov nwg tau ua tej kws phemfwj kawg. Nwg tau swv nwg txhais teg xws hab nwg txhais npaab kws dawb huv kov yeej.
Yawmsaub qha nwg txujkev kov yeej rua suavdawg paub, hab ua nwg txujkev cawm dim tshwm taab meeg ib tsoom tebchaws pum.
Nwg ncu txug nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov hab nwg txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau kws nwg ua tshwm rua cov Yixayee. Thoob qaab ntuj kawg puavleej tau pum peb tug Vaajtswv txujkev kov yeej.
Thoob lub nplajteb 'e, ca le tsaa suab xyiv faab rua Yawmsaub, ca le tsaa suab hu nkauj xyiv faab hab qhuas nwg.
Ca le ntaus nkauj nog ncaas hu nkauj qhuas Yawmsaub, ca le ntaus nkauj nog ncaas hab seev suab.
Ca le tshuab xyu tshuab raaj kub yaaj ua lub suab xyiv faab rua ntawm Yawmsaub kws yog vaajntxwv xubndag.
Ca dej havtxwv hab txhua yaam kws nyob puv nkaus huv qw suab nrov ntshu quas nrooj, ca lub nplajteb hab txhua yaam kws nyob huv qw.
Ca tej nam dej npuaj teg, ca tej pov roob hu nkauj ua ke xyiv faab,
rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag, tsua qhov nwg lug txav txem rua lub nplajteb. Nwg yuav txav txem ncaaj nceeg rua lub nplajteb hab txav txem ncaaj rua ib tsoom tuabneeg.
Yawmsaub ua vaajntxwv kaav. Ca ib tsoom tuabneeg tshee quas nyo. Nwg nyob sau lub zwm txwv rua sau tej Khelunpee. Ca lub nplajteb tseeg ua zug quas kais.
Yawmsaub luj kawg nkaus nyob huv Xi‑oo, nwg sab dhau ib tsoom tuabneeg huvsw.
Ca puab qhuas koj lub npe kws luj kawg hab txaus ntshai. Nwg yog tug dawb huv.
Vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg, koj kws nyam kev txav txem ncaaj, koj tsaa txujkev ncaaj kuas nyob ruaj, koj txav txem ncaaj hab ua ncaaj nceeg rua huv Yakhauj caaj ceg.
Ca le qhuas ntxhas Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, ca le pe hawm nwg rua ntawm nwg lub rooj tag taw. Nwg yog tug dawb huv.
Mauxe hab Aloo nyob rua huv Yawmsaub cov pov thawj, Xamuyee kuj nyob huv cov kws tuav Yawmsaub lub npe thov. Puab quaj thov rua Yawmsaub mas nwg teb puab.
Nwg has huv ncej fuab tuaj rua puab, puab kuj tuav rawv nwg tej lug hab tej kaab ke kws nwg qha rua puab.
Au Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, koj teb puab, koj yog tug Vaajtswv kws zaam txem rua puab, hab koj tseed ua pauj taub puab tej kev txhum.
Ca le qhuas ntxhas Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, hab pe hawm nwg rua ntawm nwg lub roob kws dawb huv, tsua qhov Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv yog tug dawb huv.
Taag nrho lub nplajteb, ca le tsaa suab qw xyiv faab rua Yawmsaub.
Ca le zoo sab ua koom rua Yawmsaub. Ca le hu nkauj lug rua ntawm nwg xubndag.
Ca le paub tas Yawmsaub yog Vaajtswv, nwg yog tug kws tswm peb, peb yog nwg le, peb yog nwg haiv tuabneeg, hab yog paab yaaj huv nwg lub tshaav zaub.
Ca le ua nwg tsaug nkaag nwg lub rooj loog moog rua huv, ca le hu nkauj qhuas nkaag moog rua huv nwg tej tshaav puam tuam tsev. Ca le ua nwg tsaug, ca le qhuas nwg lub npe.
Yawmsaub zoo kawg nkaus, nwg txujkev hlub ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws, hab nwg txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau nyob moog rua txhua tam.
Kuv yuav hu nkauj txug qhov kws kuv hlub koj hab qhov kws kuv txav txem ncaaj. Au Yawmsaub, kuv yuav hu nkauj rua koj.
Kuv yuav sau sab hlo ua kuv lub neej kuas tsw muaj chaw thuaj le. Thaus twg koj yuav lug cuag kuv? Kuv yuav ua lub sab dawb paug rua huv kuv lub tsev.
Kuv yuav tsw kheev ib yaam phem twg tshwm lug rua ntawm kuv lub qhov muag. Kuv ntxub cov tuabneeg faav xeeb tej num, puab tej num yuav tsw kis kuv hlo le.
Kuv yuav tsw ua sab nkhaus, kuv yuav tsw ntswg txug txujkev phem hlo le.
Tug kws pheej nyag xyaav kwvtij zej zog mas kuv yuav muab rhuav tshem. Tug kws muab hlub hab sab khaav theeb mas kuv tsw yuav hlo le.
Kuv yuav tsaa laaj muag saib cov kws sab xwb rua Vaajtswv huv lub tebchaws sub puab txhad nrug kuv nyob tau. Tug kws ua lub neej tsw muaj chaw thuaj txhad tau lug ua koom rua kuv.
Tug kws daag ntxag yuav tsw tau nyob huv kuv lub tsev. Tug kws rua ncauj has lug daag yuav tsw nyob ruaj ntawm kuv xubndag.
Txhua taagkig kuv yuav muab cov tuabneeg limham suavdawg huv lub tebchaws ua kuas puam tsuaj taag, hab txav cov tuabneeg ua phem suavdawg tawm ntawm Yawmsaub lub nroog.
Au Yawmsaub, thov noog kuv tej lug thov, thov ca kuv lub suab quaj tuaj txug koj.
Thov tsw xob fee plhu ntawm kuv rua nub kws kuv raug kev nyuaj sab. Thov tig ntsej noog kuv, thov teb kuv sai sai rua nub kws kuv quaj thov koj.
Kuv noob nyoog pluj yaam le paa nchu, kuv tej pob txhaa kub yaam le cub tawg.
Kuv lub sab raug muab nas hab qhuav taag zoo le tej nroj tsuag, kuv tsw ncu noj mov hlo le.
Vem yog kuv lub suab ntsaaj quas lawg, kuv tej daim tawv txhad lu rua kuv tej pob txhaa.
Kuv zoo le ib tug laj kws nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua, hab zoo le ib tug plaas kws nyob huv tej chaw do cuas.
Kuv pw tsw tsaug zug, kuv zoo le tug noog kws nyob twm kawv sau ruv tsev.
Kuv tej yeeb ncuab thuaj luag kuv taag naj taag nub, cov kws tuam mom kuv tuav kuv lub npe tsawm foom.
Kuv noj tshauv ib yaam le noj mov, kuv haus dej ntxuag kua muag,
vem yog koj txujkev chim kev npau tawg. Koj muab kuv tsaa sawv lug hab muab kuv laim pov tseg.
Kuv lub noob nyoog zoo yaam nkaus le tug duab ntxoo rua thaus yuav tsaus ntuj, kuv qhuav quas zug yaam le tej nroj tsuag.
Au Yawmsaub, koj nyob sau lub zwm txwv moog ib txhws, koj lub npe nyob moog rua txhua tam.
Koj yuav sawv tseeg khuvleej Xi‑oo, vem yog txug lub swjhawm kws yuav hlub nwg, lub swjhawm kws teem ca lug txug lawm.
Koj cov qhev nyam nwg tej pob zeb heev, hab khuvleej nwg tej moov aav.
Ib tsoom tebchaws yuav ntshai Yawmsaub lub npe, hab txhua tug vaajntxwv huv nplajteb yuav ntshai koj tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab.
Tsua qhov Yawmsaub yuav tswm Xi‑oo dua tshab, nwg yuav ua nwg tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab tshwm rua suavdawg pum.
Nwg yuav saib hlub cov pluag kws tsw muaj ib yaam daabtsw tej lug thov, hab yuav tsw tso puab tej lug taij thov pov tseg.
Ca le muab zaaj nuav sau tseg ca rua tam tom qaab kws yuav lug, sub tej tuabneeg kws tseed tsw tau yug lug txhad tau qhuas Yawmsaub.
Nwg nyob sau nwg lub chaw sab kws dawb huv saib tuaj, Yawmsaub saib sau ntuj tuaj rua lub nplajteb,
nwg txhad nov tau tej tuabneeg kws raug muab kaw lub suab ntsaaj, hab tso tau cov kws raug txem tuag kuas dim.
Tuabneeg txhad pav Yawmsaub lub npe rua huv Xi‑oo, hab qhuas nwg rua huv Yeluxalee,
rua thaus ib tsoom tuabneeg hab ib tsoom tebchaws tuaj txoos ua ke pe hawm Yawmsaub.
Nwg luv kuv tug zug ntawm ib ntog kev, hab txav kuv lub noob nyoog kuas tuab lu.
Kuv has tas, “Au kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov tsw xob coj kuv moog rua thaus kuv noob nyoog tseed nyob ib nraab neej. Koj lub noob nyoog nyob ib tam dhau ib tam moog ib txhws.”
Thau u koj tag taw rua lub nplajteb, hab lub ntuj yog koj txhais teg ua.
Tej hov yuav puam tsuaj taag, tassws koj nyob ruaj moog, tej hov yuav txawj qub yaam le tej tsoog tsho. Koj muab tej hov hloov yaam le tej tsoog tsho, mas tej hov yuav txawj pluj moog.
Tassws koj tseed zoo le qub, hab koj lub naj lub xyoo tsw txawj kawg.
Koj cov qhev tej tub ki yuav nyob ruaj, hab koj yuav tsaa puab caaj ceg nyob rua ntawm koj xubndag.
Kuv tug ntsuj plig 'e, ca le qhuas Yawmsaub, kuv lub sab lub ntsws, ca le qhuas nwg lub npe kws dawb huv.
Kuv tug ntsuj plig 'e, ca le qhuas Yawmsaub, hab tsw xob nov qaab nwg tej txaj ntswg huvsw.
Nwg yog tug kws zaam koj tej kev txhum huvsw, hab khu koj tej mob kuas zoo huvsw.
Nwg txhwv koj txujsa dim huv qhov tuag, hab muab txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov hab txujkev khuvleej rua koj ntoo.
Nwg pub tej yaam zoo txaus nkaus koj lub sab moog taag koj swm neej, koj txhad rov muaj lub neej hluas zoo le tug daav.
Yawmsaub tsaa txhua tug kws raug quab yuam txujcai, hab tu plaub ncaaj rua puab.
Nwg qha nwg tej kev rua Mauxe paub, hab qha nwg tej num rua cov Yixayee pum.
Yawmsaub muaj sab khuvleej hab muaj kev hlub, nwg tsw chim sai, nwg muaj txujkev hlub ruaj khov nplua mag,
Nwg yuav tsw tshev moog le, nwg yuav tsw chim moog ib txhws.
Nwg tsw ua rua peb lawv le peb lub txem, lossws pauj taub rua peb lawv le peb tej kev txhum.
Lub ntuj nyob sab sau lub nplajteb npaum le caag, nwg txujkev hlub ruaj khov muaj rua cov kws paub ntshai nwg sab npaum le ntawd.
Nub tuaj nyob deb nub poob npaum le caag, nwg daws peb tej kev faav xeeb pov tseg deb npaum le ntawd.
Leejtxwv khuvleej nwg tej mivnyuas le caag, Yawmsaub khuvleej cov kws fwm hab paub ntshai nwg ib yaam le ntawd.
Tsua qhov nwg paub tas peb raug tswm lug le caag, nwg ncu ntsoov tas peb yog moov aav xwb.
Tuabneeg lub noob nyoog zoo ib yaam le tej nroj tsuag, kws tuaj hlub mog nyoos zoo le tej paaj nroj huv teb.
Cua ntsawj dhau lawm tes txawm pluj taag, nwg lub chaw tub tsw paub nwg lawm.
Tassws Yawmsaub txujkev hlub ruaj khov muaj nyob ib txhws thau u lug tsw txawj kawg rua cov kws fwm hab paub ntshai nwg, hab nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg muaj rua puab tej xeeb ntxwv moog le,
yog cov kws tuav rawv nwg tej lug cog tseg hab ncu ntsoov ua lawv le nwg tej lug nkaw.
Yawmsaub tsaa nwg lub zwm txwv nyob ruaj sau ntuj, nwg ua vaajntxwv kaav txhua yaam huvsw.
Mej cov kws yog nwg cov tubkhai ntuj 'e, mej cov kws sab luj sab tuab hab ua lawv le nwg tej lug, hab noog nwg lub suab kws nwg has, mej ca le qhuas Yawmsaub.
Nwg cov tuabneeg suavdawg 'e, mej cov kws ua koom rua nwg hab ua lawv le nwg lub sab, ca le qhuas Yawmsaub.
Txhua yaam kws nwg tswm lug lawd thoob txhua qhov kws nwg kaav, ca le qhuas Yawmsaub. Kuv tug ntsuj plig 'e, ca le qhuas Yawmsaub.
Kuv tug ntsuj plig 'e, ca le qhuas Yawmsaub. Au kuv tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, koj luj kawg nkaus. Koj muab koob meej hab fwjchim meej mom lug naav.
Koj muab qhov kaaj lug npua ib yaam le naav tsho, koj nthuav lub ntuj ib yaam le nthuav lub tsev ntaub.
Koj khaum laag ua koj lub chaw nyob rua txheej sau cov dej naag, koj muab fuab ua tsheb rua koj caij, koj caij tej cua le kauj tis.
Koj khaiv tej cua ua koj le tub xaa xuv, koj swv tej nplaim tawg ci laim lag ua koj cov qhev.
Koj txawb lub nplajteb rua sau tej taw tag, txhad tsw ua zug ib txhws le.
Koj muab dej tub tub lug laum nkaus nwg yaam le naav tsoog, tej dej nyob sau tej roob.
Thaus koj nthe nqho, dej ca le ndwg ceev, thaus nov koj lub suab xub nthe, dej ca le tswv.
Tej dej ndwg sau tej roob nqeg lug rua tej haav, moog rua lub chaw kws koj tu ca rua dej teev.
Koj tu nrwm tsw kheev dej hlaa dhau, sub txhad tsw nyaab sau lub nplajteb dua le lawm.
Koj ua hauv dej txhawv ndwg rua huv tej haav, tej dej txhad ndwg lawv tej kwj haa,
pub rua tej tsaj qus huvsw huv haav zoov tau haus, tej neeg luav qus kuj tau haus daws nqhes.
Ntawm tej ntug dej tej noog sau nruab ntug tau ua zeg nyob, hab quaj zum zawg sau tej ceg ntoo.
Koj nyob sau koj tej chaw sab ywg dej rua sau tej roob, lub nplajteb txhad tsau npo tej num kws koj ua.
Koj ua rua nroj tsuag tuaj rua tej tsaj txhu tau noj, hab ua tej zaub tuaj rua tuabneeg tu sub puab txhad ua tau zaub noj tuaj huv lub nplajteb,
hab ua tau cawv txwv maab kws ua rua tuabneeg zoo sab, hab ua tau roj aulib kws ua rua puab ntsej muag ci, hab ua tej ncuav kws txhawb tuabneeg lub sab muaj zug.
Yawmsaub tej ntoo tau dej tsau npo, yog cov ntoo cab huv Lenpanoo kws nwg cog ca.
Tej noog ua zeg rua sau tej ntoo hov, tej us dej ua chaw nyob rua sau tej ntoo thuv.
Tej roob sab yog sai le chaw nyob, tej roob tsua yog tej ntxwm tsua le chaw nkaum.
Koj tswm lub hli lug suav caij suav nyoog. Lub nub kuj paub lub swjhawm kws yuav poob qho.
Koj ua rua muaj qhov tsaus hab yog mo ntuj, mas tej tsaj qus huvsw huv haav zoov nkaag tawm tuaj.
Tej thaav tsuv ntxhuav nyooj lawg nrhav nqaj tum, hab nrhav noj ntawm Vaajtswv.
Thaus nub tawm puab kuj moog lawm, moog pw rua huv puab tej chaw nkaum.
Tuabneeg kuj tawm moog ua daag num, moog ua num khwv txug tsaus ntuj.
Au Yawmsaub, tej kws koj ua lug lawd ntau kawg nkaus le. Koj muaj tswvyim tswm tej hov huvsw. Lub nplajteb puv nkaus tej kws koj tswm.
Tim u muaj havtxwv luj hab daav, muaj tsaj nruab deg yaa laim quas txag suav tsw txheeb nyob huv, muaj tej tsaj luj tsaj miv huvsw.
Tej nkoj txwg moog lug sau nplaim dej, hab muaj nam tsaj Levi‑athaa kws koj tswm ca kuas ua sw hov ntawd.
Tej tsaj hov huvsw tsaa muag saib koj, vaam koj pub puab tau noj lawv swjhawm.
Thaus koj pub lawd puab kuj khaws ca, thaus koj cev teg, puab kuj tau noj tej kws zoo tsau npo.
Thaus koj fee plhu lawd, puab kuj poob sab nthaav, thaus koj muab puab tej paa rhu lawm, puab kuj tuag hab rov moog ua moov aav.
Thaus koj tso koj tug ntsuj plig  moog, puab kuj raug muab tswm, hab koj tswm txhua yaam sau lub nplajteb dua tshab.
Thov Yawmsaub tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab nyob moog ib txhws, thov Yawmsaub zoo sab xyiv faab rua tej kws nwg tswm lug.
Thaus nwg tsaa muag saib lub nplajteb, lub nplajteb kuj tseeg quas nkawg, nwg kov tej roob, tej roob kuj nchu paa tuaj.
Kuv muaj txujsa nyob ntev le caag, kuv yuav hu nkauj rua Yawmsaub moog le, kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas kuv tug Vaajtswv rua thaus kuv tseed caj sa nyob.
Thov ca tej kws kuv xaav nuav hum nwg lub sab, tsua qhov kuv xyiv faab rua huv Yawmsaub.
Thov ca cov tuabneeg muaj txem raug muab ntxuav tseg huv lub nplajteb, thov ca tej tuabneeg limham pluj taag moog. Kuv tug ntsuj plig 'e, ca le qhuas Yawmsaub, ca le qhuas Yawmsaub lauj!
Ca le ua Yawmsaub tsaug, ca le thov hu nwg lub npe, ca le pav nwg teg num rua txhua haiv tuabneeg.
Ca le hu nkauj rua nwg, hu nkauj qhuas nwg, ca le pav txug txhua yaam num phemfwj kws nwg ua.
Ca le khaav txug nwg lub npe kws dawb huv, ca cov kws nrhav Yawmsaub zoo sab xyiv faab.
Ca le nrhav Yawmsaub hab nrhav nwg tug zug. Nrhav nwg lub xubndag tsw tu le.

Aplahaa kws yog Yawmsaub tug qhev tej caaj ceg 'e. hab Yakhauj cov tub ki kws Yawmsaub xaiv 'e, mej ca le ncu txug tej num phemfwj kws Yawmsaub tau ua, hab nwg tej txujci phemfwj hab tej lug kws nwg txav txem.
Nwg yog Yawmsaub, yog peb tug Vaajtswv. Nwg tej lug txav txem muaj nyob thoob plhawv huv nplajteb.
Nwg yeej ncu ntsoov nwg tej lug cog tseg moog ib txhws, yog tej lug kws nwg qha moog rua ib txheeb tam tuabneeg,
yog tej lug kws nwg cog tseg rua Aplahaa, hab yog tej kws nwg yeem lug cog twv rua Yiha,
yog tej kws Vaajtswv cog lug ruaj nreeg ca rua Yakhauj ua kaab ke, yog cog rua Yixayee ua lug cog tseg moog ib txhws, has tas,
“Kuv yuav pub lub tebchaws Khana‑aa rua koj, ua mej qub txeeg qub teg moog le.”
Thaus puab tseed tsw muaj tuabneeg coob, yeej yog tsawg tsawg le tag, puab tsuas yog lug ua qhua nyob xwb,
tswv moog tswv lug rua haiv tuabneeg nuav rua haiv tuabneeg u, rua lub tebchaws nuav rua lub tebchaws u.
Yawmsaub tsw kheev leejtwg quab yuam puab, vem saib rua puab nwg txhad txwv tej vaajntxwv has tas,
“Tsw xob kov tej kws kuv laub roj tsaa lawd hab tsw xob ua le caag rua kuv cov xwbfwb cev kuv lug.”
Thaus Vaajtswv ua kuas muaj kev tshaib nqhes lug rua lub tebchaws, hab ua puab tej mov noj tsw muaj taag,
nwg khaiv ib tug txwvneej ua puab ntej moog, yog Yauxej kws raug muab muag ua qhev.
Nwg txhais kwtaw raug saw hlau khi mob hloov ntshaav, nwg lub cej daab raug ib raab cuab hlau.
Yawmsaub tej lug tau swm nwg moog txug thaus tej kws nwg has txug tshwm tav taag.
Vaajntxwv Iyi khaiv tuabneeg moog tso nwg dim, tug kws kaav ib tsoom tuabneeg tso nwg dim nyob ywj pheej.
Vaajntxwv tsaa nwg ua tug num luj kws saib vaajntxwv lub tsev, hab ua tug kws kaav vaajntxwv txhua tsaav txhua yaam,
sub nwg txhad qha tau vaajntxwv cov thawj lawv le nwg lub sab nyam hab qha kev txawj ntse rua vaajntxwv cov kev txwj quas laug.
Mas Yixayee txhad tau lug rua huv Iyi tebchaws, Yakhauj txhad tau lug ua qhua nyob huv Haa lub tebchaws.
Yawmsaub ua rua nwg haiv tuabneeg fuam vaam coob, hab pub puab muaj zug heev dua puab tej tshawj chim.
Nwg ua rua cov Iyi lub sab tig rov ntxub Vaajtswv haiv tuabneeg, hab ua rua puab swv tswvyim phem rua Vaajtswv cov tub qhe.
Nwg khaiv Mauxe kws yog nwg tug qhev hab Aloo kws Vaajtswv xaiv ca.
Ob tug ua Vaajtswv tej txujci tseem ceeb tshwm rua huv puab, hab ua txujci phemfwj rua huv Haa lub tebchaws.
Nwg tso qhov tsaus ntuj lug ua rua lub tebchaws tsaus ntuj nti. Puab kwv tawv Vaajtswv tej lug.
Nwg txhad muab puab tej dej txa ua ntshaav, hab ua rua puab tej ntseg tuag taag.
Qaav nce tuaj coob coob puv nkaus lub tebchaws, muaj hlo rua huv vaajntxwv txhua chaav tsev.
Nwg has mas yoov ntsuab kuj yaa tsaus nti lug, hab muaj yoov qab thoob plhawv huv puab lub tebchaws.
Nwg tso lawg nyob naag chaw lug rua puab, hab ua tsag lig xub ci quas nplaag thoob plhawv huv puab lub tebchaws.
Nwg nplawm puab tej txwv maab txwv cua, hab nplawm puab tej ntoo huv lub tebchaws luv taag.
Nwg has xwb mas kooj ntaas yaa tuaj, kooj tshuab yaa tuaj coob suav tsw txheeb le,
tuaj noj tej zaub hab nroj tsuag huv lub tebchaws taag nrho, hab noj tej qoob loos huv tej teb.
Nwg muab puab tej tub hlub tua huvsw huv puab lub tebchaws, kws yog puab thawj tug zug.
Nwg coj cov Yixayee tawm moog, puab coj tau nyaj tau kub moog. Tsw muaj ib tug huv puab xeem dawm kev le.
Thaus puab ncaim moog lawm cov Iyi kuj zoo sab heev, vem yog puab ntshai quas rwg cov Yixayee.
Nwg muab tauv fuab lug roog puab hab nwg muab suavtawg ci rua puab pum kev mo ntuj.
Puab thov mas Vaajtswv coj noog ws lug hab pub mov sau ntuj nplua quas mag rua puab noj.
Nwg qheb qhov zeb mas dej txhawv ndwg lug, ndwg moog rua huv ntuj nraag teb do ib yaam nkaus le ib tug nam dej,
vem nwg ncu txug nwg tej lug cog tseg kws dawb huv hab nwg tug qhev Aplahaa.
Vaajtswv txhad le coj nwg haiv tuabneeg tawm moog ua xyiv faab hlo, coj cov kws nwg xaiv ca lawd moog hu nkauj quas qawg.
Nwg muab lwm haiv tuabneeg tej tebchaws pub rua puab, puab tau tej kws luas khwv tseg ua puab tug,
sub puab txhad le tuav rawv nwg tej kaab ke hab ua lawv le nwg txuj kevcai. Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub. Ca le ua Yawmsaub tsaug, vem nwg zoo kawg. Nwg txujkev hlub ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Leejtwg yuav pav taag Yawmsaub tej num phemfwj hab qha nwg tej num huvsw kws tswm nyog qhuas?
Cov kws tuav rawv kev txav txem ncaaj hab ua ncaaj nceeg txhua lub swjhawm, kuj tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Au Yawmsaub, thaus koj hlub koj haiv tuabneeg, thov ncu txug kuv. Thaus koj tso puab dim, thov paab kuv hab,
sub kuv txhad le pum cov tuabneeg kws koj xaiv ca lawd kev vaam meej, sub kuv txhad tau nrug koj lub tebchaws zoo sab xyiv faab, hab nrug cov kws yog koj qub txeeg qub teg khaav tau.
Peb hab peb tej laug tau ua txhum muaj txem lawm, peb tau ua txhum, peb tau ua phem.

Thaus peb tej laug nyob huv Iyi tebchaws puab tsw quav ntsej koj tej num phemfwj, puab tsw ncu txug koj txujkev hlub ruaj khov kws muaj nplua quas mag, puab tseed faav xeeb rua tug Luj Dua Ndais ntawm havtxwv kws yog Havtxwv Lab.
Txawm le caag los nwg tseed cawm puab dim vem yog saib rua nwg lub npe, sub nwg txhad qha tau nwg tug fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus rua puab paub.
Nwg nthe nqho mas dej Havtxwv Lab ca le qhuav lua, nwg coj puab hlaa huv qaab thu yaam nkaus le hlaa ntuj nraag teb do.
Nwg txhad cawm puab dim huv cov tshawj chim txhais teg, hab tso puab dim ntawm puab cov yeeb ncuab txhais teg.
Dej nyaab hlo cov kws tawm tsaam puab, tsw tshuav ib tug le.
Lub swjhawm hov puab ntseeg Yawmsaub tej lug, puab hu nkauj qhuas nwg.
Tassws tsw ntev puab kuj nov qaab nwg tej num lawm, puab tsw tog saib nwg yuav taw qha le caag.
Nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua mas puab nqhes heev, puab txhad swm Vaajtswv huv ntuj nraag teb do.
Nwg pub lawv le puab thov tassws nwg kuj tso mob phem lug raug puab.
Thaus cov tuabneeg huv lub zog khib Mauxe hab Aloo kws yog Yawmsaub tug qhev dawb huv,
tes aav ca le to qhov ntuj nqog hlo Ntathaa hab txhub Anpilaa paab tuabneeg huvsw.
Suavtawg kuj poob lug rua sau puab cov hov kub hlo cov tuabneeg limham huvsw.
Cov Yixayee ua ib tug txoov daab thaav nyuj ntawm Haule hab pe tug txoov daab kws puab nchuav hov.
Puab muab Vaajtswv tug fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab pauv tug txoov daab txwv nyuj kws yog tsaj noj zaub.
Puab nov qaab Vaajtswv kws yog puab tug cawmseej, kws tau ua tej num luj heev rua huv Iyi tebchaws,
hab ua tej num phemfwj huv Haa lub tebchaws hab tej kws txaus ntshai kawg ntawm Havtxwv Lab.

Vem le nuav nwg txhad has tas nwg yuav muab puab ua kuas puam tsuaj, tsuas yog muaj Mauxe kws Vaajtswv tau xaiv ca lawd sawv lug tiv thaiv ntawm Vaajtswv xubndag txhad le taav tau Vaajtswv txujkev npau tawg tsw ua kuas puam tsuaj xwb.
Dhau hov puab kuj saib tsw taug lub tebchaws kws zoo ua noj, puab tsw ntseeg tej lug kws Vaajtswv cog tseg.
Puab ywg tuj tawg huv puab tej tsev ntaub, puab tsw noog Yawmsaub lub suab.
Vem le nuav Yawmsaub txhad le tsaa teg hab cog lug twv rua puab tas nwg yuav ua rua puab tuag taag rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua,
hab ua rua puab caaj ceg tawg rwv ua saab ua sua moog rua huv txhua haiv tuabneeg, hab lawv puab moog nyob thoob plhawv txhua lub tebchaws.
Puab kuj moog zwm rua tug daab Npa‑aa ntawm Pe‑au, hab noj tej kws muab xyeem rua tej txoov daab kws tsw muaj sa.
Tej kws puab ua hov zwg ua rua Yawmsaub chim heev, txhad muaj mob phem tshwm lug raug puab.
Mas Fineha txhad sawv tseeg cheem, mas tej mob ntawd txhad tsw muaj ntxwv lawm.
Tej kws nwg ua hov Vaajtswv suav tas yog kev ncaaj nceeg rua Fineha, ib tam dhau ib tam moog ib txhab ib txhws.
Puab ua rua Vaajtswv chim ntawm dej Melinpa, mas qhov kws puab ua le hov puag tsuas Mauxe,
vem yog puab ua rua Mauxe nyuaj sab nwg txhad le ua ncauj sai lawm.
Puab tsw muab lwm haiv tuabneeg ua kuas puam tsuaj lawv le Vaajtswv has kuas puab ua
tassws puab moog nrug lwm haiv tuabneeg nyob sws xyaw hab xyum ua lawv le luas ua.
Puab ua koom rua luas tej txoov daab kws ua yej ua ntxab cuab puab.
Puab tua puab tej tub tej ntxhais xyeem rua daab.
Puab muab cov kws tsw txhum tej ntshaav nchuav, yog puab tej tub tej ntxhais le ntshaav kws puab muab tua xyeem rua Khana‑aa tej txoov daab. Ntshaav txhad puag tsuas lub tebchaws qas tsw huv lawm.
Qhov kws puab ua le hov ua rua puab qas tsw huv, puab ua le hov mas puab zoo ib yaam le puj muag cev.
Yawmsaub txhad le npau tawg rua nwg haiv tuabneeg, hab ntxub nwg qub txeeg qub teg.
Nwg txhad muab puab rua huv ib tsoom tebchaws txhais teg mas tej tuabneeg kws ntxub puab txhad kaav puab.
Puab cov yeeb ncuab quab yuam puab hab puab poob rua huv luas kev tswjfwm.
Yawmsaub tso puab dim ntau zag tassws puab pheej txhob txwm faav xeeb, puab poob qeg kawg le vem yog puab ua txhum.
Txawm le caag los thaus Vaajtswv nov puab lub suab quaj thov nwg saib rua puab tej kev txom nyem nyuaj sab.
Yog saib rua puab, Vaajtswv txhad ncu txug nwg tej lug cog tseg, hab vem nwg txujkev hlub ruaj khov kws muaj nplua quas mag, nwg txhad rov khuvleej puab.
Nwg ua rua txhua tug kws nteg puab ca le taab ncuab puab.
Au Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, thov koj cawm peb dim lauj, thov qaws peb huv txhua lub tebchaws rov lug es peb yuav ua tsaug koj lub npe kws dawb huv hab khaav qhov kws peb qhuas koj.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub kws yog Yixayee tug Vaajtswv ib txwm thau u lug moog ib txhws le. Ca ib tsoom tuabneeg has tas “Amee.” Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub.
Ca le ua Yawmsaub tsaug, vem nwg zoo kawg, nwg txujkev hlub ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Ca cov kws Yawmsaub txhwv dim lawd has le ntawd, yog cov kws nwg txhwv dim huv yeeb ncuab txhais teg lug
hab sau tawm huv tej tebchaws saab nub tuaj saab nub poob, saab peg saab nraag huvsw lug ua ke.
Muaj ib txha moog moog lug lug huv ntuj nraag teb do, nrhav tsw tau kev moog rua huv lub moos twg kws puab nyob tau.
Puab tshaib plaab nqhes dej, puab tug ntsuj plig qaug zug taag rua huv puab.
Thaus puab raug ceblaaj puab quaj thov Yawmsaub, nwg kuj tso puab dim puab tej kev txom nyem nyuaj sab.
Nwg coj puab taug txujkev ncaaj, moog txug ib lub moos kws puab nyob tau.
Ca puab ua Yawmsaub tsaug vem nwg txujkev hlub ruaj khov hab nwg tej num phemfwj kws nwg ua paab ib tsoom tuabneeg.
Tug kws nqhes, nwg kuj pub kuas txaus, tug kws tshaib, nwg kuj pub tej yaam zoo kuas tsau.
Ib txha nyob huv qhov tsaus ntuj hab qhov tsaus dub ncab, yog cov kws raug kaw txom nyem hab raug saw hlau khi,
vem puab faav xeeb Vaajtswv tej lug, hab saib tsw taug tug kws Luj Dua Ndais tej lug qha.
Vaajtswv ua rua puab lub sab qaug zug vem ua num nyaav, puab qaug taag tsw muaj leejtwg paab.
Thaus puab raug ceblaaj puab quaj thov Yawmsaub, nwg kuj tso puab dim puab tej kev txom nyem nyuaj sab.
Nwg coj puab tawm huv qhov tsaus dub ncab hab qhov tsaus ntuj nti lug. hab muab tej saw kws khi puab tu pov tseg.
Ca puab ua Yawmsaub tsaug vem nwg txujkev hlub ruaj khov hab nwg tej num phemfwj kws nwg ua paab ib tsoom tuabneeg.
Nwg tsoo tej qhov rooj tooj lab, hab txav tej taab hlau pov tseg.
Ib txha kuj ruag vem puab tej kev txhum txem. Vem tim puab tej kev txhum puab txhad raug txom nyem.
Puab ntxub txhua yaam zaub mov, puab moog ze lub qhov rooj kev tuag.
Thaus puab raug ceblaaj puab quaj thov Yawmsaub, nwg kuj tso puab dim puab tej kev txom nyem nyuaj sab.
Nwg xaa nwg tej lug moog hab khu puab tej mob hab tso puab dim kev puam tsuaj.
Ca puab ua Yawmsaub tsaug vem nwg txujkev hlub ruaj khov hab nwg tej num phemfwj kws nwg ua paab ib tsoom tuabneeg.
Ca puab ua kevcai xyeem ua nwg tsaug, hab hu nkauj xyiv faab pav txug tej kws nwg ua lug lawd.
Ib txha kuj caij nkoj moog huv havtxwv, nrhav noj huv dej havtxwv kws luj.
Puab pum tej kws Yawmsaub ua yog nwg tej num phemfwj huv havtxwv kws tub.
Nwg has lug hab ua kuas muaj cua daaj cua dub ntsawj, ua rua dej havtxwv ndaas tej nam nthwv.
Cov tuabneeg hov nce moog nto ntuj hab poob rua huv qhov kws tub heev. Puab lub sab ntsws yaaj taag rua tej xwm txheej phem kws puab raug.
Puab qaug yoj quas yeeg ua pig ua poog yaam le qaug cawv, hab kawg tswvyim lawm.
Mas thaus puab raug ceblaaj puab quaj thov Yawmsaub, nwg kuj cawm puab dim puab tej kev txom nyem nyuaj sab.
Nwg ua rua cua daaj cua dub tu, hab tej nthwv dej havtxwv kuj tug lawm.
Puab txawm zoo sab vem yog puab nyob tug yeeg lawm, nwg kuj coj puab lug rua lub chaw kws puab xaav moog.
Ca puab ua Yawmsaub tsaug vem nwg txujkev hlub ruaj khov hab nwg tej num phemfwj kws nwg ua paab ib tsoom tuabneeg.
Ca puab qhuas ntxhas nwg rua huv ib tsoom tuabneeg kws tuaj txoos ua ke, hab qhuas nwg rua huv cov kev txwj quas laug kws tuaj sablaaj.
Nwg muab tej nam dej ntxeev ua ntuj nraag teb do, hab tej qhov dej txhawv ntxeev ua aav qhuav nkig nkuav,
hab muab lub tebchaws kws qoob loos zoo ntxeev ua chaw do cuas hab daw ntsev vem tim cov tuabneeg kws nyob lub tebchaws hov kev limham.
Nwg muab ntuj nraag teb do ntxeev ua paag dej, hab tebchaws qhuav nkig nkuav ntxeev ua qhov dej txhawv.
Nwg pub cov tuabneeg tshaib tau nyob hov ntawd, mas puab tswm tsaa lub moos ua puab lub chaw nyob.
Puab tseb noob rua huv teb hab cog vaaj txwv maab, mas tau qoob ntsu heev.
Nwg foom koob moov rua puab, puab txhad le fuam vaam coob, hab nwg tsw ca puab tej tsaj txhu tsawg quas zug.
Thaus puab raug luas muab rhuav tsawg zuj zug hab raug kev quab yuam, raug tej kev ceblaaj hab raug tej kev nyuaj sab ua rua puab poob qeg,
mas Vaajtswv saib tsw taug cov kws ua thawj, hab ua rua cov thawj hov moog moog lug lug huv tej chaw do cuas kws tsw muaj kev taug.
Tassws nwg tsaa cov pluag sawv huv qhov txom nyem lug, hab ua rua puab tej tub ki fuam vaam coob yaam le tej paab yaaj.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg pum mas zoo sab, hab cov tuabneeg limham suavdawg kaw qhov ncauj.
Leejtwg txawj ntse, ca nwg ua tuab zoo noog tej nuav, ca tuabneeg xaav txug Yawmsaub txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov.
Au Vaajtswv, kuv lub sab nyob ruaj khov, kuv lub sab ruaj khov tag. Kuv yuav hu nkauj, kuv lub sab yuav seev suab hu nkauj.
Nkauj nog ncaas luj hab nkauj nog ncaas miv 'e, ca le tswm dheev, kuv yuav tsaa kuas kaaj ntug tswm dheev.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv yuav ua koj tsaug rua huv ib tsoom tuabneeg, kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas koj rua huv ib tsoom tebchaws.
Vem yog koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov sab dhau qaum ntuj, hab koj txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau sab moog txug cov fuab.
Au Vaajtswv thov ca koj raug txhawb nqaa sab dhau lub ntuj, thov koj tug fwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab nthuav thoob plawg nplajteb.
Thov koj txhais teg xws paab hab thov koj teb kuv sub cov kws koj hlub txhad le tau dim.
Vaajtswv has ntawm lub chaw pe hawm nwg tas, “Kuv yuav zoo sab hlo muab lub moos Sekhee faib hab muab lub haav Xukhau faib.
Kile‑a tebchaws yog kuv tug, Manaxe tebchaws yog kuv le, Efa‑i tebchaws yog kuv lub mom hlau, Yuta tebchaws yog kuv tug cwj nreg,
Mau‑a tebchaws yog lub phaaj dej kws kuv ntxuav cev, kuv laim kuv txhais khau rua sau Entoo tebchaws, kuv qw lub suab kws kov yeej rua sau Filixatee tebchaws.”
Leejtwg yuav coj kuv moog rua huv lub moos kws muaj ntsaa loog thaiv? Leejtwg yuav coj kuv moog rua huv Entoo?
Au Vaajtswv, koj muab peb tso tseg lawm lov? Au Vaajtswv, koj tsw nrug peb cov tub rog tawm moog lov?
Thov koj paab peb tiv cov tshawj chim, tsua qhov tuabneeg paab mas tsw tau qaabhau hlo le.
Yog peb nrug Vaajtswv mas peb yuav kov yeej, nwg yog tug kws yuav tsuj ntag peb cov tshawj chim.
Au Vaajtswv, tug kws kuv qhuas, thov koj tsw xob ca le nyob ntsag tu.
Vem yog cov tuabneeg limham kws daag ntxag rua ncauj tawm tsaam kuv, hab tug nplaig cis daag ab ham kuv.
Puab has tej lug ntxub ntxaug vej quas vog kuv, hab kuv tub tsw txhum los puab laam nkaug kuv.
Puab kom kuv pauj qhov kws kuv hlub puab, hab kuv tsuas muaj kws thov Vaajtswv xwb.
Puab ua phem pauj tej kws kuv ua zoo rua puab, puab muab txujkev ntxub ntxaug lug pauj kuv tej kev hlub.
Thov nrhav ib tug tuabneeg phem tum nwg, hab ca ib tug nyob ntawm nwg saab xws kom nwg.
Thaus kws has plaub, thov kuas nwg yog tug kws txhum, hab ca nwg tej lug thov Vaajtswv kuj txhum hab.
Thov ca nwg lub caij nyoog ua neej nyob tsw ntev, thov kuas muaj dua ib tug lug nyob nwg chaw ua num.
Thov ca nwg tej mivnyuas ua ntsuag nog hab nwg tug quaspuj ua puj ntsuag.
Ca nwg tej mivnyuas ua loj leeb thov khawv, thov ca puab raug muab lawv tawm huv tej qaab zeb qaab caa kws puab nkaum moog.
Thov ca tug kws nwg tshuav nqe tuaj sau hlo nwg tej hov txhua chaw huvsw moog, thov ca luas tej tuaj lws tej kws nwg khwv tau huvsw moog.
Thov kuas tsw xob muaj ib tug hlub nwg, hab tsw xob muaj ib tug khuvleej nwg tej mivnyuas ntsuag nog.
Thov ca nwg caaj ceg raug txav tu noob, thov ca tam tom qaab nwg tej npe pluj moog le.
Thov kuas Yawmsaub ncu quas ntsoov nwg tej laug tej kev txhum txem, hab thov tsw xob ntxuav nwg nam lub txem.
Thov ca lub txem txhum hov nyob ntawm Yawmsaub lub xubndag moog le, thov Yawmsaub ua kuas tsw xob muaj leejtwg ncu txug puab tej npe huv nplajteb moog le.
Tug hov tsw ncu qhov kws nwg yuav hlub luas le, tsuas yog tswm txom tej tuabneeg pluag hab txom nyem hab lwj sab moog txug tuag le.
Nwg nyam foom tsw zoo rua luas, ca nwg raug foom tsw zoo hab. Nwg tsw nyam foom koob moov rua luas, mas ca tej koob moov nyob deb ntawm nwg.
Nwg muab tej lug tshev foom lug naav ib yaam le naav tsoog tsho, ca tej lug tshev foom thaws rua huv nwg lub cev yaam nkaus le dej, hab thaws rua huv nwg tej txhaa yaam nkaus le roj.
Thov kuas tej lug foom phem zoo yaam le cev tsoog tsho kws qhwv nkaus nwg lub cev, hab zoo le txuj hlaab kws naj nub sa zawm lub cev.
Thov Yawmsaub muab tej lug tshev foom nuav pauj rua cov kws kom kuv, yog cov kws has lug phem tawm tsaam kuv.
Au Yawmsaub kws yog kuv tug Tswv, thov koj saib rua koj lub npe es paab kuv. Vem koj txujkev hlub ruaj khov zoo kawg nkaus, thov cawm kuv dim.
Kuv pluag hab txom nyem, hab kuv nyob lwj sab ntsuav.
Kuv saamswm yuav dua moog yaam nkaus le duab ntxoov ntxoo thaus yuav tsaus ntuj, kuv raug muab xyeeb yaam nkaus le tug kooj.
Kuv lub hauv caug tsw muaj zug vem yog yoo mov, kuv lub cev kuj ntxaug sem taag lawm.
Kuv raug cov kws kom kuv thuaj, thaus luas pum kuv luas luag cu hau quas nyo.
Au Yawmsaub kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, thov paab kuv, thov cawm kuas kuv dim, lawv le koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov.
Thov ua kuas luas paub tas tej nuav yog koj txhais teg ua. Au Yawmsaub, tej nuav yeej yog koj ua tag.
Ca puab foom tsw zoo, kuas thov koj foom koob moov rua kuv. Ca cov kws tawm tsaam kuv poob ntsej muag, thov pub koj tug tub qhe zoo sab.
Thov ca txujkev txaaj muag qhwv nkaus cov kws kom kuv, hab ca txujkev poob ntsej muag npug nkaus puab yaam le naav lub tsho ntev.
Kuv yuav tsaa ncauj ua Yawmsaub tsaug kawg nkaus, kuv yuav qhuas nwg rua huv ib zeej tsoom kws tuaj txoos ua ke.
Tsua qhov Yawmsaub nyob rawv ntawm tug kws txom nyem saab xws, sub txhad cawm tau nwg dim ntawm cov kws rau txem tuag rua nwg.
Yawmsaub has rua kuv tug tswv tas, “Ca le nyob tsawg ntawm kuv saab xws, moog txug thaus kuv muab koj cov yeeb ncuab ua koj lub rooj tag taw.”
Yawmsaub yuav ua rua koj tug cwj kws muaj fwjchim kaav huv Xi‑oo moog daav quas zug. Ca le ua vaajntxwv kaav koj cov tshawj chim.

Koj cov tuabneeg yuav yeem pub puab tug kheej rua nub kws koj coj koj cov tub rog moog rua sau tej roob kws dawb huv. Koj cov tub hluas yuav lug cuag koj, ib yaam le dej lwg tawm huv kaaj ntug lub plaab lug.
Yawmsaub tub cog lug tawv lawm, nwg yuav tsw hloov dua sab le. “Koj ua pov thawj moog ib txhws ib yaam le Mekhixente.”
Tug Tswv nyob ntawm koj saab teg xws, nwg yuav tsoo tej vaajntxwv tawg taag rua nub kws nwg npau tawg.
Nwg yuav txav txem rua ib tsoom tebchaws ua kuas muaj cev tuag puv taag, nwg yuav tsoo cov kws ua thawj thoob nplajteb pam taag.
Vaajntxwv yuav haus tug dej kws ndwg lawv ntug kev, yog le hov nwg yuav tsaa nwg lub taubhau sawv sab.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub. Kuv yuav ua Yawmsaub tsaug kawg kuv lub sab rua huv ib tsoom tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg kws tuaj txoos ua ke.
Tej num kws Yawmsaub ua mas luj kawg le, txhua tug kws txaus sab rua tej num hov yuav kawm hab xaav txug.
Yawmsaub tej num mas muaj koob meej hab fwjchim meej mom, hab nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg nyob ruaj khov moog ib txhws.
Nwg ua kuas ncu ntsoov nwg tej num phemfwj, Yawmsaub muaj lub sab hlub sab khuvleej.
Nwg pub zaub mov rua cov kws fwm hab paub ntshai nwg, nwg pheej ncu ntsoov nwg tej lug cog tseg.
Nwg tub ua nwg tug fwjchim tshwm huv nwg teg num rua nwg cov tuabneeg pum, yog qhov kws nwg muab lwm haiv tuabneeg le tebchaws lug ua puab tug.
Yawmsaub teg num mas ncaaj nceeg hab muaj tseeb, txhua yaam kws nwg qha peb ua mas tso sab tau.
Tej lug qha hov nyob ruaj khov moog ib txhws tsw kawg. Tej lug hov mas nwg qha tseeb hab qha ncaaj.
Nwg txhwv nwg haiv tuabneeg dim, nwg has kuas tej lug kws nwg cog tseg nyob ruaj khov moog ib txhws. Nwg lub npe mas dawb huv hab txaus ntshai kawg.
Qhov kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub mas yog lub hauv paug tswvyim. Cov kws xyum lawv nraim le ntawd yuav nkaag sab zoo. Nwg yuav tau lu lug qhuas ib txhws tsw kawg.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub. Tug kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub tau nyob kaaj sab lug, yog tug kws zoo sab kawg rua Yawmsaub tej lug nkaw.
Nwg tej tub ki yuav muaj fwjchim rua huv lub tebchaws. Tug kws ncaaj nceeg le caaj ceg yuav tau koob moov.
Nyaj txag hab kev nplua nuj nyob huv nwg lub tsev, nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg yuav nyob moog ib txhws.
Qhov kaaj ci huv qhov tsaus ntuj tshwm lug rua tug kws sab ncaaj, yog tshwm rua tug kws muaj sab hlub sab khuvleej hab ncaaj nceeg.
Tug kws ua lub sab daav hab qev rua luas, hab ua txhua yaam raug cai mas nwg yuav tau nyob zoo.
Tug kws ncaaj nceeg yuav nyob ruaj nreeg, tuabneeg yuav ncu txug nwg moog ib txhws.
Nwg tsw ntshai tej xuv xwm phem, nwg lub sab tseed ruaj khov tso sab rua Yawmsaub.
Nwg lub sab tawv qhawv nwg tsw ntshai le, mas thaus kawg nwg yuav pum nwg cov yeeb ncuab swb lawm.
Nwg zoo sab faib rua luas hab pub rua tej pluag, nwg txujkev ncaaj nceeg yuav nyob moog ib txhws, nwg txwm kub yuav muaj koob meej luj.
Cov tuabneeg limham pum kuj chim, puab zawm nav quas zog hab ca le pluj taag lawm, tej kws puab xaav tseg kuj ua tsw tav.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub. Yawmsaub cov tub qhe 'e, ca le qhuas nwg, ca le qhuas Yawmsaub lub npe.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub lub npe txwj nwgnuav moog ib txhws tsw kawg.
Txwj ncua nub tuaj moog txug nub poob, tswm nyog qhuas Yawmsaub lub npe.
Yawmsaub nyob sab dhau ib tsoom tebchaws suavdawg, nwg tug fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab sab dua lub ntuj.
Leejtwg zoo cuag le peb tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub kws nyob lub zwm txwv sau ntuj?
Nwg nyob sau saib tuaj rua lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb.
Nwg tsaa cov tuabneeg pluag sawv huv cov moov aav lug, hab tsaa cov tuabneeg txom nyem sawv huv qhov tshauv lug,
pub puab tau nrug cov tuabneeg muaj meej nyob tsawg ua ke, yog cov kws ua thawj huv Yawmsaub haiv tuabneeg.
Nwg pub rua tug quaspuj kws ib txwm muaj tsw taug mivnyuas muaj vaaj muaj tsev, hab pub nwg muaj mivnyuas txhad zoo sab xyiv faab. Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub los maj.
Thaus cov Yixayee tawm huv Iyi tebchaws, yog Yakhauj caaj ceg kws tawm huv lwm haiv tuabneeg kws has lwm yaam lug,
Yuta txhad le ua lub chaw pe hawm Yawmsaub, hab Yixayee yog lub tebchaws kws Yawmsaub kaav.
Dej havtxwv pum mas ca le tswv, dej Yalatee ca le ndwg rov qaab.
Tej roob dha paaj pawg yaam le tej txwv yaaj, hab tej pov roob dha paaj pawg le mivnyuas yaaj.
Dej havtxwv 'e, ua caag koj ca le tswv? Dej Yalatee 'e, ua caag koj ca le ndwg rov qaab?
Tej roob 'e, ua caag mej dha paaj pawg yaam le tej txwv yaaj? Tej pov roob 'e, ua caag mej dha paaj pawg le mivnyuas yaaj?
Lub nplajteb 'e, ca le tshee nyo rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub xubndag, tshee rua ntawm Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv xubndag,
yog tug kws muab tej pob zeb ua paag dej, hab muab tej pob zeb tawv tawv ua dej txhawv.
Au Yawmsaub, ca koj tuab leeg lub npe tau koob meej, tsw yog muab rua peb, tsw yog muab rua peb, vem koj muaj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov hab muaj txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau.
Ua caag ib tsoom tebchaws yuav has tas, “Puab tug Vaajtswv nyob hovtwg?”
Peb tug Vaajtswv nyob sau ntuj, nwg ua txhua yaam lawv le nwg lub sab nyam.
Puab tej txoov daab yog nyaj hab kub, yog tuabneeg txhais teg ua.
Tej txoov daab hov muaj qhov ncauj los has tsw tau lug, muaj qhov muag los tsw pum kev,
muaj qhov ntsej los tsw nov lug, muaj qhov ntswg los tsw nov ntxhab,
muaj teg los tsw txawj xuas, muaj kwtaw los moog tsw tau kev, hab tsw txawj ua suab huv caj paas.
Cov kws ua tej txoov daab hov kuj zoo ib yaam le tej txoov daab hov, hab cov kws vaam khom tej txoov daab hov kuj zoo ib yaam nkaus.
Cov Yixayee 'e, ca le tso sab rua Yawmsaub. Nwg yog tug kws paab hab yog daim phaj hlau thaiv puab.
Aloo caaj ceg 'e, ca le tso sab rua Yawmsaub. Nwg yog tug kws paab hab yog daim phaj hlau thaiv puab.
Mej cov kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub, ca le tso sab rua Yawmsaub. Nwg yog tug kws paab hab yog daim phaj hlau thaiv puab.
Yawmsaub ncu ntsoov peb, nwg yuav foom koob moov rua peb. Nwg yuav foom koob moov rua Yixayee caaj ceg, nwg yuav foom koob moov rua Aloo caaj ceg.
Nwg yuav foom koob moov rua cov kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub, tsw has cov hlub cov yau huvsw.
Thov Yawmsaub pub rua mej fuam vaam coob, tsw has mej hab mej cov tub ki huvsw.
Thov Yawmsaub kws tswm lub ntuj lub teb nchuav koob moov lug rua mej.
Lub ntuj yog Yawmsaub le, tassws lub nplajteb nwg pub rua ib tsoom tuabneeg.
Cov kws tuag lawm tsw txawj qhuas Yawmsaub, hab cov kws nqeg moog rua qhov chaw ntsag tu kuj ib yaam nkaus.
Tassws peb yuav qhuas Yawmsaub, txwj nwgnuav moog ib txhws tsw kawg. Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub lauj!
Kuv lub sab npuab Yawmsaub vem nwg nov kuv lub suab hab kuv tej lug thov.
Vem nwg tig ntsej noog kuv, kuv txhad yuav thov nwg taag kuv swm neej.
Txujkev tuag rooj hlua cuab vej puag ncig kuv, tub tuag teb txujkev mob nteg kuv ca, kuv raug kev txom nyem nyuaj sab hab kev lwj sab.
Kuv txhad thov hu Yawmsaub lub npe tas, “Au Yawmsaub, thov koj cawm kuv txujsa dim.”
Yawmsaub muaj sab hlub hab ncaaj nceeg, peb tug Vaajtswv muaj sab khuvleej.
