Qhov kws nthuav koj tej lug ua rua pum kev kaaj quas lug, hab pub kev nkaag sab rua cov kws tsw thoob tswb.
Kuv txug sav rua ncauj tsuag vem nqhes koj tej lug nkaw heev.
Thov koj tig lug rua kuv hab hlub kuv ib yaam le koj txeev ua rua cov kws nyam koj lub npe.
Thov koj pub kuas kuv kwtaw nyob ruaj nreeg lawv le koj tej lug cog tseg, thov tsw xob kheev ib yaam kev txhum twg kov yeej kuv.
Thov txhwv kuv dim tej kws tuabneeg quab yuam kuv, sub kuv txhad tuav rawv koj tej kev tswjfwm.
Thov koj lub ntsej muag ci ntsaa ab rua koj tug tub qhe, hab thov qha koj tej kaab ke rua kuv.
Kuv kua muag ndwg quas lawg le dej ndwg vem yog tuabneeg tsw tuav rawv koj txuj kevcai.
Au Yawmsaub, koj yog tug ncaaj nceeg, koj yeej txav txem raug kev raug cai.
Koj yeej tu koj tej lug qha ncaaj nceeg hab tso sab tau huvsw.
Kuv lub sab kub quas lug cuag suavtawg hlawv vem kuv cov tshawj chim nov qaab koj tej lug lawm.
Koj tej lug cog tseg tub muab swm zoo zoo le lawm, koj tug tub qhe nyam tej lug hov.
Kuv yog ib tug tsw tseem ceeb hab luas saib tsw taug, tassws kuv tsw nov qaab koj tej kev tswjfwm.
Koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg yeej yuav ncaaj nceeg moog ib txhws, hab koj txuj kevcai yog txuj tseeb.
Kev txom nyem hab kev lwj sab lug raug kuv, tassws koj tej lug nkaw ua rua kuv zoo sab xyiv faab.
Koj tej lug qha ncaaj nceeg moog ib txhws, thov pub kuv nkaag sab kuv txhad le caj sa nyob.
Kuv taij thov koj kawg kuv lub sab. Au Yawmsaub, thov koj teb kuv, kuv yuav ua lawv le koj tej kaab ke.
Kuv quaj thov koj, thov cawm kuas kuv dim, sub kuv txhad ua tau lawv le koj tej lug qha.
Kuv sawv thaus tsw tau kaaj ntug thov koj paab kuv, kuv vaam ntsoov koj tej lug.
Kuv yeej pw tsw tsaug zug ib mos kaaj ntug le, sub kuv txhad tshawb nrhav tau koj tej lug cog tseg.
Thov koj noog kuv lub suab lawv le koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov. Au Yawmsaub, thov koj tuav kuv txujsa lawv le koj txujkev ua ncaaj ua nceeg.
Cov tuabneeg kws ntaus tswvyim phem xaav tswm txom kuv, puab tub tuaj ze lawm, puab yeej nyob deb ntawm koj txuj kevcai.
Au Yawmsaub, koj nyob ze kuv, hab koj tej lug nkaw puavleej muaj tseeb.
Kuv tub kawm paub ntawm koj tej lug qha ntev lug lawm tas koj tswm koj tej lug qha kuas nyob moog ib txhws.
Thov tsaa muag saib kuv tej kev txom nyem, hab tso kuv dim, vem kuv yeej tsw nov qaab koj txuj kevcai.
Thov paab has kuv tshaaj plaub hab txhwv kuv dim, thov tuav kuv txujsa lawv le koj tej lug cog tseg.
Cov tuabneeg limham yeej tsw dim vem yog puab tsw nrhav koj tej kaab ke.
Au Yawmsaub, koj txujkev khuvleej luj kawg nkaus, thov tuav kuv txujsa lawv le koj txav txem ncaaj nceeg.
Cov kws tswm txom kuv hab tawm tsaam kuv muaj coob kawg le, los kuv tsw zos koj tej lug qha le.
Kuv tsaa muag saib cov tuabneeg faav xeeb mas kuv ntxub kawg le, tsua qhov puab tsw tuav rawv koj tej lug nkaw.
Thov koj tshuaj saib kuv nyam koj tej kev tswjfwm npaum le caag, thov koj tuav kuv txujsa lawv le koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov.
Lub ntsab luj huv koj tej lug yog kev tseeb, hab koj tej lug phua cai ncaaj nceeg txhua lu yuav nyob moog ib txhws le.
Kuv tsw tau ua txhum los cov thawj ca le tswm txom kuv, tassws kuv lub sab tseed fwm hab ntshai koj tej lug.
Kuv zoo sab xyiv faab rua koj tej lug yaam nkaus le tug kws tau tej txhaab nyaj.
Kuv ntxub hab dhuav tej lug daag, tassws kuv nyam koj txuj kevcai.
Kuv qhuas koj ib nub xyaa zag vem koj tej lug phua cai ncaaj nceeg.
Cov kws nyam koj txuj kevcai tau zoo nyob kaaj sab lug, tsw muaj ib yaam daabtsw dawm teg dawm taw.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv vaam ntsoov koj txujkev cawm dim, hab kuv ua lawv le koj tej lug nkaw.
Kuv lub sab tuav rawv koj tej lug qha, kuv nyam koj tej lug ntawd heev kawg le.
Kuv tuav rawv koj tej kev tswjfwm hab koj tej lug qha tsua qhov kuv txhua txujkev nyob ntawm koj lub xubndag.
Au Yawmsaub, thov ca kuv lub suab thov nce tuaj txug koj xubndag, thov pub kuv nkaag sab lawv le koj tej lug cog tseg.
Thov kuv tej lug taij nce tuaj txug koj xubndag, thov cawm kuv lawv le koj tej lug cog tseg.
Kuv daim tawv ncauj yuav qhuas koj tsw tu, vem koj tub qha koj tej kaab ke rua kuv.
Kuv tug nplaig yuav hu nkauj txug koj tej lug, vem koj tej lug nkaw puavleej ncaaj nceeg.
Thov koj txhais teg npaaj rawv kws yuav paab kuv, vem kuv tub xaiv coj lawv le koj tej kev tswjfwm.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv ntshaw koj txujkev cawm dim, hab zoo sab xyiv faab rua koj txuj kevcai.
Thov pub kuv muaj txujsa nyob sub kuv txhad qhuas tau koj, hab ca koj tej lug phua cai paab kuv.
Kuv yuam kev ib yaam le tug yaaj kws pluj lawm, thov tuaj nrhav koj tug tub qhe, tsua qhov kuv tsw nov qaab koj tej lug nkaw.
Thaus kuv raug kev nyuaj sab kuv thov hu Yawmsaub, nwg kuj teb kuv.
“Au Yawmsaub, thov tso kuv dim daim tawv ncauj pem txwv hab tug nplaig daag ntxag.”
Tug nplaig daag ntxag 'e, yuav ua daabtsw rua koj, hab yuav tsaav daabtsw ntxwv rua koj?
Yog muab tub rog raab xub nee kws ntse, hab muab ntoo ua thee cig quas plawg rua koj.
Kuv raug txom nyem lauj, zoo le kuv nrug cov tuabneeg Mese nyob, hab nyob huv cov tuabneeg Khenta tej tsev ntaub.
Kuv nrug cov tuabneeg kws ntxub kev thaaj yeeb nyob, ntev dhau lawm.
Kuv nyam kev thaaj yeeb, tassws thaus kuv has, puab tseed txhob kev ua rog.
Kuv tsaa muag saib sau tej roob. Txujkev paab kuv yuav tuaj hovtwg tuaj?
Txujkev paab kuv tuaj ntawm Yawmsaub tuaj, yog tug kws tswm ntuj tswm teb.
Nwg yuav tsw kheev koj txhais kwtaw nplaam, tug kws tsom kwm koj yuav tsw tsaug zug le.
Saib maj, tug kws tsom kwm cov Yixayee yuav tsw ncaws daab ndub lossws tsaug zug le.
Yawmsaub yog tug kws tsom kwm koj, Yawmsaub yog tug duab ntxoo ntawm koj saab teg xws.
Nruab nub lub nub yuav tsw ua phem rua koj, mo ntuj lub hli yuav tsw ua le caag rua koj.
Yawmsaub yuav tsom kwm koj ntawm txhua yaam kev phem, nwg yuav tsom kwm koj txujsa.
Yawmsaub yuav tsom kwm koj tawm moog hab koj rov lug txwj nwgnuav moog ib txhws tsw kawg.
Kuv zoo sab rua thaus puab has rua kuv tas, “Ca peb moog rua huv Yawmsaub lub tuam tsev.”
Yeluxalee 'e, peb txhais kwtaw tseed sawv ntsug huv koj tej rooj loog.
Yeluxalee raug rhawv ua lub nroog kws ruaj khov nyob ntum nti.
Yog lub chaw kws txhua lub xeem nce moog rua huv, yog Yawmsaub txhua lub xeem, lawv le kws tu ca rua cov Yixayee kuas ua tsaug rua Yawmsaub lub npe.
Tej zwm txwv kws tu plaub kuj muab txawb rua huv, yog Tavi caaj ceg tej zwm txwv.
Ca le thov kev kaaj sab lug rua Yeluxalee tas, “Thov ca cov kws nyam koj vaam meej.
Thov kev kaaj sab lug muaj nyob huv koj tej ntsaa loog, hab kev tso sab plhuav nyob huv koj tej chaw tsom faaj.”
Vem saib rua kuv tej kwvtij kwvluag kuv yuav has tas, “Thov kev kaaj sab lug muaj nyob huv koj.”
Vem saib rua peb tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub lub tuam tsev, kuv yuav nrhav kev zoo rua koj.
Au Yawmsaub kws nyob lub zwm txwv sau ntuj, kuv tsaa qhov muag saib koj.

Tug tub qhe saib ntsoov tog tug lospaav le caag hab tug nkauj qhev saib ntsoov tog tug puj lospaav le caag, peb qhov muag saib ntsoov tog Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv ib yaam le ntawd moog txug thaus nwg khuvleej peb.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj khuvleej peb, thov koj khuvleej peb lauj, tsua qhov peb raug luas saib tsw taug heev dhau lawm.
Peb dhuav sab qhov kws cov tuabneeg tau zoo thuaj luag peb ntev lug lawm, yog qhov kws cov khaav theeb saib tsw taug peb.
Yog Yawmsaub tsw tuaj peb tog, ca cov Yixayee has le nuav,
yog Yawmsaub tsw tuaj peb tog rua thaus luas sawv tseeg tawm tsaam peb,
mas luas yuav muab peb nqog hlo caj rua thaus luas npau tawg rua peb heev.
Mas dej yuav nyaab kuav peb moog, tej nthwv dej yuav ndwg sau peb.
Tej dej nphau pes nphwv yuav lug nyaab hlo peb.
Qhuas Vaajtswv kws tsw muab peb ua qauv tag luas kaug nav.
Peb dim yaam nkaus le tug noog dim rooj hlua cuab, rooj hlua tu nrho peb txhad tswv dim plawg.
Txujkev paab peb nyob huv Yawmsaub lub npe, yog tug kws tswm ntuj tswm teb.
Cov kws tso sab plhuav rua Yawmsaub kuj zoo le lub roob Xi‑oo kws tsw ua zug le, yuav nyob moog ib txhws.
Tej roob nyob vej lub nroog Yeluxalee le caag, Yawmsaub kuj nyob vej nwg haiv tuabneeg ib yaam le ntawd txwj nub nua moog ib txhws tsw kawg.
Cov tuabneeg phem tug cwj yuav tsw kaav lub tebchaws kws muab pub rua cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg lawm, sub cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg txhad tsw cev txhais teg moog ua txhum.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj ua zoo rua cov tuabneeg zoo hab rua cov kws lub sab ncaaj.
Tassws cov tuabneeg kws tig rua txujkev nkhaus, Yawmsaub yuav coj puab nrug cov tuabneeg ua phem ua ke. Thov pub cov Yixayee nyob kaaj sab lug.
Thaus Yawmsaub pub Xi‑oo rov vaam meej le qub, peb kuj zoo le tej tuabneeg ua npau suav.
Peb lub qhov ncauj luag puv npo, peb tug nplaig qw zoo sab xyiv faab, mas luas has rua huv ib tsoom tebchaws tas, “Yawmsaub ua tej num luj kawg rua puab.”
Yawmsaub tub ua num luj kawg rua peb lawm, peb txhad zoo sab xyiv faab.
Au Yawmsaub, thov pub peb rov vaam meej le qub, yaam le tej haav dej huv Neke.
Thov ca cov kws tseb noob lug kua muag, tau sau qoob qw zoo sab xyiv faab.
Tug kws nqaa noob tawm moog tseb nrug suab quaj, yuav tau sau nwg tej qoob lug tsev nrug suab qw xyiv faab.
Yog Yawmsaub tsw ua tsev, cov kws ua tsev kuj txug sav do xwb. Yog Yawmsaub tsw tsom kwm lub nroog, tug faaj xwm kuj zuv do xwb.
Qhov kws koj sawv ntxuv ntxuv pw lig lig, ua num khwv fuas quas tso kev noj kev haus tsw muaj qaabhau. Tsua qhov Yawmsaub yeej pub rua tug kws nwg hlub pw tsaug zug zoo.
Tej tub ki yog qub txeeg qub teg ntawm Yawmsaub, tej mivnyuas kws yug huv lub plaab lug yog tshaav ntuj.
Tej tub kws yug thaus leej txwv tseed hluas kuj zoo yaam nkaus le raab xub huv tug tub rog txhais teg.
Tug yawm twg muaj xub nee puv lub raaj, kuj kaaj sab lug. Thaus nrug nwg cov yeeb ncuab ua plaub ntawm rooj loog, nwg yuav tsw txaaj muag.
Txhua tug kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub kuj yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug, yog cov kws taug nwg txujkev.
Koj yuav tau noj tej kws koj txhais teg khwv tau, koj yuav tau zoo hab yuav vaam meej.
Koj tug quaspuj yuav zoo yaam le tsob txwv maab kws txw ncw ncw nyob huv koj lub tsev, koj cov mivnyuas yuav zoo nkaus le tej ntsuag ntoo aulib nyob puag ncig koj lub rooj mov.
Yog le nuav nawj, tug kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug ib yaam le ntawd.
Thov Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua koj ntawm Xi‑oo. Thov ca koj pum lub nroog Yeluxalee vaam meej taag koj swm neej.
Thov ca koj pum koj tej xeeb leej xeeb ntxwv. Thov pub cov Yixayee nyob kaaj sab lug.
Puab tub tswm txom kuv heev thaus yau lug, ca cov Yixayee has le nuav,
puab tub tswm txom kuv heev thaus yau lug, tassws puab kuj kov tsw yeej kuv.
Cov kws laij teb kuj laij sau kuv nraus qaum, puab laij tej nam kaab ntev ntev.
Yawmsaub yog tug ncaaj nceeg, nwg muab cov tuabneeg phem tej hlua kws khi kuv txav pov tseg.
Thov kuas cov kws ntxub Xi‑oo poob ntsej muag hab tig rov qaab.
Thov kuas puab zoo yaam nkaus le tej nroj kws tuaj sau ruv tsev es qhuav taag tsw hlub.
Luas yuav tsw hlais tuav ntawm teg, luas yuav tsw paav ua ib tsuag rua ntawm ndag.
Hab ca cov kws dua kev tsw xob has tas, “Thov Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua mej. Peb tuav Yawmsaub lub npe foom koob moov rua mej.”
Au Yawmsaub, kuv nyob qhov tub tub quaj hu koj.
Au tug Tswv, thov noog kuv lub suab. Thov koj tig ntsej ua tuab zoo noog kuv lub suab taij thov.
Au Yawmsaub, yog koj cim tej kev txhum txem ca, au tug Tswv, leejtwg yuav sawv nreg nreeg tau?
Tassws koj yog tug kws zaam txem sub suavdawg txhad fwm hab paub ntshai koj.
Kuv tog rawv Yawmsaub, kuv tug ntsuj plig tog ntsoov, hab kuv vaam ntsoov nwg tej lug.
Kuv tug ntsuj plig tog rawv Yawmsaub heev dua tug faaj xwm tog kaaj ntug, heev dua tug faaj xwm tog rawv kaaj ntug.
Yixayee 'e, ca le muaj sab vaam rua huv Yawmsaub. vem Yawmsaub muaj txujkev hlub ruaj khov, hab muaj kev txhwv puv npo.
Nwg yuav txhwv cov Yixayee dim puab tej kev txhum txem huvsw.

Au Yawmsaub, kuv lub sab tsw tau muab hlub hab kuv lub qhov muag tsw tau saib ua khaav theeb quas ntsuav. Kuv tsw ntswg txug tej kws luj dhau kuv tug peevxwm hab tsw ntswg txug tej yaam luj hab phemfwj kws kuv tsw to taub.
Kuv tswj kuv lub sab kuas nyob tuabywv, yaam nkaus le tug mivnyuas kws tseg mig nyob tuabywv huv leej nam lub xubndag. Kuv lub sab nyob tuabywv yaam nkaus le tug mivnyuas tseg mig lawm.
Yixayee 'e, ca le vaam ntsoov Yawmsaub txwj nwgnuav moog ib txhws.
Au Yawmsaub, thov saib rua Tavi, thov ncu txug tej kev ceblaaj txom nyem huvsw kws nwg raug.
Nwg cog lug twv rua Yawmsaub, hab yeem lug tseg rua Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg has tas,
“Kuv yuav tsw nkaag moog rua huv kuv lub tsev lossws nkaag rua huv kuv lub txaaj pw.
Kuv yuav tsw kheev kuv lub qhov muag tsaug zug, lossws kuv daim tawv muag qe,
moog txug thaus kuv nrhav tau lub chaw rua Yawmsaub nyob, yog lub chaw rua Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nyob.”
Peb tub nov txug tej nuav huv lub moos Efatha, peb tub ntswb tej nuav ntawm lub moos Ya‑a tej teb
“Ca peb moog rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub chaw nyob, peb pe hawm rua ntawm nwg lub rooj tag taw.
Au Yawmsaub, thov sawv tseeg moog rua ntawm koj lub chaw nyob, tsw has koj hab lub swb xaab kws qha koj tug fwjchim.
Thov ca cov pov thawj muab txujkev ncaaj nceeg lug naav, thov ca koj cov tuabneeg kws dawb huv qw zoo sab xyiv faab.”
Vem yog saib rua koj tug qhev Tavi, thov tsw xob muab tug kws koj laub roj tsaa lawd tso tseg.
Yawmsaub cog lug tawv rua Tavi, yog tej lug kws tsw muab rhuav le has tas, “Kuv yuav tsaa ib tug tub kws koj yug lug nyob sau koj lub zwm txwv.
Yog koj cov tub tuav rawv kuv tej lug cog tseg hab tej kws kuv qha puab, mas puab cov tub kuj yuav tau nyob sau koj lub zwm txwv moog ib txhws.”
Yawmsaub tub xaiv Xi‑oo lawm, nwg xaav muab ua nwg lub chaw nyob, hab has tas,
“Nuav yog kuv lub chaw nyob moog ib txhws, kuv yuav nyob ntawm nuav vem kuv tub xaav le ntawd lawm.
Kuv yuav foom koob moov ntau nplua mag rua lub nroog nuav tej kev noj haus, kuv yuav pub nwg cov tuabneeg pluag tau noj tsau npo.
Kuv yuav muab txujkev cawm dim rua nwg cov pov thawj naav, nwg cov tuabneeg dawb huv yuav qw zoo sab xyiv faab.
Qhov chaw ntawd kuv yuav pub kuas muaj ib tug kub  tuaj rua Tavi, kuv tub npaaj ib lub teeb rua tug kws kuv laub roj tsaa lawm.
Kuv yuav muab txujkev txaaj muag rua nwg cov yeeb ncuab naav, tassws nwg lub mom kub yuav ci nplaag rua sau nwg taubhau.”
Qhov kws kwvtij nyob ua ke sws hum xeeb mas kuj yog qhov zoo hab kaaj sab kawg le.
Zoo ib yaam nkaus le cov roj muaj nqes kws nyob sau Aloo taubhau es ndwg lug ntub nwg tej fwj txwv hab ndwg lug txug nwg cej daab tsho.
Zoo ib yaam le tej lwg dej sau lub roob Hawmoo kws poob lug sau Xi‑oo tej roob, vem yog Yawmsaub yuav foom koob moov tawm hov ntawd moog, yog pub txujsa ntev moog ib txhws.
Ca le lug qhuas Yawmsaub, mej cov kws yog Yawmsaub tub qhe suavdawg, kws mo ntuj los sawv ntsug huv Yawmsaub lub tuam tsev.
Ca le tsaa mej txais teg ncaaj rua lub chaw dawb huv hab qhuas Yawmsaub.
Thov Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua mej ntawm Xi‑oo, yog tug kws tswm ntuj tswm teb.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub, ca le qhuas Yawmsaub lub npe, mej kws yog Yawmsaub cov tub qhe ca le qhuas nwg,
yog mej cov kws sawv ntsug huv Yawmsaub lub tuam tsev, yog cov kws sawv ntsug huv peb tug Vaajtswv tej tshaav puam tuam tsev.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub vem Yawmsaub yog tug zoo kawg nkaus. Ca le hu nkauj qhuas nwg lub npe vem nwg yog tug muaj lub sab hlub.
Yawmsaub xaiv Yakhauj ca rua Yawmsaub, hab xaiv Yixayee ua nwg teej nwg tug.
Tsua qhov kuv paub tas Yawmsaub yog tug luj kawg, hab paub tas peb tug Tswv luj dua tej timtswv huvsw.
Yawmsaub xaav ua daabtsw, nwg kuj ua yaam ntawd, tsw has sau ntuj hab huv nplajteb hab huv havtxwv hab huv nruab tiv txwv.
Yawmsaub yog tug kws ua rua tej fuab sawv tim qaab ntuj kawg tuaj hab ua muaj tsag lig xub rua thaus naag lug, hab coj cua tawm huv nwg lub txhaab cua lug.
Yawmsaub yog tug kws tua Iyi cov tub hlub, tsw has tuabneeg hab tsaj txhu.
Iyi 'e, huv mej Yawmsaub tau ua tej txujci tseem ceeb hab txujci phemfwj lug tawm tsaam Falau hab nwg cov tub teg tub taw suavdawg.
Nwg ntaus yeej ntau haiv tuabneeg hab tua tau tej vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim heev,
yog cov Amaulai tug vaajntxwv Xihoo, hab Npasaa tug vaajntxwv Aus, hab cov Khana‑aa tej vaajntxwv huvsw.
Hab pub puab tebchaws ua qub txeeg qub teg, yog pub ua qub txeeg qub teg rua nwg haiv tuabneeg Yixayee.
Au Yawmsaub, koj lub npe nyob moog ib txhws. Au Yawmsaub, koj lub npe kws nto moo quas lug yuav nyob rua txhua tam tuabneeg,
tsua qhov Yawmsaub yuav tsaa nwg haiv tuabneeg txujcai, hab yuav taab ncuab nwg cov tub qhe.
Ib tsoom tebchaws tej txoov daab yog nyaj hab kub kws tuabneeg txhais teg ua.
Tej txoov daab hov muaj qhov ncauj los has tsw tau lug, muaj qhov muag los tsw pum kev,
muaj qhov ntsej los tsw nov lug, hab tub tsw muaj paa huv lub qhov ncauj.
Cov kws ua tej txoov daab hov kuj zoo ib yaam nkaus le tej txoov daab hov, cov kws vaam khom tej txoov daab hov kuj zoo ib yaam nkaus.
Ib tsoom Yixayee 'e, mej ca le qhuas Yawmsaub, Aloo caaj ceg 'e, mej ca le qhuas Yawmsaub.
Levi caaj ceg 'e, mej ca le qhuas Yawmsaub, mej cov kws fwm hab paub ntshai Yawmsaub, ca le qhuas Yawmsaub.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub huv Xi‑oo, tug kws nyob huv Yeluxalee. Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub.
Ca le ua Yawmsaub tsaug, tsua qhov nwg yog tug zoo kawg. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Ca le ua ib tsoom timtswv tug Vaajtswv tsaug. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Ca le ua cov kws muaj fwjchim tug Tswv tsaug. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Nwg tuab leeg ua tau tej txujci phemfwj. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Nwg muaj tswvyim tswm nruab ntug. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Nwg nthuav lub nplajteb rua sau nplaim dej. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Nwg tswm lub nub lub hli ci. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Nwg tswm lub nub kaav nruab nub. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Nwg tswm lub hli hab cov nub qub kaav mo ntuj. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Nwg tua cov Iyi tej tub hlub. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Nwg coj cov Yixayee tawm huv puab moog. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Yog nwg txhais teg kws muaj fwjchim hab nwg txhais npaab kws tsaa hlo. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Nwg muab dej Havtxwv Lab faib hlo. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Nwg coj cov Yixayee hlaa huv plhawv havtxwv moog. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Nwg muab Falau hab nwg cov tub rog xyeeb hlo rua huv Havtxwv Lab. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Nwg coj nwg haiv tuabneeg hlaa dhau tebchaws moj saab qhua. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Nwg ntaus yeej tej vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Hab tua tau tej vaajntxwv kws muaj koob meej nto moo quas lug, Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Yog cov Amaulai tug vaajntxwv Xihoo, Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Hab Npasaa tug vaajntxwv Aus. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Nwg muab puab tej tebchaws ua qub txeeg qub teg, Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Yog pub ua qub txeeg qub teg rua cov Yixayee kws yog nwg tub qhe. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Tub yog nwg ncu ntsoov txug peb rua thaus peb poob qeg txom nyem ntsuav. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Hab nwg cawm peb dim huv peb cov tshawj chim. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Nwg pub zaub pub mov rua txhua yaam kws caj sa tau noj. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Mej ca le ua Vaajtswv Ntuj tsaug. Vem nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws.
Peb nyob tsawg ntawm tej ntug dej huv Npanpiloo, hab quaj ntsuag rua thaus peb ncu txug Xi‑oo.
Peb muab peb tej nkauj nog ncaas khuam rua sau tsob ntoo lwg zaaj kws nyob hov ntawd.
Mas qhov ntawd, cov kws nteg peb kuas peb hu nkauj, hab cov kws tswm txom peb kuas peb luag xyiv faab, puab has tas, “Ca le hu ib zaaj nkauj Xi‑oo rua peb noog.”
Peb yuav hu Yawmsaub tej nkauj tau le caag rua huv lwm tebchaws?
Yeluxalee 'e, yog kuv nov qaab koj, thov ca kuv txhais teg xws nov qaab tej kws kuv txawj.
Yog kuv tsw ncu txug koj, hab yog kuv tsw muab Yeluxalee ua luj dua kuv tej kev xyiv faab huvsw, thov ca kuv tug nplaig lu kuv lub qaab yag.
Au Yawmsaub, thov ncu tej kws cov Entoo ua rua nub kws Yeluxalee tawg. Puab has tas, “Ca le rhuav kuas puam tsuaj, ca le rhuav kuas puam tsuaj pob taag ti nkaus taw.”
Npanpiloo tug ntxhais 'e, koj yuav raug muab ua kuas puam tsuaj lauj! Tug kws ua pauj rua koj npaum le kws koj tau ua rua peb, yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Tug kws muab mej tej mivnyuas mog laim moog ntsawm pob zeb, yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv ua koj tsaug kawg kuv lub sab, kuv hu nkauj qhuas koj taab meeg ib tsoom timtswv.

Kuv pe ncaaj tuaj rua koj lub tuam tsev kws dawb huv, hab ua tsaug koj lub npe vem koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov, hab koj txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau. Tsua qhov koj txhawb nqaa koj lub npe, hab koj tej lug sab dua txhua yaam huvsw.
Nub kws kuv hu thov, koj kuj teb kuv, koj pub kuas kuv tug ntsuj plig muaj zug quas zug tuaj.
Au Yawmsaub, ib tsoom vaajntxwv suavdawg huv nplajteb yuav qhuas koj, tsua qhov puab nov tej lug kws tawm huv koj lub qhov ncauj lug.
Puab yuav hu nkauj txug Yawmsaub tej num, vem Yawmsaub tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab luj heev.
Txawm yog Yawmsaub sab kawg nkaus los nwg tseed xaam pum cov kws qeg kawg, txawm yog nwg nyob deb los nwg yeej paub cov tuabneeg khaav theeb.
Txawm yog kuv taug kev huv plawv tej kev ceblaaj, los koj tuav rawv kuv txujsa ca. Koj tsaa teg hlo tiv thaiv kuv tej yeeb ncuab txujkev npau tawg. Koj txhais teg xws tso kuv dim.
Yawmsaub yuav ua lawv le nwg lub sab xaav tseg kuas tav rua kuv. Au Yawmsaub, koj txujkev hlub ruaj khov nyob moog ib txhws. Thov tsw xob tso koj teg num tseg.
Au Yawmsaub, koj tub tshuaj saib kuv, hab paub kuv zoo.
Thaus kuv nyob tsawg hab sawv ntsug, los koj kuj paub. txawm yog koj nyob deb koj yeej paub tej kws kuv xaav.
Koj saib ntsoov thaus kuv taug kev hab thaus kuv su, koj yeej paub kuv txhua txujkev huvsw.
Au Yawmsaub, ua ntej kws kuv tug nplaig tsw tau has, koj tub paub taag huvsw lawm.
Koj thaiv tom kuv hauv ntej hab tom kuv qub qaab, hab muab koj txhais teg roog kuv.
Tej kev paub le nuav kuv phemfwj kawg, nyob sab kawg kuv ncaav tsw txug.
Kuv yuav tswv nraim koj tug Ntsuj Plig rua hovtwg? Kuv yuav tswv rua hovtwg txhad dhau koj lub xubndag?
Yog kuv nce moog rua sau ntuj, koj kuj nyob hov ntawd, yog kuv moog pw rua huv tub tuag teb, koj kuj nyob hov ntawd.
Txawm yog kuv muaj tis yaa yaam le tug duab kaaj ntug hab moog nyob tim ntug havtxwv kws deb kawg nkaus,
los qhov chaw ntawd koj txhais teg tseed coj kuv, hab koj txhais teg xws tseed tuav rawv kuv ca.
Yog kuv has tas, “Thov ca qhov tsaus roog kuv, hab ca qhov kaaj kws nyob ib ncig kuv ntxeev ua mo ntuj,”
mas txawm yog tsaus ntuj los tsw tsaus rua koj, mo ntuj kuj ci ib yaam le nruab nub, qhov tsaus kuj zoo ib yaam le qhov kaaj rua koj.
Tsua qhov koj tswm txhua yaam huv kuv lub nrog cev, hab koj muab kuv txuas rua huv kuv nam lub plaab.
Kuv qhuas koj vem koj tswm kuv phemfwj kawg hab xaav tsw thoob. Koj teg num mas phemfwj. Koj paub kuv zoo heev.
Thaus kuv raug tswm nyob huv qhov nraim nreeg, hab muab kuv tej pob txhaa sws txuas ua ke huv lub nplajteb qhov kws tub heev, kuv lub cev ntaaj ntsug muab zais tsw tau ib qho ntawm koj hlo le.
Koj lub qhov muag pum kuv rua thaus tsw tau xeeb rua huv nruab thab. Txhua nub kws teem ca rua kuv kuj sau ca rua huv koj phoo ntawv, ua ntej kws tsw tau muaj txhua nub hov lug.
Au Vaajtswv, tej kws koj xaav ca tswm txaj kawg nkaus rua kuv, muab sau zog ua ke kuj ntau kawg le lauj!
Yog kuv yuav suav, mas muaj ntau dua tej xuab zeb. Thaus kuv tswm dheev lug, kuv tseed nrug nraim koj.
Au Vaajtswv, kuv xaav kuas koj tua cov tuabneeg limham tseg, hab xaav kuas cov tuabneeg noj nyoog ncaim ntawm kuv moog,
yog cov kws npaaj ua phem has tawm tsaam koj, yog cov kws tsaab ua luj tawm tsaam koj es yuav ua phem.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv tsw ntxub cov kws ntxub koj lov? Kuv tsw dhuav cov kws sawv tawm tsaam koj lov?
Kuv ntxub puab heev kawg nkaus, hab suav tas puab yog kuv le yeeb ncuab.
Au Vaajtswv, thov koj tshuaj saib kuv hab paub kuv lub sab. Thov swm kuv hab paub tej kws kuv xaav.
Hab saib muaj yaam kev phem twg nyob huv kuv los tsw muaj, hab coj kuv taug txujkev kws nyob moog ib txhws.
Au Yawmsaub, thov cawm kuv dim ntawm cov tuabneeg ua phem, thov tiv thaiv kuv ntawm cov tuabneeg ua nruj ua tswv,
yog cov kws xaav tswvyim huv lub sab ua phem, hab pheej tshaum kuas muaj kev ua rog.
Puab ua puab tug nplaig ntse ib yaam le nplaig naab, hab puab daim tawv ncauj muaj taug ib yaam le taug naab raaj kub sai.
Au Yawmsaub, thov tsom kwm kuv kuas dim ntawm cov tuabneeg limham txhais teg, thov tiv thaiv kuv ntawm cov tuabneeg ua nruj ua tswv kws tuav huv chua kuv kwtaw.
Cov tuabneeg khaav theeb caws yej caws ntxab tog kuv, hab cuab tswg cuab hlua rua kuv. Kuv txujkev mas puab cuab maab cuab hlua tog.
Kuv has rua Yawmsaub tas, “Koj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv.” Au Yawmsaub, thov koj tig ntsej noog kuv lub suab taij thov koj.
Au Yawmsaub kws yog kuv tug tswv, yog tug kws muaj zug cawm kuv dim, koj roog kuv lub taubhau thaus kws ntaus rog.
Au Yawmsaub, thov tsw xob kheev cov tuabneeg limham ua tau lawv le puab lub sab xaav, tsw xob kheev puab tej tswvyim phem tav.
Cov kws nyob vej ib ncig kuv tsaa puab lub taubhau sab. Thov ca puab raug tej lug phem kws puab daim tawv ncauj has.
Thov kuas cov ncaig tawg kws kub heev poob raug puab, thov ca puab raug pov rua huv suavtawg hab poob rua huv qhov ntuj tsw xob kheev puab tawm lug le.
Thov tsw xob ca cov kws ab ham luas nyob ruaj huv lub tebchaws, thov ca txujkev phem lawv caum tau tej tuabneeg ua nruj ua tswv.
Kuv paub tas Yawmsaub tuav cov tuabneeg txom nyem nyuaj sab txujcai, hab tu plaub ncaaj paab cov pluag.
Yeej muaj tseeb, cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav ua tsaug koj lub npe, cov tuabneeg sab ncaaj yuav tau nyob ntawm koj xubndag.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv taij thov koj, thov koj teb kuv sai sai. Thov koj tig ntsej noog kuv lub suab rua thaus kws kuv thov hu koj.
Thov ca kuv tej lug thov zoo yaam nkaus le cov tshuaj tsw qaab rua ntawm koj lub xubndag, hab qhov kws kuv tsaa teg thov zoo yaam nkaus le tej kws muab xyeem thaus yuav tsaus ntuj.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj zuv kuv lub qhov ncauj, thov zuv kuv daim tawv ncauj.
Thov tsw xob ca kuv lub sab qaug moog rua txujkev phem twg le, tsw xob ca kuv nrug cov tuabneeg limham ua ib nqaag xaav ua kev phem kev qas, tsw xob ca kuv nrug puab noj nqaj noj qhau.
Thov ca tug ncaaj nceeg ntaus hab ntuag kuv vem yog nwg hlub. Tsw xob ca cov tuabneeg limham tej roj pleev kuv lub taubhau, vem yog kuv pheej thov Yawmsaub tawm tsaam puab tej kev phem.
Thaus cov tuabneeg kws txav txem raug muab pov rua huv qaab tsuas, mas ib tsoom tuabneeg yuav paub tas kuv tej lug muaj tseeb.
Lub pob zeb tawg rw quas sua sau npoo aav le caag, puab tej pob txhaa yuav rw sua tom tej toj ntxaa le ntawd.
Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, kuv lub qhov muag saib ntsoov koj, kuv cawm sav rua huv koj, koj tsw xob ca kuv txujsa tu.
Thov koj paab kuas kuv tsw xob maag rooj ntaa kws luas cuab kuv, hab tsw xob maag rooj ntxab kws tej tuabneeg phem cuab kuv.
Thov ca cov tuabneeg limham maag puab rooj hlua huvsw, es ca kuv dim.
Kuv tsaa ncauj thov Yawmsaub, kuv tsaa suab taij thov Yawmsaub paab.
Kuv quaj ywg kuv tej kev nyuaj sab rua ntawm nwg xubndag, kuv qha kuv tej kev txom nyem rua nwg.
Thaus kuv sab ntsws yaaj taag, koj paub kuv txujkev. Txujkev kws kuv yuav moog, luas cuab maab cuab hlua rua kuv.
Thov koj tsaa muag saib ntawm kuv saab xws vem tsw muaj leejtwg tsom kwm kuv le lawm. Kuv tsw muaj lub chaw cawm sav lawm, tsw muaj leejtwg mob sab kuv.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv tsaa ncauj thov koj, kuv has tas, “Koj yog kuv lub chaw cawm sav. Thaus kuv tseed caj sa nyob, koj yeej yog kuv tug.”
Thov koj noog kuv lub suab thov, vem kuv poob qeg kawg le. Thov cawm kuv dim ntawm cov kws tswm txom kuv, tsua qhov puab muaj zug heev dhau kuv.
Thov tso kuv tawm huv tsev lojfaaj sub kuv txhad le ua tsaug koj lub npe. Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav nyob vej vog kuv, vem yog koj ua zoo heev rua kuv.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj noog kuv tej lug thov, thov koj tig ntsej noog tej lug kws kuv taij thov koj. Thov koj teb kuv lawv le koj txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau hab lawv le koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg.
Thov tsw xob txav txem rua koj tug tub qhe, vem tsw muaj ib tug tuabneeg caj kws ncaaj nceeg ntawm koj lub xubndag.
Kuv tug yeeb ncuab lawv cuag kuv, nwg muab kuv mos ntho rua huv aav, nwg muab kuv nyob rua huv qhov chaw tsaus ntuj nti, zoo ib yaam le tug kws tub tuag ntev lawm.
Vem le ntawd kuv tug ntsuj plig qaug zug taag, kuv poob sab ntshai kawg le.
Kuv ncu txug yaav thau u, kuv tshawb nrhav txhua yaam kws koj tau ua lawm, kuv xaav txug tej kws koj txhais teg tau ua.
Kuv cev teg ncuv rua koj, kuv tug ntsuj plig nqhes nrhav koj ib yaam le thaaj aav kws qhuav nkig nkuav.
Au Yawmsaub, thov maaj nroog teb kuv, kuv tug ntsuj plig yaaj taag. Thov tsw xob fee plhu ntawm kuv, tsaam tes kuv zoo le cov tuabneeg kws moog rua huv tub tuag teb.

Thaus kaaj ntug thov ca kuv nov txug koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov, vem yog kuv muab hlo kuv lub sab rua koj. Thov qha txujkev kws yuav tsum moog rua kuv, tsua qhov kuv yeej muab kuv lub sab taag nrho rua koj.
Au Yawmsaub, thov cawm kuv dim ntawm kuv cov yeeb ncuab, kuv tau tswv nraim rua huv koj.
Thov qha kuv paub ua lawv le koj lub sab nyam, tsua qhov koj yog kuv tug Vaajtswv. Thov koj tug Ntsuj Plig kws zoo coj kuv taug txujkev taj kev tug.
Au Yawmsaub, vem yog saib rua koj lub npe, thov koj tuav kuv txujsa ca. Koj yog tug ncaaj nceeg, thov koj coj kuv tawm huv tej kev ceblaaj lug.
Vem koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov, thov koj muab kuv cov yeeb ncuab rhuav pov tseg, hab thov muab txhua tug kws tawm tsaam kuv ua kuas puam tsuaj taag, tsua qhov kuv yog koj tug tub qhe.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub kws yog txhwb zeb kws tiv thaiv kuv, yog tug kws muab kuv txhais teg xyum ua rog, hab muab kuv ntiv teg xyum sws ntaus sws tua.

Nwg yog txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov hab yog kuv lub chaw nraim cev kws khov kho, nwg yog kuv lub chaw kws ruaj khov, yog tug kws tso kuv dim, nwg yog daim hlau kws tiv thaiv kuv, yog tug kws kuv nraim cev rua huv. Nwg muab ib tsoom tuabneeg txu rua kuv tswjfwm.
Au Yawmsaub, tuabneeg yog daabtsw es koj yuav mob sab puab? Tuabneeg tej tub ki yog daabtsw es koj yuav ncu txug puab?
Tuabneeg tsuas zoo le ib paas cua xwb, hab nwg lub caij nyoog tsuas zoo le tug duab ntxoo kws hlaa dhau plhawv moog.
Au Yawmsaub, thov koj qheb hlo koj lub rooj ntug hab nqeg lug, thov koj kov tej toj roob hauv peg ua kuas tawm paa nchu quas log.
Thov tso tsag lig xub lug ua kuas cov yeeb ncuab tawg rw sua moog, thov koj tua raab xub ua rua puab tawg tswv taag.
Thov koj cev teg sau ntuj tuaj, thov cawm kuv hab npu kuv dim huv cov dej tub tub, hab dim huv lwm haiv tuabneeg txhais teg.
Puab lub qhov ncauj cis daag, puab tsaa txhais teg xws twv los kuj yog pem txwv.
Au Vaajtswv, kuv yuav hu zaaj nkauj tshab qhuas koj, kuv yuav ntaus lub nkauj nog ncaas kaum txuj xuv qhuas koj.
Koj yog tug kws paab tej vaajntxwv kov yeej, hab yog tug kws cawm koj tug tub qhe Tavi dim.
Thov koj cawm kuv dim raab ntaaj noj nyoog hab tso kuv dim huv lwm haiv tuabneeg txhais teg. Puab lub qhov ncauj cis daag, puab tsaa txhais teg xws twv los kuj yog pem txwv.
Thaus peb cov tub tseed hluas, thov kuas puab zoo le tsob ntoo kws tub luj txaus lawm, hab thov kuas peb cov ntxhais zoo yaam nkaus le tug ncej ntawm kaum tsev kws txaug ua vaajntxwv lub tsev.
Thov kuas peb tej txhaab puv hab muaj txhua yaam qoob nyob huv. Thov kuas peb tej yaaj muaj mivnyuas quas txheeb quas vaam tug rua huv peb tej tshaav zaub.
Thov kuas peb tej tsaj txhu muaj zeg coob coob, thov kuas tsw xob muaj leejtwg txeem moog rua huv hab tsw muaj leejtwg tawm tswv moog, hab thov kuas tsw xob muaj suab quaj lwj sab huv peb tej kev.
Haiv tuabneeg kws tau koob moov le nuav yuav tau nyob kaaj sab quas lug, haiv tuabneeg kws puab tug Vaajtswv yog Yawmsaub yuav tau nyob kaaj sab quas lug.
Kuv yuav qhuas ntxhas koj kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv hab kuv tug vaajntxwv, hab qhuas koj lub npe moog ib txhws tsw kawg.
Kuv yuav naj nub qhuas koj, hab qhuas koj lub npe moog ib txhws tsw kawg.
Yawmsaub luj kawg nkaus, tswm nyog qhuas nwg heev kawg. Qhov kws nwg luj hov mas paub tsw taag.
Ib tam yuav qhuas koj teg num rua ib tam noog, hab yuav pav koj tej num kws muaj fwjchim.
Puab yuav has txug koj tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab hab koj lub meej mom, hab kuv yuav tshawb nrhav koj tej num phemfwj.
Tuabneeg yuav pav txug koj tej num txaus ntshai tug fwjchim, hab kuv yuav pav txug qhov kws koj luj kawg.
Puab yuav pav txug koj txujkev zoo nplua quas mag lub koob meej, puab yuav hu nkauj txug koj txujkev ncaaj nceeg.
Yawmsaub muaj sab hlub hab sab khuvleej, nwg tsw chim sai hab muaj txujkev hlub ruaj khov nplua quas mag.
Yawmsaub ua zoo rua txhua tug, nwg taab ncuab txhua yaam kws nwg tswm.
Au Yawmsaub, txhua yaam kws koj tswm lug yuav ua koj tsaug, hab koj cov tuabneeg dawb huv suavdawg yuav qhuas koj.
Puab yuav has txug koj lub meej mom kws koj ua vaajntxwv kaav, hab pav txug koj tug fwjchim,
sub tuabneeg tej tub txhad paub txug koj tej num kws muaj fwjchim hab koj lub meej mom kws ua vaajntxwv kaav.
Koj lub tebchaws nyob moog ib txhws tsw kawg, koj ua vaajntxwv kaav moog txhua tam tuabneeg. Yawmsaub ua ncaaj lawv le txhua lu lug kws nwg tub has tseg lawm, hab hlub txhua yaam kws nwg ua huvsw.
Yawmsaub fwj txhua tug kws yuav qaug, hab tsaa txhua tug kws poob thaab sawv.
Txhua tug lub qhov muag saib ntsoov koj, hab koj pub zaub mov rua puab lawv swjhawm.
Koj cev teg, koj pub rua txhua yaam kws caj sa tau noj npaum le kws puab xaav noj
Yawmsaub ua ncaaj ua nceeg rua huv txhua txujkev, hab hlub txhua yaam kws nwg ua huvsw.
Yawmsaub nyob ze txhua tug kws thov hu nwg, yog txhua tug kws muaj sab thov tag.
Nwg pub rua txhua tug kws fwm hab paub ntshai nwg lawv le puab lub sab xaav, hab nwg noog puab lub suab quaj thov hab cawm puab dim.
Yawmsaub tsom kwm txhua tug kws hlub nwg, tassws nwg yuav ua kuas cov kws limham suavdawg puam tsuaj.
Kuv lub qhov ncauj yuav qhuas Yawmsaub, ca txhua yaam kws caj sa qhuas nwg lub npe kws dawb huv moog ib txhws tsw kawg.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub. Kuv tug ntsuj plig 'e, ca le qhuas Yawmsaub lauj!
Kuv yuav qhuas Yawmsaub taag kuv swm neej, kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas kuv tug Vaajtswv rua thaus kuv tseed muaj txujsa nyob.
Tsw xob tso sab rua cov thawj, puab yog tuabneeg xwb, tsw txawj paab.
Thaus puab tsw ua paa lawm puab kuj rov qaab moog rua huv aav, tuab nub ntawd tej kws puab npaaj tseg lawd kuj puam tsuaj taag.
Tug kws Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv paab, hab nwg lub chaw vaam nyob huv nwg tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, tug hov tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Vaajtswv yog tug kws tswm ntuj tswm teb hab dej havtxwv hab txhua yaam kws nyob huv, nwg yeej ua lawv le nwg tej lug cog tseg moog ib txhws.
Nwg tu plaub ncaaj rua cov kws raug quab yuam, nwg pub zaub mov rua cov kws tshaib plaab noj. Yawmsaub tso cov kws raug kaw dim.
Yawmsaub qheb cov kws dig muag lub qhov muag. Yawmsaub tsaa cov kws poob thaab sawv lug. Yawmsaub hlub cov kws ncaaj nceeg.
Yawmsaub tsom kwm lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob, nwg fwj cov puj ntsuag hab cov mivnyuas ntsuag kws tsw muaj txwv, tassws nwg ua rua cov tuabneeg limham tej kev puam tsuaj moog.
Yawmsaub yuav ua vaajntxwv moog ib txhws, Xi‑oo 'e, koj tug Vaajtswv yuav kaav txhua tam moog le. Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub. Qhov kws hu nkauj qhuas peb tug Vaajtswv yog qhov kws zoo, qhov kws hu nkauj qhuas nwg yog yaam kws peb zoo sab ua hab tswm nyog peb ua.
Yawmsaub rov qaab rhawv lub nroog Yeluxalee, hab nwg qaws cov Yixayee kws tawg ua saab ua sua rov qaab lug.
Nwg khu cov tuabneeg lwj sab hab qhwv puab tej qhov txhaab.
Nwg kom tseg tas yuav tsum muaj pes tsawg lub nub qub hab tis npe rua txhua lub huvsw.
Peb tug Tswv luj kawg hab muaj fwjchim kawg nkaus, tsw muaj leejtwg yuav ntsuag tau nwg tug tswvyim.
Yawmsaub tsaa cov kws raug tsuj yuam sawv, nwg yuav qhau cov tuabneeg limham rua huv aav.
Ca le hu nkauj ua Yawmsaub tsaug, ca le ntaus nkauj nog ncaas qhuas peb tug Vaajtswv.
Nwg tso fuab laum nruab ntug, nwg npaaj naag ca rua lub nplajteb, nwg ua kuas tuaj nyom rua sau tej roob.
Nwg pub zaub rua tej tsaj txhu noj hab pub rua tej mivnyuas uab voj kws quaj tau noj.
Tsw yog nwg zoo sab rua tej neeg tug zug, hab tsw yog nwg zoo sab rua tuabneeg txhais ceg kws dha.
Tassws Yawmsaub zoo sab rua cov kws fwm hab paub ntshai nwg hab cov kws vaam khom rua nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov.
Yeluxalee 'e, ca le qhuas Yawmsaub, Xi‑oo 'e, ca le qhuas koj tug Vaajtswv,
vem nwg tuav koj tej rooj loog ruaj khov kho, nwg foom koob moov rua tej tub ki kws nyob huv koj.
Nwg kuj pub kev thaaj yeeb rua huv koj lub tebchaws, nwg pub koj tau noj tej mog zoo zoo tsau npo.
Nwg xaa nwg tej lug tuaj rua lub nplajteb, nwg tej lug nthuav moog sai kawg.
Nwg tso daus xwb daus npu lug yaam le plaub yaaj, nwg tso te lug dawb vog le moov tshauv.
Nwg tso lawg lug yaam le qai zeb. Leejtwg yuav thev taug qhov kws nwg ua kuas no txag heev ntawd?
Nwg tso lug plhuav, ua rua tej ntawd yaaj taag, nwg tso nwg le cua ntsawj ua tej dej ndwg hlo moog.
Nwg qha nwg tej lug rua Yakhauj, hab qha nwg tej kaab ke hab kevcai rua Yixayee.
Nwg yeej tsw tau qha tej kevcai nuav rua lwm haiv tuabneeg, puab tsw paub nwg tej kevcai. Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub. Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub sau ntuj. Ca le qhuas nwg sau tej chaw sab.
Nwg cov tubkhai ntuj suavdawg, ca le qhuas nwg, nwg cov tub rog suavdawg, ca le qhuas nwg lauj!
Lub nub lub hli, ca le qhuas nwg, tej nub qub kws ci, mej txhua lub ca le qhuas nwg.
Lub ntuj kws sab kawg nkaus, hab cov dej kws nyob sau ntuj, mej ca le qhuas nwg.
Ca tej hov qhuas Yawmsaub lub npe, vem yog nwg has xwb, tej hov ca le muaj tshwm lug.
Nwg muab puab txawb ca moog ib txhws tsw kawg, nwg rhawv kevcai rua puab tsw kheev puab hlaa dhau.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub huv lub nplajteb, tsw has tej tsaj kws luj kawg huv havtxwv hab tej dej nruab tiv txwv,
tsag lig xub hab lawg, daus xwb daus npu hab fuab, hab cua daaj cua dub kws ua lawv le nwg has,
tej roob hab tej pov roob huvsw, tej txwv ntoo hab tej ntoo cab huvsw,
tej tsaj qus hab tej tsaj nyeg huvsw, tej tsaj kws nkaag huv aav hab tej naag noog kws yaa sau nruab ntug,
tej vaajntxwv huv lub nplajteb hab ib tsoom tuabneeg suavdawg, cov kws ua thawj hab cov kws kaav huv lub nplajteb suavdawg,
cov tub hluas ntxhais hluas, cov laug hab cov mivnyuas yau.
Ca puab suavdawg qhuas Yawmsaub lub npe, tsua qhov nwg tuab leeg lub npe nyob sab dua luas tej, nwg tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab nyob sab dua lub nplajteb hab lub ntuj.
Nwg tsaa kuas muaj ib tug kub rua nwg haiv tuabneeg, yog tug kws nwg cov tuabneeg dawb huv suavdawg qhuas, yog tug kws cov Yixayee kws nyob ze nwg qhuas. Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub. Ca le hu zaaj nkauj tshab rua Yawmsaub, thaus cov kws sab xwb rua Vaajtswv tuaj txoos ua ke ca le qhuas nwg.
Ca cov Yixayee zoo sab rua tug kws tswm puab, ca Xi‑oo tej tub ki xyiv faab rua puab tug vaajntxwv.
Ca puab hu nkauj seev cev qhuas nwg lub npe, ca puab ntaus nkauj nog ncaas hab ntaus nruag seev suab qhuas nwg.
Tsua qhov Yawmsaub zoo sab rua nwg haiv tuabneeg, nwg pub cov kws txu fwjchim tau txujkev kov yeej ua mom rua puab ntoo.
Ca cov kws sab xwb rua Vaajtswv zoo sab hlo tsua qhov kws kov yeej, hab ca puab hu nkauj xyiv faab hlo rua huv puab tej txaaj pw.
Ca puab lub caj paas hu nrov qhuas Vaajtswv, ca puab tuav rawv raab ntaaj ob saab ntse huv puab txhais teg,
sub txhad pauj taub rua ib tsoom tebchaws hab rau txem rua ib tsoom tuabneeg,
hab muab saw hlau khi puab tej vaajntxwv, hab muab raab cuab hlau cuab puab tej thawj,
hab rau txem rua puab lawv le Yawmsaub tub sau tseg ca lawm. Nuav yog tej koob meej kws muab rua nwg cov tuabneeg kws sab xwb rua nwg suavdawg. Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub.
Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub. Ca le qhuas Vaajtswv rua huv lub chaw kws pe nwg, ca le qhuas nwg huv nwg lub chaw kws muaj fwjchim sau ntuj.
Ca le qhuas nwg vem nwg tej num muaj fwjchim, ca le qhuas nwg vem nwg luj tshaaj plawg.
Ca le tshuab raaj kub yaaj ua suab qhuas nwg, ca le ntaus nkauj nog ncaas miv hab nkauj nog ncaas luj qhuas nwg.
Ca le dha seev cev npuaj nruag qhuas nwg, ca le tshav nkauj nog ncaas hab tshuv raaj nplai qhuas nwg.
Ca le npuaj nruag tooj lab nrov ntxhe ntxhas, ca le npuaj nruag tooj lab nrov doog daj qhuas nwg.
Txhua yaam kws caj sa ca le qhuas Yawmsaub. Ca le qhuas Yawmsaub lauj!
